dialogue_en: Neither fang nor claw will suffice.
dialogue_jp: 牙は効かぬようだな……

dialogue_en: Hey, check it out.
dialogue_jp: おい　見ろよ

dialogue_en: Time for some magic!
dialogue_jp: 魔法の出番？

dialogue_en: Spells will get the job done quicker!
dialogue_jp: ダメ？　なら　魔法で！

dialogue_en: A spell or two oughta speed things up.
dialogue_jp: くそ　魔法ならいけっか？

dialogue_en: Ready!?
dialogue_jp: チャンスだよ！

dialogue_en: Time to fillet this fish!
dialogue_jp: 叩きのめしてやらあ！

dialogue_en: Alright! Let's pump it full of lead!
dialogue_jp: 隙アリだ　撃ちまくってやる！

dialogue_en: Let's finish this!
dialogue_jp: 一気に叩き込む！

dialogue_en: Now's our chance!
dialogue_jp: いまがチャンスだ

dialogue_en: It's below us.
dialogue_jp: 潜られたか

dialogue_en: Back in the water, huh?
dialogue_jp: えっ　泳いでる？

dialogue_en: It's right under us!
dialogue_jp: 下だよ　気をつけて！

dialogue_en: Keep your eyes on the water!
dialogue_jp: 下から狙ってやがる！

dialogue_en: Watch the water!
dialogue_jp: 下に注意しろ

dialogue_en: At ease, troop─for good this time.
dialogue_jp: 巻きこんで　悪かったな

dialogue_en: Salute!
dialogue_jp: 敬礼！

dialogue_en:
We thank you for your support, Captain.
Seventh Infantry...
dialogue_jp: 我らの隊長に感謝と敬意を込めて

dialogue_en: Though let's hope for your sakes that it isn't on the field of battle.
dialogue_jp: その時には　覚悟しろ

dialogue_en: Head to Under Junon if you're looking for an inn.
dialogue_jp: 休みたければ　アンダージュノンへ行くんだな

dialogue_en: I can't let you through.
dialogue_jp: ここは通行禁止だ

dialogue_en: Figures. Shinra's always gotta have someone to stomp on. It's their friggin' MO.
dialogue_jp:
神羅のしわ寄せは　全部下にくるんだ
どこもいっしょだぜ

dialogue_en: Little more than an impoverished fishing village.
dialogue_jp: アンダージュノン　寂れた漁村だ

dialogue_en: Everything above us. Below is Under Junon.
dialogue_jp: いや　要塞都市の下に小さな村がある

dialogue_en: So all of this is Junon?
dialogue_jp: この先が　ジュノン？

dialogue_en: Agreed. Let's focus on where we can go.
dialogue_jp: ああ　まずジュノンへ行こう

dialogue_en: Well, even if we could get there, I'd rather not bother. Didn't seem very friendly.
dialogue_jp:
島か……
じゃあ　どうしようもないね

dialogue_en: Nature's finally reclaimin' what Shinra stole.
dialogue_jp: 神羅め　ざまあねえな

dialogue_en: Though there's no longer any way to reach the isle─or at least, none that I'm aware of.
dialogue_jp:
そんな話を聞いたことがある
だが　その島へ行く方法はない

dialogue_en: There's a story about a great condor said to roost on an island's abandoned reactor.
dialogue_jp:
孤島の古い魔晄炉に
巨大なコンドルが住みついた

dialogue_en: Where did that bird even come from, you think?
dialogue_jp: さっきの鳥って　どこから来たのかな

dialogue_en: C'mon.
dialogue_jp: 行こう

dialogue_en: Junon... Shinra territory.
dialogue_jp: 神羅の要塞都市　ジュノンだ

dialogue_en: That city they're headed to. Is that...?
dialogue_jp: あそこ　行くのかな

dialogue_en:
A woman who could turn you in...
and be a hundred grand richer for it.
dialogue_jp:
とりあえず　通報しようかね
当たりだったら　１０万ギルだ

dialogue_en: That depends on who's askin'.
dialogue_jp: だったら　どうする？

dialogue_en: Avalanche, huh?
dialogue_jp: アバランチ？

dialogue_en: What...?
dialogue_jp: なんだよ

dialogue_en:
My name is Rhonda.
I'm the mayor and sheriff round these parts.
dialogue_jp:
私はロドナー
村長兼　警備主任だ

dialogue_en: Welcome to Under Junon, our sunless oasis.
dialogue_jp:
日の当たらない村
アンダージュノンへようこそ

dialogue_en: One moment.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと待って

dialogue_en: Under Junon's further down, on the coast.
dialogue_jp: アンダージュノンなら海沿いを進め

dialogue_en: No civilians allowed.
dialogue_jp: 一般人は立ち入り禁止だ

dialogue_en: Any guys in black robes pass through?
dialogue_jp: 黒いマントを着た連中は来なかったか？

dialogue_en: There's a quiet little inn where everyone's welcome.
dialogue_jp: 閑古鳥が鳴いている　好きに過ごすといい

dialogue_en: But over there?
dialogue_jp: 宿は　あっち

dialogue_en: You don't like it? Leave.
dialogue_jp: 気に入らないなら　出ていきな

dialogue_en: Well, I don't think you would if you knew even half of what my town's been through.
dialogue_jp:
この村の歴史を知れば
そうじゃないってことがわかるさ

dialogue_en: Sorry, but I call bullshit.
dialogue_jp: 罠じゃねえだろうな

dialogue_en: Consider our lips sealed.
dialogue_jp: 通報はしないよ

dialogue_en:
Down here, though...
we know when to turn a blind eye.
dialogue_jp: でもね　見て見ぬフリは得意なんだ

dialogue_en: Half a million!?
dialogue_jp: えっ　すごい！

dialogue_en:
And Aerith to boot, huh?
That's another half a million on top.
dialogue_jp:
エアリスだね
あんたは　５０万ギル

dialogue_en: Well, you know what they say... Can't take it with ya.
dialogue_jp: 悪いけどよ　あきらめてくれ

dialogue_en: If they mean to continue west, there are only two ways off this continent: by sea or by air.
dialogue_jp:
この地方から離れるなら　私の知るかぎり
海に出るか　空を行くしかない

dialogue_en: That would depend on where they are headed.
dialogue_jp: 彼らの目的地が　どこであろうと

dialogue_en: Don't care what she said─there's gotta be black robes around here somewhere. So how we gonna find them?
dialogue_jp:
さて　どうする？
黒マントは来てないらしい

dialogue_en: Hey, you can trust me─cross my heart.
dialogue_jp: なに　私のことが信じられない？

dialogue_en: You'll be safe here. Relax.
dialogue_jp: 通報はしないから　安心して

dialogue_en: Behave yourselves now.
dialogue_jp: 騒ぎは起こさないでよ

dialogue_en:
You start anything─anything at all─
and there will be consequences.
dialogue_jp:
なにかやらかして　村を巻き込んだら
私が許さないよ

dialogue_en: Don't ask me what, but the company's got something big planned up there, and security is tight.
dialogue_jp:
上でなにかあるらしくて　警備が強化されてね
兵士たちもピリピリしてる

dialogue_en: And the same goes for the elevator as well.
dialogue_jp: エレベーターは　神羅関係者専用だ

dialogue_en: In case it isn't obvious, upstairs is Shinra turf.
dialogue_jp:
知ってるだろうけど
上は　神羅の要塞都市ジュノン

dialogue_en: No. Don't even think about it.
dialogue_jp: なにを　考えているんだい

dialogue_en: Now we're talkin'.
dialogue_jp: ほほほう！

dialogue_en: They made a beeline right for the elevator.
dialogue_jp: あのエレベーターで　上に行ったよ

dialogue_en: Well, well...
dialogue_jp: ほほう？

dialogue_en: Did see some black suits, though. Two guys and a girl. Looked pretty tough.
dialogue_jp:
黒いスーツなら来たけどさ
男ふたり　女ひとり

dialogue_en: Not that I saw.
dialogue_jp: 見てないねえ

dialogue_en: But ever since the offshore reactor came online, only things caught in the nets are monsters─and I ain't talkin' tuna.
dialogue_jp:
でも　海底に魔晄炉ができてからは
モンスターがわいて　からっきしなんだと

dialogue_en:
Waters here used to be teemin' with fish.
Practically jump into your boat, way people tell it.
dialogue_jp:
昔は　ちょっと沖へ出れば
大物がバンバン釣れたってよ

dialogue_en: Short of stealin' a boat and causin' a scene, both us and our black-robed friends are S.O.L.
dialogue_jp:
村の連中を巻き込まないって条件付きじゃあ
船を借りるのは　難しそうだ

dialogue_en: Shinra's saying it's only a "temporary prohibition"─but people gotta eat! Anyway...
dialogue_jp:
でも　上から漁を禁止する通達があったんだとよ
期間は未定

dialogue_en:
Some fishin' village this is.
Ain't even allowed to take a rowboat out...
dialogue_jp:
ここは漁村だ
だから当然　船はある

dialogue_en: to stand as a warning to any who might dare to oppose them. Or so I was taught.
dialogue_jp:
それはまるで　共和国の墓標……
そんな話を聞いたことがある

dialogue_en: In its place, the company built a new, unsinkable city of steel...
dialogue_jp:
その海を見おろす陸地に神羅が作ったのは
沈まぬ　鋼鉄の都市

dialogue_en: Now, that once-proud metropolis is mere flotsam─courtesy of Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
栄華を極めた海上都市も
神羅の攻撃を受けて　海の底

dialogue_en: A floating city built atop a fleet of interconnected ships.
dialogue_jp:
巨大な船を　いくつも繋ぎ合わせた
海上都市だったそうだ

dialogue_en: Many years ago, this stretch of ocean was home to the Republic of Junon's capital.
dialogue_jp:
昔　このあたりの海に
ジュノン共和国の首都があった

dialogue_en: Sounds good. And remember: low profile.
dialogue_jp: それでいい　行こうか

dialogue_en: How about we meet at the inn when we're done?
dialogue_jp: 終わったら　お宿に集合？

dialogue_en: or got boats for rent or something.
dialogue_jp: 見失った黒マントの行方も気になる

dialogue_en:
Locals will know routes not on the map.
May've even seen stragglers pass through...
dialogue_jp:
ここで　船が手に入るかどうか
ほかの移動ルートのこと

dialogue_en: Might wanna ask around town, then.
dialogue_jp: 手分けして　情報を集めよう

dialogue_en: Right.
dialogue_jp: そうだな

dialogue_en: This way─down here!
dialogue_jp: こっちだよ　急いで！

dialogue_en:
We gotta go─now!
There's a monster attacking the boat!
dialogue_jp:
はやく　こっち
ボートが漂流してるの！

dialogue_en: That was Priscilla─and from the sound of it, she needs a tough guy like you to lend a hand.
dialogue_jp:
いまの声は　プリシラという村の子です
行って　力になってやってくれませんか！

dialogue_en: That sword─you're some kind of fighter, aren't you?
dialogue_jp:
お客さま
その背中の剣を見込んで　お願いです

dialogue_en: Anybody! Please!
dialogue_jp: 大変　だれか！

dialogue_en: Guh!?
dialogue_jp: えっ？

dialogue_en: Help! Somebody, please─help!
dialogue_jp: だれかー　助けて　大変なの！

dialogue_en: Room for one?
dialogue_jp: おひとりさまですか？

dialogue_en: Hello there.
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃいませ

dialogue_en: She wasn't kidding when she said it was well guarded. Got any other ideas?
dialogue_jp:
がっちり警備されてるね
近づかないほうがよさそう

dialogue_en: Elevator's our only way up, but Rhonda won't thank us if we storm it.
dialogue_jp:
上の街へ行くには
あのエレベーターを使うしかないみたい

dialogue_en:
But not me. I like it this way.
Though I'd never tell them that, of course.
dialogue_jp:
だからね　居心地いいって思ったら
申し訳ない気しちゃって

dialogue_en: The people here, they hate the lack of sunlight.
dialogue_jp: 日が当たらないこと　村のひと　怒ってた

dialogue_en: Wonder what.
dialogue_jp: なんだろうね

dialogue_en: Word around town is Shinra's holding some kinda big event up top.
dialogue_jp:
上の街で
神羅の大きなイベント　あるんだって

dialogue_en:
Shinra just couldn't help 'emselves...
Had to go and poison the sea too.
dialogue_jp: 神羅め　海も壊しちまった

dialogue_en: Yuffie! Grab his fin and hold on tight!
dialogue_jp: ユフィ　イルカさんにつかまって！

dialogue_en: Go away! I taste terrible!
dialogue_jp: アタシは　おいしくないよぉ～！

dialogue_en: Somebody! Anybody! Help!
dialogue_jp: だれか～　助けて～！

dialogue_en: Help!
dialogue_jp: 助けて～！

dialogue_en: Quickly! Please!
dialogue_jp: お願い　早く！

dialogue_en: Assuming we all live long enough, there's a chance we may meet again someday.
dialogue_jp:
お互い　生きていれば
いずれまた会うこともあるだろう

dialogue_en: I might just strap you to the back of a dragon.
dialogue_jp: まとめて　ドラゴンの背にくくりつけるぞ

dialogue_en: No...but you best leave before I change my mind. Otherwise...
dialogue_jp:
気が変わらぬうちに　立ち去るがいい
さもないと──

dialogue_en: So you're not gonna tell them about us?
dialogue_jp: 見逃して……くれるの？

dialogue_en: I need to report today's events─how the Seventh Infantry resolved the crisis─on its own.
dialogue_jp:
戦果など　すべて我が隊の功績として報告するが
異論はなかろうな？

dialogue_en: At ease. We're heading home.
dialogue_jp: 我々は　これから社に帰投する

dialogue_en: Suspected terrorists, a Wutaian ninja, an escaped lab rat, and an Ancient.
dialogue_jp:
大事件の容疑者たち　ウータイのシノビ
逃げ出した実験動物と古代種か

dialogue_en: One who keeps such unusual company at that...
dialogue_jp: 連れも　なかなか面白いメンツのようだ

dialogue_en: I must say, in all my wildest dreams, I never thought I'd have a SOLDIER in my ranks.
dialogue_jp:
それにしても　私の部下が
『魔晄の目』を持っていたとはな

dialogue_en: You did good out there today.
dialogue_jp: あらためて　礼を言う

dialogue_en: I have to admit, I was worried the situation might've gotten completely out of hand, but you managed to bring it under control.
dialogue_jp:
一時はどうなることかと思ったが
貴様らのおかげで　事態を収拾することができた

dialogue_en: Such scum deserve nothing less than to be trapped in a room full of tonberries...
dialogue_jp:
それが事実なら
ベヒーモスの下敷きにしてやる

dialogue_en: I've no doubt these extremists sicced that monster on the city.
dialogue_jp: モンスターの脱走も　連中の仕業に違いない

dialogue_en: Some see civilian casualties as acceptable collateral damage─or our fault.
dialogue_jp:
市民の被害などおかまいなしの危険分子も
少なからず　存在するようだ

dialogue_en: While united by their desire to take down Shinra, the "how" and "why" of it varies considerably between factions.
dialogue_jp:
神羅打倒の目的こそ共通しているのだろうが
目指す理想や活動方針は　バラバラだろう

dialogue_en: They may operate as independent cells, but it seems they communicate regularly.
dialogue_jp:
各地に散らばる反神羅の連中が
ひそかに繋がっていたようだ

dialogue_en: There's plenty of troopers. They just didn't wanna help 'cause they heard we were "fraternizing with the enemy"!
dialogue_jp:
俺たちは　反神羅の連中と繋がりがあるって
そんな噂が流れてるんです

dialogue_en: That's bullshit!
dialogue_jp: いやがらせですよ　きっと

dialogue_en: But our calls went unanswered... There just aren't enough troopers to go around.
dialogue_jp:
しかし　人手が足りないとのことで
なかなか対応してもらえなかったのです

dialogue_en: After we parted ways with you, we hurried back to Junon and called for additional reinforcements.
dialogue_jp:
隊長と別れた後　我々は急ぎジュノンに戻り
あらためて応援を要請しました

dialogue_en: it was too tough to take on.
dialogue_jp: なにしろ　強くて

dialogue_en: While we succeeded in locating the target and keeping it contained within an isolated area...
dialogue_jp:
首尾よくモンスターを見つけて
規制線内に追い込んだまでは良かったのですが

dialogue_en: Our orders were to neutralize the fleeing fiend, and ensure the safety of the local populace.
dialogue_jp:
我々の任務は　逃走したモンスターの討伐と
市民の安全の確保です

dialogue_en: Nope, not at all.
dialogue_jp: いや　知らない

dialogue_en: On it.
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: Get its attention.
dialogue_jp: ヤツを引きつける

dialogue_en: Barret, focus!
dialogue_jp: バレット　助けよう

dialogue_en: Say what!?
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: Hey, Shinra's most wanted! Get rid of that thing!
dialogue_jp:
あのモンスターも吹っ飛ばしてよ
魔晄炉みたいにさ！

dialogue_en: Nice work.
dialogue_jp: よくやった

dialogue_en: Oh no you don't!
dialogue_jp: 逃げるつもりか

dialogue_en: What now!?
dialogue_jp: なに？

dialogue_en: C'mon!
dialogue_jp: 来い！

dialogue_en: You're familiar with their operations?
dialogue_jp: 連絡会のことは　知っているな？

dialogue_en: Our investigations are ongoing, but we suspect the Shinra Resistance Committee was involved.
dialogue_jp:
事故に関しては　現在調査中だが
反神羅連絡会が関与している疑いがある

dialogue_en: They were keeping it in that underwater facility of theirs, but it managed to escape during a recent...incident.
dialogue_jp:
海底の施設で管理していたのだが
一昨日　施設の事故に紛れて逃げ出してしまった

dialogue_en: That little hellion back there was a bioweapon developed by R&D with the cooperation of Advanced Weaponry.
dialogue_jp:
先のモンスターは　科学部門と兵器開発部門が
共同で生み出した人工モンスター

dialogue_en: Anything else?
dialogue_jp: ほかに質問は？

dialogue_en: The brass ordered us to remain behind, following the ceremony.
dialogue_jp:
パレード以来　帰っていない
上の命令だ

dialogue_en: Normally I wouldn't answer that sort of question, but...why not.
dialogue_jp: 本来ならば答える義理はないが　協力の礼だ

dialogue_en: What's the Seventh Infantry still doing out here? I figured you guys would've been shipped back to Midgar by now.
dialogue_jp:
なぜ　まだジュノンに？
第七歩兵連隊の所属は　ミッドガルのはずだ

dialogue_en: Something on your mind, trooper? Very well. Permission to speak granted.
dialogue_jp:
なにか聞きたいようだな
いいだろう　質問してみろ

dialogue_en: Excellent work out there.
dialogue_jp: 協力　感謝する

dialogue_en: I'm told that the target's been neutralized.
dialogue_jp: 無事　討伐に成功したようだな

dialogue_en: We'll link back up with you once we finish our report. Till then, Captain!
dialogue_jp:
報告が終わり次第　我々も合流します
ご武運を！

dialogue_en:
and it'll rip your heads clean off.
So make sure you beat it to the punch.
dialogue_jp:
私が手を下すまでもなく
貴様は　ヤツのエサだ

dialogue_en: Give it the chance...
dialogue_jp: さもなくば──

dialogue_en: That thing's vicious.
dialogue_jp: 必ず仕留めろ

dialogue_en: We'll return to Junon. The garrison needs to be informed about the situation.
dialogue_jp:
我々は状況報告のため
いちど　ジュノンに戻らねばならん

dialogue_en: Good.
dialogue_jp: 頼む

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: You're on it?
dialogue_jp: 行ってくれるな？

dialogue_en: Bet a chocobo could track its scent.
dialogue_jp: チョコボの嗅覚ならば追えるな

dialogue_en:
If we don't find and stop that fiend,
it could kill countless civilians!
dialogue_jp:
急ぎ追跡せねば
周辺住民に被害が出かねません

dialogue_en: Well, that's not good.
dialogue_jp: まずいことになったな

dialogue_en: Sir!
dialogue_jp: 隊員

dialogue_en: You're on chest compressions.
dialogue_jp: 胸のほうを頼んだよ

dialogue_en: Don't just stand there! Help me!
dialogue_jp: ちょっとあんた　手伝って！

dialogue_en: Hey, we need help over here!
dialogue_jp: おい　誰か手伝ってくれ

dialogue_en: I don't think she's breathing.
dialogue_jp: 呼吸してないみたい

dialogue_en: C'mon.
dialogue_jp: 戻ろう

dialogue_en: Let's check on that girl.
dialogue_jp: さっきの女の子！

dialogue_en: You picked the wrong girl, creep!
dialogue_jp: なにするんだ　ゴラ～！

dialogue_en: Shih, shih, hah!
dialogue_jp: シュシュシュ！

dialogue_en: Now. Start!
dialogue_jp: はい　圧迫！

dialogue_en: Got it.
dialogue_jp: わかった

dialogue_en: Sir!
dialogue_jp: 隊員

dialogue_en: Sir!
dialogue_jp: ハッ！

dialogue_en: Fall back─now!
dialogue_jp: おまえたちは　さがっていろ！

dialogue_en: You...!
dialogue_jp: 貴様は……！

dialogue_en: We won't get a better chance to eliminate that fiend. Let's strike while we can!
dialogue_jp:
モンスターはこの先です
さっそく　討伐に向かいましょう

dialogue_en: Alright, Captain. Follow us!
dialogue_jp: こちらです　隊長！

dialogue_en: Of course─wouldn't wanna charge in unprepared. Whenever you're ready, we'll be right here waiting!
dialogue_jp:
色々と準備がおありなのですね
我々は　ここでお待ちしております！

dialogue_en: Suppose we oughta lend 'em a hand, huh?
dialogue_jp: お手伝い　する？

dialogue_en: Now's the perfect time to take the thing out!
dialogue_jp: さっそく　討伐へ向かいましょう

dialogue_en:
The target seems to have settled down,
but there's no telling when it'll act up again.
dialogue_jp:
いまはおとなしくしていますが
いつまた暴れ出すか　わかりません

dialogue_en: So we were awaiting reinforcements, and imagine our surprise when you showed up!
dialogue_jp:
援軍の到着を待っていたのですが
まさか　隊長が来てくださるとは！

dialogue_en: But said fiend proved more formidable than expected...
dialogue_jp: ですが　相手が思いのほか手強く……

dialogue_en: We managed to contain a dangerous fiend in the sector up ahead.
dialogue_jp:
凶暴なモンスターを
この先のエリアへ追い詰めたところです

dialogue_en: Sir!
dialogue_jp: ハッ！

dialogue_en: Sitrep?
dialogue_jp: 状況は？

dialogue_en: Something like that.
dialogue_jp: ああ　まあな

dialogue_en:
It's good to see you again, Captain!
You here to offer support?
dialogue_jp:
お久しぶりです　隊長
応援に来てくださったんですか

dialogue_en: Seventh Infantry, right?
dialogue_jp: 第七歩兵連隊

dialogue_en: Captain? Oh wow, it's really you!
dialogue_jp: 隊長　隊長ですよね！

dialogue_en: The end! Good job, Mr. Dolphin!
dialogue_jp: ショータイムおわり～　おつかれさま

dialogue_en: Let's call it there. Nice work!
dialogue_jp: もうおしまい　またやろうね！

dialogue_en: That was great, Mr. Dolphin! Good job!
dialogue_jp: おつかれさま～　よくがんばったね

dialogue_en: Let's try again, shall we?
dialogue_jp: じゃ　復習しよう

dialogue_en: Let's give it another go!
dialogue_jp: うん　もういちどやろう

dialogue_en: Yeah. Alright.
dialogue_jp: うん　そうする

dialogue_en:
Okay, Yuffie, let's get you inside.
You've had a rough day.
dialogue_jp:
さあ　ユフィ
とりあえず　部屋でゆっくり休みな

dialogue_en: Ugh, nice goin', Yuffie. Call the guy a creep why don'tcha, ya big moron!
dialogue_jp:
ごっめ～ん　助けてくれたのに
アタシってば　バカバカ！

dialogue_en: He was?
dialogue_jp: そうなんだ

dialogue_en:
Easy; they're guests of mine.
And this one was trying to save your life.
dialogue_jp:
この人たちは　私の客さ
あんたを助けてくれたんだよ

dialogue_en: They used to be with Avalanche, but left after a "policy dispute."
dialogue_jp:
方針の違いでもめて
アバランチを飛び出したの

dialogue_en: Splinter cell?
dialogue_jp: 分派って？

dialogue_en: Those guys there are from the splinter cell.
dialogue_jp: あれ　分派の連中

dialogue_en:
I just gotta say I'm a big─huge─fan of yours!
HQ wishes they could be as cool as you guys!
dialogue_jp:
アタシ　すっごく尊敬してるの
本家より　ずっとずっと！

dialogue_en: Now how the hell did you─
dialogue_jp: おまえ　なんで知って――

dialogue_en: Hey, you guys're that Avalanche splinter cell, right?
dialogue_jp: オネーさんたち　アバランチの分派だよね？

dialogue_en: Oh, and Mr. Dolphin says thanks too.
dialogue_jp: イルカさんも　ありがとう～だって！

dialogue_en:
My name's Priscilla, by the way.
Nice to meet you!
dialogue_jp: わたしはプリシラ　よろしくね

dialogue_en:
Thanks so much, you guys.
Those were some fancy moves!
dialogue_jp:
ありがとう　お兄さんたち
カッコよかった～！

dialogue_en:
Thanks again.
She would've been in deep shit without you.
dialogue_jp:
助かったよ
村を代表して　礼を言うよ

dialogue_en: Monsters like that one've been cropping up more and more lately. Goddamn reactor's to blame...
dialogue_jp:
ああいうモンスターが　年々増えててね
それもこれも　魔晄炉のせいさ

dialogue_en: Another one of my "guests." I seem to get a lot of them when the world's on fire.
dialogue_jp:
あの子も客さ
世の中がざわつくと　客が増えるね

dialogue_en: Who was that?
dialogue_jp: あれは？

dialogue_en: Now, now...
dialogue_jp: まあまあ

dialogue_en: Not to be that guy, but kids these days, I swear...
dialogue_jp: 言いたかないが　イマドキの若い娘はよお

dialogue_en: You're welcome! Psh...
dialogue_jp: ありがっとね～って　なんだよ！

dialogue_en: Thank you very much!
dialogue_jp: ありがっとね～！

dialogue_en: Thank you so much.
dialogue_jp: ありがとうございます

dialogue_en:
Hey, if it isn't the heroes of the hour.
I heard about what ya did for that girl.
dialogue_jp:
お客さん　聞きましたよ
海で大活躍だったとか

dialogue_en: C'mon, let's get ourselves some rooms.
dialogue_jp: とりあえず　宿に行こうぜ

dialogue_en: Maybe she wants your autograph.
dialogue_jp: うれしそうだったけど？

dialogue_en:
But, hey, she's just a kid.
What's the harm in hearin' her out?
dialogue_jp: まあ　まだガキだ　適当にあしらうさ

dialogue_en: I know, I know─she laid it on pretty thick...
dialogue_jp: いるんだよな　尊敬詐欺が
ティファ

dialogue_en: Later!
dialogue_jp: ユフィ

dialogue_en: Sweet! You won't be sorry, promise!
dialogue_jp:
りょ～かい
そんじゃ　またね！

dialogue_en: I suppose...you could...come by the inn tomorrow?
dialogue_jp: じゃあ……明日　宿に来い

dialogue_en: And gotta thank you for before!
dialogue_jp: お礼もしなくちゃ　ね　ね！

dialogue_en:
Think we could sit down for a chat later?
Got a teensy favor to ask.
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　あとで会える？
頼みがあるんだ

dialogue_en: Well, uh, we are pretty cool, but...
dialogue_jp: よくわかってんじゃねえか

dialogue_en: Be honest.
dialogue_jp: なんだと思う

dialogue_en:
Hey, so about that Yuffie kid.
What do you think she wants with us?
dialogue_jp:
さっき助けた　ユフィって娘
頼みがあるって言ってたけどよ

dialogue_en: It's open.
dialogue_jp: あいてるぜ

dialogue_en: Gosh, when was the last time that happened?
dialogue_jp: こんなに部屋が埋まったのは久しぶりですよ

dialogue_en: It's nice to have the place booked up again for once.
dialogue_jp:
せまい部屋ですが
ゆっくりしていってください

dialogue_en:
Don't know about you,
but I'm dyin' to put my feet up.
dialogue_jp: んじゃまあ　今日はゆっくり休むか

dialogue_en:
Oh, everything is comped, so if you
need anything at all, just ask.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　お代は構いません
プリシラを助けてもらった　お礼です

dialogue_en: Five it is.
dialogue_jp: 承知しました

dialogue_en: Uh, could you make it five?
dialogue_jp: ５部屋で　お願いします

dialogue_en: Yuh!
dialogue_jp: ひいっ！

dialogue_en:
Now then, how many we got...
Will four rooms be enough?
dialogue_jp: ええと　４部屋でいいですか？

dialogue_en:
Your stay is on us, we insist.
It's the least we can do for you, really.
dialogue_jp:
ロドナーから聞いてます
しっかりと　おもてなしするようにって

dialogue_en: Okay, one more time!
dialogue_jp: は～い　もう１回ね

dialogue_en: What a good boy!
dialogue_jp: えらいえらい！

dialogue_en: That was great!
dialogue_jp: がんばったね

dialogue_en: Well done!
dialogue_jp: よーしよーし

dialogue_en: Ya think you can do it?
dialogue_jp: できるかな～？

dialogue_en: Okay, your turn!
dialogue_jp: はい　やってみよう！

dialogue_en: And go!
dialogue_jp: よ～し　はいっ！

dialogue_en: It's time to learn a new trick!
dialogue_jp: イルカに　ワザを教えるよ

dialogue_en: Let's do this, Mr. Dolphin!
dialogue_jp: イルカのショータイムで～す

dialogue_en: Ready? It's showtime!
dialogue_jp: ショータイムはじめるよ～！

dialogue_en: Over here!
dialogue_jp: こっち　こっち！

dialogue_en: Mr. Dolphin!
dialogue_jp: イルカさーん

dialogue_en: Ahahaha!
dialogue_jp: あははは！

dialogue_en: You better come back soon, okay?
dialogue_jp: お兄さん　また来てね

dialogue_en: Bye-bye!
dialogue_jp: キュイ　キュイ！

dialogue_en: Me and Mr. Dolphin are gonna be buds!
dialogue_jp: オレも　イルカと仲良くするよ

dialogue_en: I could feel them slipping away, one by one. And the tighter I held on, the more I lost.
dialogue_jp:
待って　やめてって思ったけど
どうしようもなかった

dialogue_en: Rest up while you can. I'll let you know if anythin' happens.
dialogue_jp:
なんかあったら知らせるから
おまえは休んどけ

dialogue_en: Shinra didn't waste any time gettin' our names and faces out here, did they?
dialogue_jp: しかし　ここまで手配書が回ってるとはな

dialogue_en:
Little punk, blowin' smoke up our asses.
Oughta give her a piece of my mind.
dialogue_jp:
まさしく　尊敬詐欺ってワケか
説教でもしてやんねえとな

dialogue_en: Y'know, you might be right about that.
dialogue_jp: うーん　その可能性もあるな

dialogue_en: Could be that she's after those Shinra bounties.
dialogue_jp: 神羅に通報するつもりかもな

dialogue_en: I'll break it to her gentle.
dialogue_jp: 適当にあしらうしかねえか

dialogue_en: Don't have the time─or patience─to babysit.
dialogue_jp: いまはガキのお守りをしてる場合じゃねえからな

dialogue_en: Normally, I wouldn't turn anyone away, but she's just too young.
dialogue_jp: 来るものは拒まずと言いたいところだが

dialogue_en: Maybe she wants to join Avalanche.
dialogue_jp: アバランチに入りたいのかもな

dialogue_en: Let me prove it to ya.
dialogue_jp: おまえにもサインしてやろうか？

dialogue_en:
Always knew this day'd come.
Good thing my signature's a work of art.
dialogue_jp:
こんなこともあろうかと
練習しておいてよかったぜ

dialogue_en: Ah, the burden of fame!
dialogue_jp: ははーん　人気者はつらいぜ

dialogue_en: Like Tifa said: your autograph.
dialogue_jp: あんたのサインが欲しいのかもな

dialogue_en:
Well, hope the rest of your patrol is
just as uneventful.
dialogue_jp: 疲れたでしょ　ゆっくり休んでね

dialogue_en: Nope! All clear here, officer.
dialogue_jp: 見まわり　ごくろうさま

dialogue_en: Red. Thought it was someone else.
dialogue_jp:
レッドか……
それなら　いいんだ

dialogue_en: Oh.
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: Who's in there with you?
dialogue_jp: だれか　いるのか？

dialogue_en: Cloud.
dialogue_jp: クラウド！

dialogue_en: Speaking of, you seen them lately?
dialogue_jp: あれから　見ないね

dialogue_en: Damn Whispers!
dialogue_jp: フィーラーめ！

dialogue_en: ...Only that something is. Like, it's on the tip of my tongue, but...I just can't remember.
dialogue_jp:
でも　なにがなくなったのかわからない
モヤモヤ～って……

dialogue_en:
And the worst part is that
I don't even know what's missing.
dialogue_jp: なくなってることだけ　わかるんだよね

dialogue_en: I know. I felt the same. It was like they were sucking them straight outta my head.
dialogue_jp:
うん　そんな感じだった
むりやり取られちゃったよ

dialogue_en: Hey, I mean...ya never know.
dialogue_jp: さあ　どうだったかな

dialogue_en: I saw it, you know, in a vase at Seventh Heaven. And I seriously doubt you're the one who put it there.
dialogue_jp:
あの花　セブンスヘブンに飾ってくれたよね
飾ったの　ティファだと思うけど

dialogue_en: It's called a gift, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: プレゼントしたんです

dialogue_en: You shoved a flower in my face.
dialogue_jp: 花を押しつけられた

dialogue_en: So, a little random, but do you remember the first time we met?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　はじめて会ったときのこと
覚えてる？

dialogue_en: Mm.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: No time for that. Not with Sephiroth around.
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　追いかけないと

dialogue_en: Homesick?
dialogue_jp: 帰りたいか？

dialogue_en: I wonder how Mom and Marlene are holding up.
dialogue_jp: お母さんとマリン　元気かな

dialogue_en: I dunno about you, but it feels like we've been on the road forever─like Midgar's ancient history.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルから出て　そんなに経ってないのに
すごく遠くに来た気がする

dialogue_en: Come in!
dialogue_jp: どうぞ～

dialogue_en: Perfect timing. I was just about to come find you.
dialogue_jp:
ちょうどよかった
いま　部屋に行こうと思ってたの

dialogue_en: Oh! Hey.
dialogue_jp: あっ　クラウド

dialogue_en: Gotta wonder what Shinra's planning up there...
dialogue_jp: 上のイベントって　なんだろう

dialogue_en:
Where d'you think those guys in black went?
We should've seen 'em by now.
dialogue_jp: 黒マントの人たち　どこへ行ったのかな

dialogue_en: Ah...you and your winning sense of humor.
dialogue_jp:
もう……
まあ　クラウドらしいけど

dialogue_en: Hmm, does ring a bell.
dialogue_jp: ああ　そうか

dialogue_en: You're kidding. The yellow flower? Sector 8?
dialogue_jp:
うそ～！
ほら　お花　あげたでしょ

dialogue_en: Nope.
dialogue_jp: 覚えてない

dialogue_en: That was fun, wasn't it? Hopping from roof to roof together like that.
dialogue_jp:
いっしょに　屋根のうえ歩いたの
楽しかったね

dialogue_en: Oh yeah. Right.
dialogue_jp: ああ　そうか

dialogue_en: Oh, so close. That was the second time.
dialogue_jp: ブブー　それは２回目

dialogue_en: The church, right?
dialogue_jp: 教会だったか

dialogue_en: Water under the bridge. But next time.
dialogue_jp: 今後の参考に覚えといて

dialogue_en: Noted.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en:
Some advice: never regift a present from a girl.
Especially if you're just gonna give it to another one.
dialogue_jp:
女の子からもらったものを
ほかの子にあげるなんて　どうかと思うな～

dialogue_en: His family owned the general store.
dialogue_jp: ほら　家がよろず屋の

dialogue_en: Huh? Oh... Okay then.
dialogue_jp: えっ　あ……うん

dialogue_en: Only person from the village I remember is you.
dialogue_jp: ティファ以外のヤツは覚えてない

dialogue_en:
Say, do you remember a guy named Emilio?
From Nibelheim?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　エミリオ……覚えてる？
ニブルヘイムの

dialogue_en: It's fine. I never should've doubted you either.
dialogue_jp: ううん　お互いさまだよね

dialogue_en: I shoulda never doubted you.
dialogue_jp: うたがって　悪かった

dialogue_en: Come in.
dialogue_jp: どうぞ

dialogue_en: Oh.
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: Regret what I said in Kalm.
dialogue_jp: カームのことを　あやまりたい

dialogue_en: You...?
dialogue_jp: うん？

dialogue_en: Yeah, I...
dialogue_jp: 俺も……

dialogue_en: You should put on another show for us sometime!
dialogue_jp: また見せてよ　お兄さんのショー！

dialogue_en: You ready to put on another show for us?
dialogue_jp: イルカショー　かっこよく決めてね

dialogue_en: Everyone's waiting for an encore!
dialogue_jp: イルカショー　みんな待ってるよ

dialogue_en: Oh, hey there!
dialogue_jp: あっ　お兄さん！

dialogue_en: Sure.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: You better come back and put on another show sometime, okay?
dialogue_jp:
またイルカさんのショー　見せてね
約束！

dialogue_en: Thanks a bunch, Mister.
dialogue_jp: ありがとう　お兄さん

dialogue_en: Hey, hey! You can't leave without paying!
dialogue_jp: こら～　待て待てーい！

dialogue_en: Ugh, what a rip-off!
dialogue_jp: ぼったくり～！

dialogue_en: What? But I don't have any!
dialogue_jp: ええ～　持ってないよお

dialogue_en: We hope you enjoyed the show─but even if you didn't, you still gotta pay! That'll be one orb apiece, kiddos. Pony up!
dialogue_jp:
とゆーわけで～　イルカショーのお代は
ひとりにつき　マテリア１個でよろしくね！

dialogue_en: Sih, sih, sih, sih, hah!
dialogue_jp: シュシュシュシュシュ！

dialogue_en:
Not really...
But I'm happy to listen, so go ahead.
dialogue_jp: まあな　でも話したいなら聞く

dialogue_en: You're...not interested, are you?
dialogue_jp: 興味ないよね

dialogue_en: Yeah, and what's more, the woman who walked in with him was stunning─like, she could've been a model, and...
dialogue_jp:
それでね　そのとき女の子といっしょで
その子がとっても美人で……

dialogue_en: Really?
dialogue_jp: そうか

dialogue_en: I couldn't believe my eyes. He was all...grown up. Didn't even recognize him at first.
dialogue_jp:
スラムには　めったに来ないって言ってた
ちょっと感じ　変わってたかな

dialogue_en:
Thought I'd never see him again, then one day
last year, he shows up at Seventh Heaven.
dialogue_jp:
それから　ずっと会ってなかったんだけど
去年　セブンスヘブンに来たの

dialogue_en: Anyway, he left the village right before you did.
dialogue_jp:
エミリオは　クラウドのすこし前に
村を出たんだよね

dialogue_en: Right.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en:
Oh. Well, his family ran the general store.
Was about our age.
dialogue_jp:
そっか……
ほら　よろず屋の息子の

dialogue_en: ...Sorry.
dialogue_jp: 覚えてない

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: The general store kid?
dialogue_jp: よろず屋の息子だ

dialogue_en: Right.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: You oughta get some sleep too.
dialogue_jp: クラウドも部屋で休んで

dialogue_en: Think I'll turn in early tonight.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと疲れたみたい

dialogue_en: Night.
dialogue_jp: おやすみ

dialogue_en: With my iron stomach?
dialogue_jp: 腹筋なら負けない

dialogue_en: Just be ready to spill your guts, huh!?
dialogue_jp: 次は　腹割って話そうぜ

dialogue_en:
We'll find time to talk, just the two of us.
Figure things out.
dialogue_jp:
今度　ちゃんと話そう
答え合わせだ

dialogue_en: It's fine.
dialogue_jp: いいんだ

dialogue_en:
Why deny it? I guess it was, huh?
...I'm sorry.
dialogue_jp: 結局そうなるかな　ごめん

dialogue_en: No, it wasn't. I...
dialogue_jp: そういうわけじゃないけど

dialogue_en: Was this another test?
dialogue_jp: また　俺を試したのか？

dialogue_en: It's okay. Forget it.
dialogue_jp: ううん　もういい

dialogue_en: My poor nose...
dialogue_jp: 鼻がムズムズする

dialogue_en: Hmph. I'll leave it all to you then.
dialogue_jp: フン　それでは私は眠らせてもらおう

dialogue_en: Don't worry, never thought you could.
dialogue_jp: 最初から　あてにしていない

dialogue_en: It feels like I have fish bones in my nose.
dialogue_jp: 鼻がムズムズして　気持ちが悪い

dialogue_en: We'll manage.
dialogue_jp: 気にするな

dialogue_en:
Thankfully, my ears are unaffected.
I'll let you know if I hear anything unusual.
dialogue_jp:
鼻は駄目でも　耳は生きている
怪しい音がしたら知らせる

dialogue_en: Huh. Not good.
dialogue_jp: それは痛手だな

dialogue_en: Should Shinra come calling, I doubt I'll smell them till it's too late.
dialogue_jp:
ニオイがまぎれて　神羅が来ても
気がつかないかもしれない

dialogue_en: This town reeks of fish and brine.
dialogue_jp: この街は　潮のかおりが強すぎる

dialogue_en: Yes?
dialogue_jp: どうぞ

dialogue_en: Maybe.
dialogue_jp: そうだな

dialogue_en: We give Shinra and Sephiroth what's comin' to 'em, and then it's happily ever after.
dialogue_jp:
神羅とかセフィロスとか　そういうの
さっさと倒しちゃわなきゃね

dialogue_en: Y'know, all we really need is a couple of super-duper-powerful orbs.
dialogue_jp:
マテリア　すんご～っく強いの
ババーッとかき集めてさ

dialogue_en: I know, right? It was the best show ever!
dialogue_jp:
オレもオレも
すげ～　かっこよかった！

dialogue_en: That was so cool!
dialogue_jp: わたし　感動しちゃった

dialogue_en: That was amazing! You and Mr. Dolphin made a great team out there!
dialogue_jp:
すごいすごい！
イルカさんもお兄さんも　息ピッタリ

dialogue_en: I kinda wanna be a dolphin trainer too!
dialogue_jp: オレ　なんかやる気出てきたかも

dialogue_en: Yeah, neither did I!
dialogue_jp: びっくりしたけど　すごい！

dialogue_en: I didn't know Mr. Dolphin could do that!
dialogue_jp: イルカさん　こんなこともできるんだ

dialogue_en: It's funny how much you sucked!
dialogue_jp: 失敗ばっかで　笑えたし

dialogue_en: I had a fun time watching, though.
dialogue_jp: でも　楽しかったかも

dialogue_en: Gotta say, I was pretty worried for a sec.
dialogue_jp: もう　ハラハラした～

dialogue_en: Try a little harder next time.
dialogue_jp: 次は　もっとがんばってね

dialogue_en: That was rough.
dialogue_jp: ダメじゃん

dialogue_en: Hey!
dialogue_jp: おい

dialogue_en: Come on in, guys!
dialogue_jp: みんな　入って！

dialogue_en: Ahaha!
dialogue_jp: アハハハハ……

dialogue_en: Aw, c'mon!
dialogue_jp: ええ～……

dialogue_en: Boo!
dialogue_jp: ぶう～！

dialogue_en: Dang it!
dialogue_jp: 残念！

dialogue_en: Aw, man...
dialogue_jp: あ～あ……

dialogue_en: Shake it off!
dialogue_jp: がんばって！

dialogue_en: Uh...
dialogue_jp: あれっ？

dialogue_en: Next time!
dialogue_jp: もうちょっと！

dialogue_en: So close!
dialogue_jp: おしいっ！

dialogue_en: Good try!
dialogue_jp: う～ん……

dialogue_en: Nailed it!
dialogue_jp: バッチリ！

dialogue_en: Awesome!
dialogue_jp: かっこい～！

dialogue_en: You're amazing!
dialogue_jp: すごいすごい！

dialogue_en: HQ? They just didn't understand─but you guys get it!
dialogue_jp:
アタシさ　手を組むなら
本家より分派だと思ってたんだよね

dialogue_en: long story short─I want you to join me.
dialogue_jp: どう　アタシと手を組まない？

dialogue_en:
Yup! Which brings me to that little favor
I mentioned yesterday:
dialogue_jp: それで　頼みっていうのはほかでもない

dialogue_en: Wutai?
dialogue_jp: ウータイ？

dialogue_en: Sih, sih, hah!
dialogue_jp: シュシュシュシュ！

dialogue_en: and prove that Wutai's not to be trifled with!
dialogue_jp: シノビの末裔なのであーる

dialogue_en: I left my beloved homeland behind to bring an end to Shinra's reign of terror...
dialogue_jp:
邪智暴虐の神羅カンパニーと戦うために
はるか　遠方よりやってきた

dialogue_en: My name is Yuffie, materia hunter and elite ninja operative for the interim Wutai government.
dialogue_jp:
アタシは　ウータイ暫定政府の精鋭部隊
マテリアハンターのユフィ！

dialogue_en: it's time you got to know me.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　まずは自己ショーカイ

dialogue_en: Okay! Now that the gang's all here...
dialogue_jp: よ～し　これでみんなそろったね

dialogue_en: And guess who the target is!
dialogue_jp: そのターゲットが！

dialogue_en:
She offered me the gig of a lifetime...
an assassination!
dialogue_jp: 暗殺の仕事があるっていうんだよね

dialogue_en:
Until, that is, I came here─and lucky I did,
because I met Rhonda.
dialogue_jp:
んで　ここで稼げないかな～と探ってたら
ロドナー村長

dialogue_en: so I've been moving from town to town, hustlin'─scrapin' together enough scratch to keep stickin' it to the man.
dialogue_jp:
ケナゲにも　活動資金を自分で稼ぎながら
反神羅活動を続けてるわけ

dialogue_en: Traveling alone so far from home is expensive...
dialogue_jp:
故郷ウータイから
遠く離れたユフィちゃんは

dialogue_en: C'mere!
dialogue_jp: ユフィ

dialogue_en: Although...that is something we do.
dialogue_jp: でも　今回はアタリかも

dialogue_en: I resent that!
dialogue_jp: へんけ～ん！

dialogue_en:
I mean, we've done some shit,
but we ain't about to stoop that low.
dialogue_jp:
オレたちがやってるのは
そういうことじゃねえんだよな

dialogue_en:
Don't ninjas creep around in the dark,
slittin' people's throats?
dialogue_jp: 忍者の仕事といやあ　スパイか暗殺だろ

dialogue_en: Keep it up, guys!
dialogue_jp: その調子！

dialogue_en: Nice!
dialogue_jp: わあ～！

dialogue_en: Well? You gonna put on a show for us?
dialogue_jp: イルカショー　見せてくれるの？

dialogue_en: Just trust in Mr. Dolphin!
dialogue_jp: イルカさんを　よろしく～！

dialogue_en: You're gonna do great!
dialogue_jp: がんばってね　お兄さん

dialogue_en: Oh, well...
dialogue_jp: そっか　残念

dialogue_en: Aw, seriously?
dialogue_jp: えっ　やらないの？

dialogue_en: Who's ready for a good time!?
dialogue_jp: みんなで盛りあがろう！

dialogue_en: Enjoying his fancy inauguration parade.
dialogue_jp: のんきに　就任パレードかなんかやるらしいよ

dialogue_en: Up there here, anyway.
dialogue_jp: この村の真上

dialogue_en: And that douchebag'll be here any minute now.
dialogue_jp: もうすぐ　ルーファウスがジュノンに来るんだって

dialogue_en: That crazy or what!?
dialogue_jp: どう　びっくりした？

dialogue_en: Rufus-freakin'-Shinra!
dialogue_jp: ルーファウス神羅　その人だ！

dialogue_en: Who else but a certain company's new president...
dialogue_jp: なんと大胆　神羅カンパニーの新社長

dialogue_en: Just spit it out already.
dialogue_jp: もったいぶるな

dialogue_en: Seriously─guess!
dialogue_jp: だれだと思う？

dialogue_en: Our adorable dolphin friend─and this guy─are gonna put on the most spectacular show ever!
dialogue_jp:
これよりお目にかけますのは
世にもキュートなイルカのショー！

dialogue_en: Squeak?
dialogue_jp: キュイ？

dialogue_en: Oh! I've got it!
dialogue_jp: あっ　キミだ！

dialogue_en: That'd be great! But what should we do?
dialogue_jp:
もちろん！
でも　なにする？

dialogue_en: How long has it been since we last saw each other? We should make the most of this lucky little reunion!
dialogue_jp:
アタシたちが会ったの　いつぶり？
せっかくだから　楽しいことしようよ

dialogue_en: Uh heh... More importantly!
dialogue_jp: う～ん　それより

dialogue_en: Well, I hope that doesn't happen, 'cause it sounds horrible.
dialogue_jp: なんだか　腹が立ってきちゃった

dialogue_en: But so long as you don't piss off the occupying forces, they probably wouldn't beat the crap outta you.
dialogue_jp:
だが　無駄な抵抗をしなければ
ひどいことにはならないはずだ

dialogue_en: I mean, it would get taken along with the rest of the city.
dialogue_jp: 確かに　早い段階で占拠されるだろう

dialogue_en: Don't worry. Under Junon doesn't really have any strategic value.
dialogue_jp:
いや　この村に
それほど価値があるとは思えない

dialogue_en: And because we're right below Junon, everyone's worried we're gonna get hit first.
dialogue_jp:
ここ　ジュノンの下だから
真っ先に狙われちゃうと思う

dialogue_en: A real bad one too.
dialogue_jp: かなり　深刻みたい

dialogue_en: The grown-ups are saying there's gonna be a war soon.
dialogue_jp: もうすぐ　戦争になりそうなんだ

dialogue_en: You guys're lookin' grim. Somebody die?
dialogue_jp: 暗～いカオしちゃって　どうしたの？

dialogue_en: I know you're in there, my friend!
dialogue_jp: いるんだろう　マイフレンド！

dialogue_en: H-hey!
dialogue_jp: おい！

dialogue_en: Welp, this was fun! Seeya!
dialogue_jp: じゃ　手を組むってことでいいよね

dialogue_en: Wow, gotta hand it to her! The lady works fast!
dialogue_jp: ざんねん　もう売れちゃったみたい

dialogue_en: What!?
dialogue_jp: ああ？

dialogue_en: Okay. You wanna know how Rhonda's plannin' on payin' me? With your bounty, suckers!
dialogue_jp:
村長　アタシに払う報酬欲しさに
アンタたちを神羅に売る気だよ

dialogue_en: Oh, wow. Tell us more.
dialogue_jp: そりゃ　すげえ

dialogue_en: So when the president steps out...
dialogue_jp: だから　この機会に

dialogue_en: These people had their country stolen from them, and then their sunlight! Junon demands revenge!
dialogue_jp:
ここの人たちは　国と太陽を奪われてから
ずっと　神羅を憎んでるんだよね

dialogue_en: A pain in the ass. Let's go.
dialogue_jp: 室内は不利だ　外に出よう

dialogue_en: Who's that?
dialogue_jp: だれ？

dialogue_en: Now, now! You don't want to make me come in there and fetch you! Because I would love to do it!
dialogue_jp:
早く出てこないと　バイクごと押しかけちゃうぞ
いいのか　マイフレンド！

dialogue_en: She'll getcha topside!
dialogue_jp: あとは　ヨロシク！

dialogue_en:
If you manage to get away,
you should try to find Priscilla.
dialogue_jp: 上に行く方法は　プリシラに頼んでおくから

dialogue_en: Hey, Mister. Hey, Yuffie.
dialogue_jp: お兄さん　ユフィも

dialogue_en: What do you mean by that?
dialogue_jp: それは　どういう意味？

dialogue_en: No better time to croak it up!
dialogue_jp: こういう時こそ　ゲコっと行こう！

dialogue_en: The grown-ups are all freaking out, but who cares? Jumpfrog's where it's at!
dialogue_jp:
大人は大変そうだけど　おれたちには関係ないし
遊べるうちに遊ばなきゃ！

dialogue_en: You can't drop by and not play a round with us!
dialogue_jp:
せっかく来たんだから
いっしょに遊んでってよ！

dialogue_en: Wanna get hoppin' again?
dialogue_jp: また　カエルで遊んでく？

dialogue_en: Ribbit ribbit ribbit!
dialogue_jp: ゲコゲコゲコ！

dialogue_en: Hey!
dialogue_jp: あっ　おい！

dialogue_en: Ribbit ribbit!
dialogue_jp: ゲコゲコ！

dialogue_en: Yeah...I wouldn't go that far.
dialogue_jp: それは　勘弁してくれ

dialogue_en: I could get used to it.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　クセになりそうかも

dialogue_en: Ribbit.
dialogue_jp: ティファもだ

dialogue_en: You looked like you were having fun.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　楽しそうだったね

dialogue_en: Anyway, thanks again for your help! You can come back again if you want.
dialogue_jp:
いろいろ　あんがとね
また　いつでも寄ってってよ

dialogue_en: Meh, I've played worse.
dialogue_jp: ふん　まあな

dialogue_en: Whaddya think? It's pretty fun, right?
dialogue_jp: どう　なかなか面白いでしょ？

dialogue_en: So, do you wanna go another round?
dialogue_jp: どうする　もうちょっとやってく？

dialogue_en: So, do you wanna go another round?
dialogue_jp: どうする　もうちょっとやってく？

dialogue_en: This isn't your first time turning into a frog, is it?
dialogue_jp: さっすが～　もしかしてカエル名人？

dialogue_en: Wow, you've got some serious hops!
dialogue_jp: ばっちりゲコってるね　スゲー！

dialogue_en: Y'know, you make a pretty good frog! For a grown-up, that is.
dialogue_jp:
カエル　似合ってる～
思ってたよりやるじゃん

dialogue_en: You seem like you're gettin' the hang of it, at least.
dialogue_jp: ゲコゲコ～って　調子出てきた

dialogue_en: You've still got a little room to grow, but you'll get there.
dialogue_jp: うんまあ　ゲコ具合は悪くないね

dialogue_en: Huh. That wasn't half bad!
dialogue_jp: おっ　いい感じにカエルだね

dialogue_en: But no need to worry. I've found the perfect stage.
dialogue_jp: 不完全燃焼は　お互いに避けたいだろ？

dialogue_en: and a venue this small just won't do.
dialogue_jp: 少しばかり　ヤボすぎる

dialogue_en: Besides, you and I like to go big...
dialogue_jp: ここは　我々が踊るには

dialogue_en:
Hahahaha!
It only takes two to tango.
dialogue_jp:
アッハッハッ！
今回は挨拶に寄っただけだからね

dialogue_en: You come alone?
dialogue_jp: ひとりで来たのか

dialogue_en: Me?
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: retrieving one Aerith Gainsborough.
dialogue_jp: そのことを伝えにきたってわけだ

dialogue_en: As if by fate, the Speed Demon has been entrusted with a singular task:
dialogue_jp: このたび　エアリス救出特命部隊に抜擢されてね

dialogue_en: Well, I've got news for you, young man!
dialogue_jp: そんな友に　朗報だ

dialogue_en: Still playing hard to get, eh?
dialogue_jp: アッハ～　相変わらずつれないなあ

dialogue_en:
Absence certainly makes
the heart grow fonder, my friend!
dialogue_jp: やっと来たか　マイフレンド！

dialogue_en: What light from yonder balcony breaks? Come on down and say hello!
dialogue_jp:
そんなとこにいないで
もっと　近くに来てくれよ

dialogue_en: Honestly! How long do you intend to keep me waiting?
dialogue_jp: 待ちきれないよ　マイフレンド！

dialogue_en: My, my, aren't we a tease?
dialogue_jp: ずいぶんと　じらすじゃないか

dialogue_en: Come on out! It's been far too long since I've looked you in the eye!
dialogue_jp:
まだかい？
はやく顔を見せてくれよ

dialogue_en: And what if biker boy had taken us in!?
dialogue_jp: 本当に捕まったら　どうすんだよ！

dialogue_en: We're on the same side. Always have been.
dialogue_jp:
反神羅同士で　いがみあっても
仕方がないだろ？

dialogue_en: You thought I'd put you through the wringer like that without makin' it worth your while?
dialogue_jp:
元々　あんたたちにも
いくらか渡すつもりだったのさ

dialogue_en: Your bounty... Part of it, anyway.
dialogue_jp: あんたたちに懸かった　懸賞金さ

dialogue_en: The hell's this s'posed to be?
dialogue_jp: なんだよ　このカネ

dialogue_en: Take it. Not much, but it's yours.
dialogue_jp: ほら　少ないけど取っときな

dialogue_en: Don't you think for even a second we did that for you─the slimeball who sold us out.
dialogue_jp:
オレたちを売りやがって
やってくれんじゃねえか

dialogue_en: Thanks for dealing with that Shinra nutjob.
dialogue_jp: 神羅の相手　ご苦労さん

dialogue_en: Yuffie said to talk to Priscilla if we wanted to get topside, right? Let's go find her.
dialogue_jp:
上に行くなら　プリシラを頼れって
ユフィ　言ってたよね

dialogue_en: We might wanna think about getting out of here. These people don't need more trouble.
dialogue_jp:
ここ　離れたほうがいいよね
村にも迷惑がかかるし

dialogue_en: You got some weird friends, man.
dialogue_jp: めんどくさそうなヤツだな

dialogue_en: Seek me out, and we'll put our last performance to shame, with a show none shall ever forget!
dialogue_jp:
そこで　キミが来るのを待っているよ
マイフレンド！

dialogue_en: The city above─where we can dance up a storm!
dialogue_jp: 上に　最高の舞台を用意してある

dialogue_en:
Problem is, how're we supposed to
get to the controls?
dialogue_jp: 問題は　どうやって操作室まで行くかだな

dialogue_en:
Someone lowers and sends it back up─
along with the others.
dialogue_jp:
残りのメンバーが船に乗り
引き上げるというわけか

dialogue_en: So we can repurpose the ship as an elevator.
dialogue_jp: だれかが操作室に行き　船をおろす

dialogue_en: See that? That booth up there's the control room.
dialogue_jp: ほら　あそこで船を操作できるの

dialogue_en: And according to her, that tanker's the quickest and easiest way into the city!
dialogue_jp:
ジュノンに行くには　あの船を使うのが
いちばんラクチンなんだって

dialogue_en: Although...Yuffie's the one who found it.
dialogue_jp: あのね　ユフィが調べたら

dialogue_en: Sure! I'd be happy to.
dialogue_jp: うれしい　まかせて！

dialogue_en: We talked to Yuffie. She said that you could show us a way to get up top.
dialogue_jp:
上へ行きたい
おまえを頼れと　ユフィから聞いてきた

dialogue_en: Hey, you guys!
dialogue_jp: あっ　お兄さんたち！

dialogue_en: Oh, Priscilla? Last I saw, she was headin' to the cove.
dialogue_jp: ん？　プリシラなら海岸のほうにいたよ

dialogue_en: Not to point fingers, but pretty sure it was Yuffie.
dialogue_jp: 疑いたくないけど　やっぱりユフィかねえ

dialogue_en: I wasn't using it anyway, but still...
dialogue_jp:
うまく使えないから
いいっちゃ　いいんだけど

dialogue_en: Someone must've made off with it.
dialogue_jp: どうやら　盗まれたらしいんだ

dialogue_en: Wanna know somethin' funny? All the materia in my house up and poofed.
dialogue_jp:
実はね　うちにあったマテリアが
全部なくなってね

dialogue_en: Worked out fine...like I pray it will for Yuffie upstairs.
dialogue_jp:
あとは　ユフィがうまくやるように
祈るだけだね

dialogue_en:
Then I would've had to improvise.
But I didn't, 'cause it all worked out.
dialogue_jp:
その時は　その時さ
うまくいったんだから　いいじゃない

dialogue_en: My arm. Your arm. Bam!
dialogue_jp: こう　こう　こうだよ

dialogue_en: Never done it before?
dialogue_jp: 知らないの？

dialogue_en: Hmm?
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Okay─promise!
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　約束！

dialogue_en:
But we'll make sure to come back as soon as we're done. You can finish your story then.
How does that sound?
dialogue_jp:
用事すんだら　また来るから
イルカさんとのこと　そのとき聞かせて？

dialogue_en: We're sorry─really.
dialogue_jp: ごめんね　プリシラ

dialogue_en: Hey!
dialogue_jp: プリシラ

dialogue_en: That's great and all, but we're in a hurry.
dialogue_jp: 悪いな　急ぐんだ

dialogue_en: At least, I thought I was alone, but then─squeak, squeak─I hear this funny noise!
dialogue_jp:
あのね　海を泳いでいたら
キュイキュイって声が聞こえて

dialogue_en:
Like when we met!
See, I was out taking a swim all on my lonesome!
dialogue_jp:
あっ　そうだ！
わたしとイルカさんが出会ったときの話　聞く？

dialogue_en: You wouldn't believe what he can do! Like...
dialogue_jp:
イルカさん　すごいんだよ
えっとね……

dialogue_en: Not with Mr. Dolphin!
dialogue_jp: そこで　イルカさんの出番！

dialogue_en: So we're stuck?
dialogue_jp: 無理じゃねえか

dialogue_en: Yep. It should just say: "No climbing."
dialogue_jp:
うん　侵入者が登れないように
電気が流れてるの

dialogue_en: "High voltage"?
dialogue_jp: 電流注意……

dialogue_en: C'mon, Cloud! You got this!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　がんばって！

dialogue_en: Just lemme know, okay?
dialogue_jp: 準備はしっかりね

dialogue_en: All good to go?
dialogue_jp: 準備できた？

dialogue_en: Great! Just lemme know when you're ready to go.
dialogue_jp: それじゃあ　準備ができたら声かけてね

dialogue_en: Guess it's me.
dialogue_jp: 俺が行こう

dialogue_en: Got you written all over it, merc.
dialogue_jp: 頼んだぜ　なんでも屋

dialogue_en: Okay! Which one of you wants to go flying?
dialogue_jp: んで　だれがイルカさんに飛ばされる？

dialogue_en: With his help, it'll be a cinch.
dialogue_jp: そしたら　きっと届くよ

dialogue_en: Now we ask Mr. Dolphin to get you up!
dialogue_jp: イルカさんのチカラを借りて　ジャンプするの

dialogue_en: Alright then, now what?
dialogue_jp: それで　どうすりゃいい？

dialogue_en: Awesome!
dialogue_jp: オッケー！

dialogue_en: Oh! Gotcha!
dialogue_jp: ああ　わかった

dialogue_en: If we don't sink on the way...
dialogue_jp: 沈まねえだろうな

dialogue_en: The ship's not far, so you'll be there in no time!
dialogue_jp: 船までイルカさんが　引っぱってってくれるから

dialogue_en: Okay! Your ride's right here.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　みんなはこれに乗って

dialogue_en: Nice goin', man!
dialogue_jp: ナーイス！

dialogue_en: Squeak!
dialogue_jp: キュイ！

dialogue_en: You gotta think like a frog!
dialogue_jp: あ～あ　もっとゲコっといこう！

dialogue_en: Do people always become bad at games when they get older or something?
dialogue_jp: 反応が鈍いよ～　もっとゲコゲコやらなきゃ

dialogue_en: Do people always become bad at games when they get older or something?
dialogue_jp: 反応が鈍いよ～　もっとゲコゲコやらなきゃ

dialogue_en: Everyone's gotta start somewhere, I guess...
dialogue_jp: まあ　カエル初心者ってとこかな

dialogue_en: Aw, what's the matter? Scared you won't change back?
dialogue_jp: えっ　もしかしてカエルになるのイヤとか？

dialogue_en: Aw, what's the matter? Scared you won't change back?
dialogue_jp: えっ　もしかしてカエルになるのイヤとか？

dialogue_en: Grown-ups are boring.
dialogue_jp: つまんな～い

dialogue_en: Grown-ups are boring.
dialogue_jp: つまんな～い

dialogue_en: You're not even gonna play? You made me explain the rules for nothing!
dialogue_jp:
あれ～　やらないの？
オタマジャクシにもなれないね

dialogue_en: You're not even gonna play? You made me explain the rules for nothing!?
dialogue_jp:
あれ～　やらないの？
オタマジャクシにもなれないね

dialogue_en: Meet you at the top!
dialogue_jp: 上で合流ね！

dialogue_en: Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド～

dialogue_en: Hey! Merc! We're good to go down here!
dialogue_jp: おーい　あげてくれ！

dialogue_en: Have fun!
dialogue_jp: まったね～！

dialogue_en: Well, guys and girls! And, uh...dog! I'll seeya later!
dialogue_jp:
お兄さん　お姉さん　犬のひと
気をつけてね～

dialogue_en: No prob.
dialogue_jp: ううん

dialogue_en: You've been a huge help, Priscilla!
dialogue_jp: いろいろありがとう　プリシラ

dialogue_en: Think you two can handle it?
dialogue_jp: どう　できそう？

dialogue_en: Okay! Here are the rules:
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　ルールを説明するね

dialogue_en: Again...
dialogue_jp: まいったな

dialogue_en: Again!?
dialogue_jp: また？

dialogue_en: So, ready to play? C'mon, you'll love it. I promise!
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　今度こそ『フロッグフラップ』
いっしょに遊ぼう！

dialogue_en: Thanks for that!
dialogue_jp: ありがとう！

dialogue_en: You guys're never gonna get to play jumpfrog with us if you don't do something about those gross monsters first!
dialogue_jp:
『フロッグフラップ』　いっしょに遊びたければ
あのモンスターを倒しちゃってよ

dialogue_en: We got this!
dialogue_jp: 楽勝だ

dialogue_en: Oh great...
dialogue_jp: そんな……

dialogue_en: Oh great...
dialogue_jp: そんな……

dialogue_en: But don't worry. All you gotta do is start thinkin' like a frog and you'll be fine!
dialogue_jp:
でも　おじさん達なら
カエルになっても　余裕でしょ？

dialogue_en: I tried to warn you! Like I said: hangin' out here turns you into a frog!
dialogue_jp:
言ったじゃん！
この入江は　カエルに変身しちゃうって

dialogue_en: Tifa!
dialogue_jp: ティファ！

dialogue_en: What the hell!?
dialogue_jp: うそっ！

dialogue_en: What the hell!?
dialogue_jp: うそっ！

dialogue_en: C'mon, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: 行こう　クラウド！

dialogue_en: The Highwind.
dialogue_jp: ハイウインド

dialogue_en: Any idea what that is?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　クラウド　あれは？

dialogue_en: Well, they're definitely not here. Let's head into town.
dialogue_jp:
ここには　いないようだ
街へ行ってみよう

dialogue_en:
This city's size, on the other hand...
The robed men won't be easy to find.
dialogue_jp:
しかし　広いな
黒マントを探すのも　ひと苦労だ

dialogue_en: Personally, I think that's a good thing.
dialogue_jp: 私たちにとっては好都合だね

dialogue_en:
Guess things have changed.
They got higher priorities.
dialogue_jp: オレたちにかまってるヒマはねえってか

dialogue_en: More worried about the parade?
dialogue_jp: パレードの準備中かな？

dialogue_en: Less security than I thought.
dialogue_jp: 警備は　それほど厳しくないな

dialogue_en: Wow...
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Let's move.
dialogue_jp: 行こう

dialogue_en: Ah, there you are.
dialogue_jp: あっ　きたきた！

dialogue_en: Ten-hut!
dialogue_jp: 敬礼！

dialogue_en: Alright.
dialogue_jp: 通せ

dialogue_en: He introduced himself as Colonel Glenn Lodbrok.
dialogue_jp: グレン・ロズブローク大佐　とのことです

dialogue_en: Oh?
dialogue_jp: ほう？

dialogue_en:
An emissary from Wutai is here─
sent by Viceroy Sarruf.
dialogue_jp:
ウータイの　スフール総督の使者を名乗る者が
面会を求めています

dialogue_en: Enter.
dialogue_jp: はいれ

dialogue_en: No. We'll leave them be─for now.
dialogue_jp:
いや　そのままでいい
泳がせておけ

dialogue_en: Hey, beggars can't be choosers.
dialogue_jp: 街に出て　船を探そう

dialogue_en: That's too bad. Would've been perfect.
dialogue_jp: そっか　ちょっと残念

dialogue_en: we're stickin' with the boat.
dialogue_jp: 乗組員も必要になる

dialogue_en: 'Less you got a trained crew and piloting skills we don't know about...
dialogue_jp:
飛空艇を操縦できるのは
限られたパイロットだけだ

dialogue_en: Screw the boat. Let's take that.
dialogue_jp: 船やめて　アレをいただくか

dialogue_en:
Shinra's pride and joy.
The fastest, most advanced airship in the fleet.
dialogue_jp:
神羅が威信をかけて完成させた
最新鋭の高速飛空艇だ

dialogue_en:
You Shinras...
You take and you take, and you never give back.
dialogue_jp: 神羅の親子は　魔晄を汲み上げることしか考えない

dialogue_en:
This "new vision" include your
fairy-tale promised land?
dialogue_jp: 約束の地なんて絵空事を　まだ信じているのか

dialogue_en:
You always did prefer to march
to the beat of your own drum.
dialogue_jp:
相変わらず　お絵かきが好きだな
ぼっちゃんは……

dialogue_en: A new vision is required.
dialogue_jp: 新しい絵が必要だ

dialogue_en: But my father is dead─which changes the equation.
dialogue_jp:
だが　プレジデントは死に
状況は変わった

dialogue_en: Thank you; I'm aware.
dialogue_jp: しばらくは　それでいい

dialogue_en: And this battle for the magnus materia demands commitment from both Wutai and Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
神羅とウータイが　各地で衝突を繰り返すことで
緊張関係を維持する

dialogue_en:
That's good to hear─some people
just don't have the stomach for war.
dialogue_jp:
次の時代のテーマは
ヒュージマテリアを巡る争い

dialogue_en: Correct.
dialogue_jp: そのつもりだ

dialogue_en:
The viceroy and your late father had big plans.
I assume you intend to carry them out?
dialogue_jp:
うちの総督と　プレジデントが描いていた絵は
あんたが引き継ぐと考えていいのか？

dialogue_en: Let's cut to the chase, Mr. President.
dialogue_jp: 早速だが　ルーファウス社長

dialogue_en: Then you thought right.
dialogue_jp: もちろん　死んでるさ

dialogue_en: I thought you were dead.
dialogue_jp: 生きていたのか

dialogue_en: A critical line of defense against any seaborne assault. When needed, it can transform into an armed fortress.
dialogue_jp:
有事の際には　都市全体が要塞となり
海からの敵を迎え撃つ役割を担っている

dialogue_en: It's a key military outpost with its own offshore reactor.
dialogue_jp: ここは　海底に魔晄炉を有する軍事都市

dialogue_en: So, Cloud! What can you tell us about Junon?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　ジュノンは詳しい？

dialogue_en: Congratulations on your inauguration, Mr. President. Shinra has a bright future.
dialogue_jp:
社長就任　おめでとうございます
益々のご発展を

dialogue_en: Oh, right! Before I leave...a message from the viceroy.
dialogue_jp:
忘れるところだった
スフール総督からの伝言だ

dialogue_en: Let's give the people what they deserve.
dialogue_jp: 一緒に　正義を果たそうぜ

dialogue_en:
No more playing the idle heir.
You have obligations to fulfill.
dialogue_jp:
もう　ガキじゃないんだ
好き勝手にやめてもらっちゃ困る

dialogue_en: You started this, remember?
dialogue_jp: 始めたのは　そっちだろ

dialogue_en: Now listen─
dialogue_jp: しかし――

dialogue_en:
What we're doing's for the greater good.
Just gotta know when to ease off the gas.
dialogue_jp:
星の未来のためだ
破局の一歩手前まで行ってみようや

dialogue_en:
A people rejuvenated...
and a planet once more made whole.
dialogue_jp: 世界を奮い立たせ　その精神が星を潤す

dialogue_en:
But war can put things right─beget anger,
desolation, hatred─and in its wake, new unity.
dialogue_jp:
戦争がもたらす怒り　悲しみ　憎悪は
この上ない連帯　高揚をもたらし

dialogue_en: Left to you, this world would end up an empty husk.
dialogue_jp: たまには返さないと　星が滅んじまうぞ

dialogue_en: Help us!
dialogue_jp: 助けて！

dialogue_en: Aaah!
dialogue_jp: きゃあああ！

dialogue_en: Actually, we could use a couple more players. Since you're here, do you wanna give it a try?
dialogue_jp:
いっしょに遊ぶ仲間を探してたんだ
せっかくだし　お姉さんたちも遊んでく？

dialogue_en: Uh, playing jumpfrog─obviously.
dialogue_jp: なにって　『フロッグフラップ』だよ

dialogue_en: So what're you kids doing all the way down here?
dialogue_jp: きみたち　こんなところでなにをしてるの？

dialogue_en: Of course.
dialogue_jp: 了解　了解

dialogue_en: It's just, there aren't a lotta other kids in the village, so I basically had to be her friend!
dialogue_jp:
村の子供は　そんなに多くないし
仲良しってほどじゃ……

dialogue_en: We're friends─but it's not like I like her or anything!
dialogue_jp: べつに　ただの幼馴染みってだけだ！

dialogue_en: Are you a friend of hers too?
dialogue_jp: プリシラとは　仲良しなの？

dialogue_en: Right, that's us! We're friends.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　プリシラ！
そうそう

dialogue_en: Oh, wait─you must be the ones Priscilla was talking about. She told me how you saved her!
dialogue_jp:
もしかして　プリシラが言ってた人たち？
村で助けてもらったって

dialogue_en:
More like, "eager to prance around for
their new paymaster."
dialogue_jp: 新社長に　いいところを見せたいってか？

dialogue_en: Those troopers seemed pretty psyched for the parade, huh?
dialogue_jp: さっきの人たち　パレードに出るのかな

dialogue_en: Hooah!
dialogue_jp: ハッ！

dialogue_en: But use this time wisely. Practice your technique!
dialogue_jp:
各自　フォーメーションを
再確認しておくように！

dialogue_en: Troopers! You're all off duty until the parade begins!
dialogue_jp:
それでは
パレード開催まで休息とする！

dialogue_en: Hooah!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: and make our city proud!
dialogue_jp: ジュノン勢に見せつけてやれ！

dialogue_en: Let's show him how a real drill team does it...
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガル流の洗練された
フォーメーションを

dialogue_en: Listen up! Midgar's Seventh Infantry will return home with the president's commendation!
dialogue_jp:
いいか　社長賞は
我々ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊がいただく

dialogue_en: Hey, look! What's that about?
dialogue_jp: あっ　見て　あそこ！

dialogue_en: O-of course I do!
dialogue_jp: まさか～！

dialogue_en: Hey... Just to be clear, you do realize we're not here on vacation, right?
dialogue_jp:
エアリス　観光しようなんて
たくらんじゃいねえよな？

dialogue_en: Ah, right. You're not the touristy type.
dialogue_jp: そっか　クラウドらしいね

dialogue_en: Uh, maybe? I dunno.
dialogue_jp: それは……知らない

dialogue_en:
Huh, neat.
Any good restaurants? Sights to see?
dialogue_jp:
へえ～　美味しい食べ物とか
観光スポットとかは？

dialogue_en: Its strategic location, along with its air and seaports, make it second only to Midgar as the company's most vital city.
dialogue_jp:
空路と航路の拠点でもあり
神羅にとっては　ミッドガルに次ぐ重要な街だ

dialogue_en: We bust up his parade!
dialogue_jp: パレードに乱入すんだろ！

dialogue_en: Or maybe we can.
dialogue_jp: 策はある

dialogue_en: We can't just walk up to the president in the street.
dialogue_jp: でも　社長に会うなんてできるかな

dialogue_en: Okay, but how?
dialogue_jp: そうだよね

dialogue_en: But then Cloud's biker buddy rolls up and says he is. We gotta straighten this out.
dialogue_jp:
バイクの人は　保護するとかなんとか
ハッキリしてほしいな

dialogue_en:
First the Turks say,
"Do whatever─we're not after you."
dialogue_jp:
タークスは　わたしたち
もう追わないって言ったのに

dialogue_en: Actually, I'm gonna have to agree.
dialogue_jp: いちぶ　賛成

dialogue_en: Hell, I'm not sayin' we kill the man─but we oughta at least give him a talkin' to. Rough him up a little maybe, y'know?
dialogue_jp:
暗殺とは言わねえが　ひとことふたこと言ってやって
ついでに　ぶん殴るくらいしてやりてえ

dialogue_en: If Rufus is in town, are we really gonna let this opportunity pass us by?
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウスが近くにいるってのに
素通りなんて面白くねえとは思わねえか

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: なんだ

dialogue_en: Now I know what y'all gonna say...but I gotta ask.
dialogue_jp:
おおごとになりそうで黙っていたが
やっぱり無理だ

dialogue_en: Shuddup...
dialogue_jp: うるせえ

dialogue_en: True enough.
dialogue_jp: 妥当な提案だ

dialogue_en: Fatigues won't be enough to disguise you two.
dialogue_jp: 神羅の制服を着ることになる

dialogue_en: Now hold up!
dialogue_jp: おいおい！

dialogue_en:
And keep an eye out for black robes
while you're at it.
dialogue_jp: そしてもちろん　黒マントの捜索

dialogue_en:
Barret, Red. You guys find a route to the port;
see what security's like.
dialogue_jp:
バレットとレッドは
港までの経路と警備状況を確認してくれ

dialogue_en: No arguments here.
dialogue_jp: 悪かねえな

dialogue_en: Wow! That's good!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　名案！

dialogue_en: Sure.
dialogue_jp: もちろん

dialogue_en: Seriously?
dialogue_jp: 本気？

dialogue_en: Get in, get close, get answers.
dialogue_jp: それなら　ギリギリまで騒動にはならない

dialogue_en: We join the parade. Hide in plain sight.
dialogue_jp: パレードの一員として　ルーファウスに近づくんだ

dialogue_en: No, that's how we die in a hail of bullets like a bunch of dumbasses. The city's crawling with Shinra troopers.
dialogue_jp:
いや　参加者はほとんどが兵士だからな
敵に回すには数が多すぎる

dialogue_en: Now we're talkin'!
dialogue_jp: あったあった！

dialogue_en: Let's get changed first.
dialogue_jp: まだ着替えてないよ？

dialogue_en: Hey, what about our uniforms?
dialogue_jp: 変装　しないの？

dialogue_en:
Why aren't you in uniform yet?
Your team's gonna march without you.
dialogue_jp:
まだ着替えてないんですか？
急がないと　始まっちゃいますよ

dialogue_en:
You should know you can't go out wearing that.
Get changed─quickly.
dialogue_jp:
部屋の中に制服があるんで
はやく着替えてください

dialogue_en: Are you part of the parade today?
dialogue_jp: パレードの出場者ですか？

dialogue_en: The ceremony will be starting soon!
dialogue_jp: まだ着替えてないかたはいませんか？

dialogue_en: Please get changed!
dialogue_jp: 急いで着替えてください

dialogue_en:
Attention all troopers!
Spare uniforms can be found here!
dialogue_jp:
制服に着替えてないかた
この部屋にプレスした予備があります

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: This way?
dialogue_jp: あっちかな？

dialogue_en: I'm so pumped for this!
dialogue_jp: やる気マンマン！

dialogue_en: Oh, we're coming with.
dialogue_jp: 興味しんしん！

dialogue_en: Alright, see you in a bit. I gotta go find a uniform.
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ行ってくる
まずは制服の調達だ

dialogue_en: Oh no, we're definitely not.
dialogue_jp: ああ　ちがうちがう

dialogue_en: Hey Finn, who're they? Not Shinra, I hope...
dialogue_jp:
フィン　それだれ？
神羅じゃないよな

dialogue_en: It's just how this place is. I dunno if it's 'cause of the reactor out there or what, but hangin' out here turns you into a frog.
dialogue_jp:
海底魔晄炉の影響かわかんないけど　なんでか
ここでだけ　カエルに変身しちゃうんだ

dialogue_en: Well duh!
dialogue_jp: あたりまえ！

dialogue_en: You're a kid!?
dialogue_jp: 人間……

dialogue_en: Hey, what do you think you're doing here? This is a no-grown-up zone─get lost!
dialogue_jp:
おじさんたち　だれ？
ここは子供以外　立入禁止だよ

dialogue_en: Ah! Uh...hello?
dialogue_jp: わっ　カエル？

dialogue_en: Ribbit!
dialogue_jp: ゲコゲコ！

dialogue_en: I'd hate to think fiends have been messing with its food supply. Poor bird's got enough problems...
dialogue_jp:
もしかしたら　モンスターのせいで
コンドルのエサも減ってきているのかもしれません

dialogue_en: Although it's strange for the condor to come this far down...
dialogue_jp: でも　あんなところまで降りてくるなんて

dialogue_en: My heart is still pounding!
dialogue_jp: まだ心臓がバクバクしていますよ

dialogue_en: I've never had the privilege of seeing a condor up close like that before.
dialogue_jp:
あんなに間近でコンドルを見たのは
僕も初めてです

dialogue_en: But that ends today! Next time, I'm gonna snap the perfect shot!
dialogue_jp:
次こそは　このレンズで
コンドルの姿を捉えてみせます！

dialogue_en: I blew it again─just like I always do! I really am nothing but a colossal failure.
dialogue_jp:
もう　肝心な時に私ってば
昔からこうなんです　私

dialogue_en: Y'know, I ought to get a nice frame for that photograph.
dialogue_jp: あの写真は　大事にとっておくとしよう

dialogue_en: C'mon, Cloud. You really need to be this close?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　すこし近いかも

dialogue_en: If you're gonna stand there, keep watch.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　見張っててね

dialogue_en: Scram!
dialogue_jp: もう　しつこい！

dialogue_en: Ha ha, very funny.
dialogue_jp: クラウドさ～ん？

dialogue_en: Uh, Cloud? What d'you think you're doing?
dialogue_jp: クラウドさ～ん　なにする気ですか～？

dialogue_en: Whoa there! Three steps back, if you please!
dialogue_jp: は～い　３歩　さがってくださ～い

dialogue_en: Yep!
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Well? Ready to suit up?
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　着替えちゃおう

dialogue_en: They're actually kinda cool!
dialogue_jp: こうなってるんだ～！

dialogue_en: Better hurry. You don't want to be the reason your team is disqualified.
dialogue_jp:
開始時間に遅れないよう
早めに会場へ向かってくださいね

dialogue_en: Head to Starboard Junon when you're ready.
dialogue_jp: パレード会場は　エルジュノンです

dialogue_en: Maybe, but don't forget: you gotta act the part too. Just do what I do, alright?
dialogue_jp:
いや　仕草や言葉遣いも重要だ
ここからは俺に合わせてくれ

dialogue_en: I'd say we look the part.
dialogue_jp: これで　バッチリだね

dialogue_en: Ya got me.
dialogue_jp: 上出来だ

dialogue_en: Well?
dialogue_jp: どう？

dialogue_en: Well?
dialogue_jp: どう？

dialogue_en: Hands up.
dialogue_jp: 動くな

dialogue_en: Freeze.
dialogue_jp: 止まれ！

dialogue_en: Been a while.
dialogue_jp: 懐かしいな

dialogue_en: Occupied.
dialogue_jp: 使用中です！

dialogue_en: Form check─now! You will give your commander a flawless performance.
dialogue_jp:
いますぐ中に入れ！
指揮官に　動きを確認してもらう

dialogue_en: Do you have any idea how important today's ceremony is? Do you, maggot!?
dialogue_jp:
今回のパレードが
どれほど重要か　わかっとらんのか！

dialogue_en: You're "sorry"!?
dialogue_jp: バカモノ！

dialogue_en: Sorry, sir!
dialogue_jp: 申し訳ありません！

dialogue_en: Sorry, sir!
dialogue_jp: 申し訳ありません！

dialogue_en: It's the damnedest thing, but I don't recall seeing the three of you at practice. Am I to assume that you simply...forgot?
dialogue_jp:
貴様ら　総演習にいなかったな
まさかとは思うが　遅刻か？

dialogue_en: Hold it.
dialogue_jp: 待てぃ！

dialogue_en: We haven't had a sighting like that in who knows how long─and it's all thanks to you.
dialogue_jp:
君たちのおかげで　すばらしいものが見られた
感謝しておるよ

dialogue_en: Nice face, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　顔！

dialogue_en: Miss? I'd like you to have this─as a souvenir.
dialogue_jp:
あの　良かったらこれ
記念にどうぞ

dialogue_en: Sir!
dialogue_jp: はい！

dialogue_en: And hopefully next time we'll be able to snap a clearer picture of that bird!
dialogue_jp: 次こそはうまく撮れるよう　写真の練習もな

dialogue_en: Sir!
dialogue_jp: はい！

dialogue_en: Well, scouts, let's finish writing up today's report and start preparing for our next fateful encounter!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　今日の記録をまとめたら
さっそく次の観察会の準備をせねば

dialogue_en: It's precious moments like these that make condor-watching so exhilarating! You never know what to expect.
dialogue_jp:
たまーに　こんな奇跡が起こるから
コンドルの観察はやめられんのかもしれんなあ

dialogue_en:
Hahaha. Why, I haven't looked this happy
since I was a lad.
dialogue_jp: ほほっ　我ながら子供のような顔をしとるわ

dialogue_en: Really? Couldn't tell from a shot like this.
dialogue_jp: でもこれ　とてもいい写真だと思います

dialogue_en:
I hope so... It just showed up!
I could barely hold my camera, and...
dialogue_jp:
わたし　びっくりして
緊張しちゃって

dialogue_en: So, snap any good shots?
dialogue_jp: いい写真　撮れましたか？

dialogue_en: Attention!
dialogue_jp: 整列！

dialogue_en: Sir!
dialogue_jp: ハッ！

dialogue_en:
What the hell are you doing over there!?
The commander is waiting!
dialogue_jp: なにをぶつくさ言っとる　さっさと入らんか！

dialogue_en: I'm having second thoughts, you guys.
dialogue_jp: できるかな？

dialogue_en: Just follow my lead. I still remember the basics.
dialogue_jp:
規定演舞は　頭に入っている
俺のマネをしてくれ

dialogue_en: Now what?
dialogue_jp: どうしよう

dialogue_en: I'll feed your ass to a behemoth!
dialogue_jp: ベヒーモスのエサにしてやる！

dialogue_en: And if you show her anything less than perfection...
dialogue_jp: すこしでも失敗してみろ～？

dialogue_en: Say cheese!
dialogue_jp: とっ　撮ります！

dialogue_en: Quickly, quickly!
dialogue_jp: ほれ　はよせい！

dialogue_en: C'mon. Gather round, everyone!
dialogue_jp: おお　シャッターチャンス！

dialogue_en: Yes, sir!
dialogue_jp: はっ　はい！

dialogue_en:
Wait! We have to get a photograph!
Grab the camera!
dialogue_jp:
ああ……いかん
写真　写真じゃ　急げ！

dialogue_en: What a sight... I never dreamed I'd be able to see it up close like this!
dialogue_jp: すごい　こんなに近くまでくるなんて

dialogue_en: What was that!?
dialogue_jp: ふざけるな！

dialogue_en: Pathetic!
dialogue_jp: たるんどる！

dialogue_en: Step it up!
dialogue_jp: がんばれ！

dialogue_en: Hmm...
dialogue_jp: なるほど

dialogue_en: Not good enough.
dialogue_jp: まずまずだ！

dialogue_en: Concentrate.
dialogue_jp: 惜しい！

dialogue_en: Good. Keep it up!
dialogue_jp: その調子だ！

dialogue_en: Impressive.
dialogue_jp: やるな！

dialogue_en: Excellent!
dialogue_jp: いいぞ！

dialogue_en: Well done!
dialogue_jp: よし！

dialogue_en: Let's see what you've got. Now...begin!
dialogue_jp: 準備はいいな　では始め！

dialogue_en: Let's see what you've got. Now...begin!
dialogue_jp: 準備はいいな　では始め！

dialogue_en: Clear?
dialogue_jp: いいな？

dialogue_en: I'm warning you now, though... One slip up, and I'll chuck you straight into a malboro's mouth.
dialogue_jp:
すこしでもミスをしたら
モルボルの口に　放り込むからな

dialogue_en:
Let's find out, shall we?
I'm not about to take any chances today.
dialogue_jp: まあいい　じっくりと確認させてもらおう

dialogue_en: Have to hand it to you three. You've got guts skipping out on practice─that, or you're idiots.
dialogue_jp:
総演習に遅刻するとはいい度胸だ
貴様ら　よほど自信があるようだな

dialogue_en: But your confidence...I commend.
dialogue_jp: だが　その度胸　気に入った

dialogue_en: That was a disgrace!
dialogue_jp: 貴様ら　なめてるのか！

dialogue_en: I must say, you've impressed me.
dialogue_jp: 貴様　どこに隠れていたんだ

dialogue_en: Precise, clean movements... Impeccable timing...
dialogue_jp:
その正確でキレのある動き
ぶれない体幹

dialogue_en: Alright. Once more!
dialogue_jp: よし　では始める！

dialogue_en: Ready? Begin!
dialogue_jp: よし　では行くぞ！

dialogue_en: Is this a game to you!?
dialogue_jp: 遊んでるのか！

dialogue_en: I'm not laughing, troopers.
dialogue_jp: 貴様ら……！

dialogue_en: Hey, look!
dialogue_jp: 見て　あそこ！

dialogue_en: Yeah, maybe.
dialogue_jp: そうかもな

dialogue_en: I kinda get what Aerith was saying now.
dialogue_jp: エアリスは　こんな気持ちなのかな

dialogue_en: Though at least with a steel sky you know your limits. Out here...it's endless.
dialogue_jp:
でも　届かないものに手を伸ばすのって
ちょっと怖いね

dialogue_en: Beats a steel one, that's for sure.
dialogue_jp: 首を痛めないように　気をつけろ

dialogue_en:
Gotta say, it's kinda nice─
looking up and seeing a blue sky.
dialogue_jp:
やっぱり　好きだな
見あげれば空って

dialogue_en: Hmm, I can't say I've ever seen it feast on anything except meat, but...
dialogue_jp:
う～む　ヤツが野菜を食べるところなど
見たことはないが……

dialogue_en: Are those...greens?
dialogue_jp: あれは　野菜か？

dialogue_en: Ma'am!
dialogue_jp: ハッ！

dialogue_en:
Tardiness will not be tolerated.
Now, make us proud!
dialogue_jp:
遅刻は絶対に許されんからな
心して　任務にあたれ

dialogue_en: Once assembled, you and the team will report to Starboard Junon.
dialogue_jp:
兵がそろったら　パレード会場の
エルジュノンまで連れてこい

dialogue_en:
Look for the Seventh's brassards.
They'll identify the best from the rest.
dialogue_jp: みな　ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊の腕章をつけている

dialogue_en: You will recall that, to march in the parade, each drill team is required to muster five units or more.
dialogue_jp:
兵は　街に部隊を組んで散らばっている
そのうち　最低限５部隊を集めてみろ！

dialogue_en: As parade captain, you will round up your fellow troopers currently on leave in Larboard Junon.
dialogue_jp:
よし　ではまずおまえたちには
アルジュノンにいる我が隊の兵を集めてもらう

dialogue_en: Ma'am!
dialogue_jp: ハッ！

dialogue_en: Which means that our performance─satisfactory or otherwise─is now your responsibility.
dialogue_jp:
我が隊が社長賞を獲得できるか否かは
すべて　貴様にかかっていると思え

dialogue_en: You will be our model trooper─the one to march at the head of our drill team!
dialogue_jp:
パレードの先頭に立ち
みなの手本となる重要な役目だ

dialogue_en:
Congratulations. You are hereby promoted to
parade captain of Midgar's Seventh Infantry.
dialogue_jp:
たった今より　貴様を
我がミッドガル第七歩兵連隊の隊長に任命する！

dialogue_en: He'd serve as a sterling example to the others, ma'am.
dialogue_jp:
パレードの先導役を
まかせてみては　いかがでしょう

dialogue_en:
I've never seen meat of that particular color.
Are you sure it's safe for condor consumption?
dialogue_jp:
ずいぶん変わった色の肉だな
いったい　なんの肉なんだ？

dialogue_en: This is quite the cut of meat! I've no doubt the bird will be unable to resist the call of such fine dining.
dialogue_jp:
おお　これは立派な肉だ
コンドルも　たまらず降りてくるかもしれん

dialogue_en: You can put the food right over there. Thank you.
dialogue_jp: あちらの高台に　エサを置いてあげてください

dialogue_en:
Oh, you're back!
Hope it wasn't too much trouble.
dialogue_jp: 戻ったか　手間をかけたな

dialogue_en: What about those? Better than nothing, right?
dialogue_jp: いちおう　あれだけでも持っていく？

dialogue_en: What do we do now?
dialogue_jp: どうしよっか

dialogue_en: Let's go.
dialogue_jp: 行ってみよう

dialogue_en: Guess it's in here.
dialogue_jp: この先みたい

dialogue_en: Kweh, kweh, kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエッ　クエクエ！

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエッ！

dialogue_en: A chocobo could track 'em...
dialogue_jp: チョコボに嗅がせてみるか

dialogue_en: Kweh, kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエッ　クエ～！

dialogue_en:
That's how these things go.
The president himself gives the award.
dialogue_jp: 社長賞は　ルーファウス自身が表彰するはずだ

dialogue_en:
The parade won't...
but the presidential commendation will.
dialogue_jp: そうじゃない　社長賞を狙う

dialogue_en:
Hey, you sure about this?
Is the parade really gonna get us to Rufus?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　本当に行進しながら
ルーファウスに近づける？

dialogue_en: Boy, that was lucky.
dialogue_jp: なんとか　乗りきったね

dialogue_en: Get your team in order, Captain.
dialogue_jp: しっかり　兵を集めてこい

dialogue_en: Apparently, there's a life-size cutout of President Rufus somewhere in town. Check there.
dialogue_jp:
どこかに　ルーファウス新社長の
パネルがあるらしい　見に行ってみたらどうだ

dialogue_en: Could be that a few troopers are wandering Junon's famed shopping district.
dialogue_jp:
少ない自由時間だ
買い物をしている者もいるだろう

dialogue_en: Have you checked the barracks?
dialogue_jp: 兵舎には行ってみたか？

dialogue_en: No doubt some are trying to calm themselves by taking in the ocean view.
dialogue_jp:
緊張している者は
海でも眺めているのではないか

dialogue_en: A few might have decided to visit Junon's most famous sight.
dialogue_jp:
観光するなら
ジュノンのシンボルは外せないだろうな

dialogue_en: I'm sure some of your fellow troopers fell into a bottle or two. Try the bars around town.
dialogue_jp:
景気づけに　飲んでいるヤツらもいるかもしれん
酒場やバーを探してみろ

dialogue_en: Hmph─ Still haven't assembled your team, Captain?
dialogue_jp: なんだ　兵士が見つからないのか？

dialogue_en: So you'd better not blow it─Captain.
dialogue_jp: 期待しているからな～？

dialogue_en: This is a big opportunity.
dialogue_jp: 隊長の責務をまっとうしろ

dialogue_en: Ma'am!
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: Ma'am!
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Get your shit together; parade's about to begin. Everyone, follow me!
dialogue_jp:
パレード会場まで俺が先導する
全員　あとについてこい

dialogue_en: Guys, quick! Attention!
dialogue_jp: みんな隊長だ　整列！

dialogue_en: Captain!?
dialogue_jp: そのメットは！

dialogue_en: Um... Can I help you?
dialogue_jp: なんですか？

dialogue_en: So we gotta show up and show out. Give the folks back home somethin' to believe in, right!?
dialogue_jp:
私たちの力いっぱいの行進が
被害にあった人達の励みになればいいね

dialogue_en: The parade's gonna be broadcast live in Midgar...
dialogue_jp:
パレードは
ミッドガルにも中継されるんだよな

dialogue_en: C'mon.
dialogue_jp: 行くぞ

dialogue_en: Anyone with one of these guys, right?
dialogue_jp: この腕章の人たち　だね

dialogue_en: Yeah. Just remember: Midgar, Seventh Infantry.
dialogue_jp: ああ　ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊だ

dialogue_en: Ready to rally the troops, Captain?
dialogue_jp: 街にいる隊員を集めるんだよね

dialogue_en: Cool!
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Gotta go big or go home, right?
dialogue_jp: 不敵　そして　ステキ！

dialogue_en: That's some plan. I mean, it's risky, but...
dialogue_jp: クラウド　それって大胆

dialogue_en: Wow...
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Very fishy.
dialogue_jp: あやしい……

dialogue_en: Guys. Look.
dialogue_jp: ねえ　あれ！

dialogue_en: Yessir!
Yessir!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエッ！

dialogue_en: Maybe we can track its scent.
dialogue_jp: ニオイ　残ってないかな

dialogue_en: There goes the condor's dinner.
dialogue_jp: いまのが　コンドルの好物か？

dialogue_en: Look─over there!
dialogue_jp: 見て　あそこ

dialogue_en: You'll find something tasty for it, won't you?
dialogue_jp: エサのことは　よろしく頼んだよ

dialogue_en: I can't help but feel disappointed when I don't see it for a time─and a little worried...
dialogue_jp:
姿を見せずとも
元気にやっているのならいいのだが

dialogue_en: There should be a chocobo trotting around the ranch somewhere. Maybe have a look over there.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボなら　牧場のあたりにいるはずじゃ
探してみておくれ

dialogue_en: You'll need a chocobo that can manage the climb to get there. It's...pretty tough.
dialogue_jp:
エサを探しに向かうなら
山登りが得意なチョコボが必要ですよ

dialogue_en:
One of the condor's favorite hunting spots
is in the woods nearby.
dialogue_jp:
この先の森に
コンドルが好きな狩り場があります

dialogue_en: Thank you. I appreciate it.
dialogue_jp: ありがたい　助かるよ

dialogue_en: If something smelled enticing enough, though, it might be moved to come and take a closer look, I suspect.
dialogue_jp:
だが　いいニオイがすれば
近くまで様子を見にくるくらいはするはずじゃ

dialogue_en: It's a proud creature─a hunter at heart. We've tried to feed it before, but it seems to prefer catching its own prey.
dialogue_jp:
あのコンドルは　プライドが高くてのう
人間が用意したエサなど　滅多に食べることはない

dialogue_en: But I feel my spirit soar when I watch that condor fly. I may be stuck here, but at least they're still free.
dialogue_jp:
ここでコンドルを眺めていると　ワシも
大空を駆けているような心地になれるんじゃよ

dialogue_en: I never managed to regain the use of my legs, unfortunately.
dialogue_jp: あの時のケガで　ワシの足は動かなくなったが

dialogue_en: I sometimes wonder if it mistook me for its supper.
dialogue_jp: ほほっ　エサと間違えただけかもしれんがな

dialogue_en: I thought I was done for─until that bird snatched me up and flew me to the next town over.
dialogue_jp:
動けなくなったワシを　コンドルが
近くの村まで運んでくれたんだ

dialogue_en: R & R's over, people. Seventh, outside!
dialogue_jp: 自由時間は終わりだ　全員外へ出ろ

dialogue_en:
Sir, this place is for the clean-shaven.
You need to prove that you belong or leave.
dialogue_jp:
隊長　ここはちょっと特殊な酒場でして
メットのままじゃ　ダメなんです

dialogue_en: Wait! He's our new captain; he didn't know!
dialogue_jp: 待ってくれ　この人は俺たちの隊長だ

dialogue_en: Are you three mopheads?
dialogue_jp: 伸ばしてるんじゃないだろうな？

dialogue_en: What are you waiting for? Unless...
dialogue_jp: おまえたち　もしかして

dialogue_en: Well?
dialogue_jp: どうした？

dialogue_en: No scalp, no service.
dialogue_jp: それが俺たちのルールだ

dialogue_en:
If you wanna drink with us,
you're gonna have to lose the helmets.
dialogue_jp: ここで飲むなら　まずはメットを取るんだな

dialogue_en: This your first time?
dialogue_jp: ここは　初めてか？

dialogue_en: Rude... You mind?
dialogue_jp: ルードさん　お願いします

dialogue_en: Yessir!
Yessir!
Yessir!
Yessir!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: Break time's over. Outside. Now.
dialogue_jp: 自由時間終了　外に出るんだ

dialogue_en: Captain! I didn't─I'm sorry, sir!
dialogue_jp: 申し訳ありません　隊長でしたか！

dialogue_en: Check the helmet!
dialogue_jp: メット　メット！

dialogue_en:
Can we help you?
We're kind of in the middle of something.
dialogue_jp: なんですか　いま大事な話をしてるんですけど

dialogue_en: This sucks... Well, we'll just have to make the most of the time we got.
dialogue_jp:
そっか　じゃあ
いっしょに思い出作っちゃおう！

dialogue_en: I know... They haven't even told me where I'm gonna be stationed.
dialogue_jp: ホント　まだ派遣先はわからないけどね

dialogue_en: Shit...
dialogue_jp: うそ！

dialogue_en: So yeah─once the parade's over, I'll be officially joining the counter-terrorism unit.
dialogue_jp:
私　この遠征が終わったら
アバランチの捜索部隊に
異動になるみたい

dialogue_en: You're participating in the president's inauguration parade? Good luck.
dialogue_jp:
その格好　パレードに出るんだろう
がんばるんだな

dialogue_en: This establishment only caters to those who boldly bare their baldness.
dialogue_jp: ここで飲めるのは　すべてをさらけだした者だけだ

dialogue_en: Hey─if you want to drink here, the helmet has to go.
dialogue_jp:
いっしょに飲みたければ
メットを脱いで　証明するんだな

dialogue_en: Sir! Right away, sir!
dialogue_jp: ハッ　了解しました！

dialogue_en: Not in Midgar, that's for sure. Seeing the world maybe?
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルを離れて
あちこち回ってたんでしょ？

dialogue_en: It's past time the president showed himself. Where's he been?
dialogue_jp:
なあ　新社長ってずっと
どこにいたんだ？

dialogue_en: Yessir!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: Get your shit together; parade's about to begin. Everyone, follow me!
dialogue_jp:
パレード会場まで俺が先導する
全員　あとについてこい

dialogue_en: Oh! Um, ah... Captain!
dialogue_jp: えっ　隊長？

dialogue_en: It's the captain!
dialogue_jp: バカ　隊長だ！

dialogue_en: What? We're trying to enjoy the view.
dialogue_jp: なんだ　いま取り込み中だ

dialogue_en: If you find rust poetic...
dialogue_jp: サビついてないといいけど

dialogue_en: An instrument of death, laid to rest! Huh. There is something kinda poetic about that.
dialogue_jp:
いいね　使用を禁じられた巨大兵器
ロマンだね～！

dialogue_en: And totally worthless. We haven't used it in years...not since the war.
dialogue_jp:
でもこれ　ウータイとの協定で
もう何年も発射してないでしょ？

dialogue_en: Damn, look at the size of that thing. It's bigger than big; it's humongous!
dialogue_jp:
これが噂のジュノンの大砲か
想像していたよりもデカいな

dialogue_en: I'm busy being sad...
dialogue_jp: ほっといてくれます？

dialogue_en:
Oh god... Talk about humiliating.
Rude probably hates me...Boss must wanna fire me...
dialogue_jp:
はあ　先輩の足を引っぱっちゃった
しかも　それを主任に見られたかも……

dialogue_en: This is a...difficult time for our city...
dialogue_jp: ミッドガルは現在　苦難の中にあります

dialogue_en: But before we let you go, is there anything you'd like to say to the folks back in Midgar?
dialogue_jp:
最後に　ミッドガルの皆さんに向かって
ひとこといただけますでしょうか

dialogue_en: I'm sure it will!
dialogue_jp: ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: I just hope that hard work comes through in our performance, and that it gives everyone who came out to support our new president something else to cheer about.
dialogue_jp:
一同　最高のパフォーマンスをもって
ルーファウス新社長のご就任を
お祝いしたいと考えています

dialogue_en: Very. All of us in the Seventh have been practicing like crazy. Day in and day out, drilling every little detail.
dialogue_jp:
我らミッドガル第七歩兵連隊は
この日のために
厳しい訓練を行ってきました

dialogue_en: How excited are you to participate in today's parade?
dialogue_jp:
では　パレードへの意気込みを
聞かせてください

dialogue_en: Yessir!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: Practice is over. Time for the real deal. With me.
dialogue_jp:
時間だぞ
俺が先導する　ついてこい

dialogue_en: Captain! I didn't realize! Sorry, sir!
dialogue_jp: 隊長でしたか　失礼しました！

dialogue_en: Not now, buddy. We're busy.
dialogue_jp: 練習中だ　邪魔をしないでくれ

dialogue_en: Guess we just gotta go out there and "introduce" ourselves.
dialogue_jp:
私たちの実力を
見せつけてやろうじゃないの

dialogue_en: True that. I doubt he's got any idea what Midgar units can do.
dialogue_jp:
でも　ミッドガルの部隊のことは
知らないってことだよね

dialogue_en: Good. Kid's got a lot to learn.
dialogue_jp: 現場を　よく知ってるってことか

dialogue_en: Sir!
dialogue_jp: ハッ！

dialogue_en: Break time's over, people. The parade's about to begin. Follow me!
dialogue_jp:
休みは終わりだ
パレード会場へ向かう　ついてこい

dialogue_en: We can't go spilling our secrets to anyone who asks─especially on camera!
dialogue_jp:
秘策を話してしまっては
秘策では　なくなってしまいますからね

dialogue_en: Whoa... Right! I see what you mean, Captain.
dialogue_jp: おお……隊長　さすがです

dialogue_en: We, uh...
dialogue_jp: ああ……

dialogue_en: How do you plan to set your team apart from the competition? Are there any special routines you've been practicing?
dialogue_jp:
今回のパレードは激戦が予想されますが
秘策などがありましたら　教えてもらえませんか？

dialogue_en: Sorry, but...
dialogue_jp: いや……

dialogue_en: I'd love to ask you some questions about the parade.
dialogue_jp:
すこしだけ　インタビューさせていただいて
よろしいでしょうか？

dialogue_en: If you have a moment...
dialogue_jp: ちょうどよかった

dialogue_en: Uh─ Oh, you're their captain! This is perfect!
dialogue_jp: 隊長さんでしたか　失礼しました！

dialogue_en: Good day, Captain!
dialogue_jp: 隊長に敬礼！

dialogue_en:
Oh... Excuse me, but we're
in the middle of an interview.
dialogue_jp: なんですか？　取材中なんですけど

dialogue_en: we're marching for you!
dialogue_jp: 一緒に乗り越えましょう！

dialogue_en: but when you see us marching today, just know this:
dialogue_jp:
