我々は　皆さんの想いを背負って
行進します

dialogue_en: Back during the war, I was running from some Shinra troopers when one of 'em got me in the back. I fell to the ground...
dialogue_jp:
戦争中　敵に追われて迷い込んだ森で
足をすべらせてな

dialogue_en: The condor was looking out for me that day, so I thought I should start looking out for it─keep tabs on its well-being and whatnot.
dialogue_jp:
礼というわけでもないが　こうして観察を続け
生態を研究させてもらってるんじゃ

dialogue_en:
Even saved my life back when I was a lad,
if you can believe it.
dialogue_jp: ワシは若い頃　やつに助けられたことがあっての

dialogue_en: It's a grand old bird. Makes its nest on a small island just a stone's throw from here.
dialogue_jp:
ここからそう遠くない孤島にすまう
雄大で　美しい鳥だ

dialogue_en:
Well!
Far be it from me to turn down such an offer...
dialogue_jp: おお　それは願ってもない申し出だが

dialogue_en:
Well...if you're still looking for volunteers,
we'd be more than happy to help.
dialogue_jp:
そういうことなら
私たちが　お力になれると思います

dialogue_en:
Perhaps. I put a post up on the
noticeboard asking for help, but...
dialogue_jp:
うむ　いちおう
掲示板にも依頼を出してはみたんだが

dialogue_en:
I wonder if we should've given it
something to eat after all.
dialogue_jp: やっぱり　エサを用意しておくべきでしたかね

dialogue_en:
That bird's got me a bit worried.
Haven't seen it in a fair while now...
dialogue_jp:
ここんところ姿を見てないから
どうも　心配でのう

dialogue_en: No, let's wait a little longer, lad.
dialogue_jp: いや　もうすこしだけ待たせてくれ

dialogue_en:
I don't think the condor is going to show today.
Maybe we should head back.
dialogue_jp:
今日はもう　現れそうにないです
そろそろ部屋に戻りましょう

dialogue_en: Oh, that's not really, uh─
dialogue_jp: いや　それはちょっと

dialogue_en: I was just wondering if I could say a few words to my daughter maybe?
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　ちょっと
娘に話しかけてもいいかな？

dialogue_en: It is! Why do you ask?
dialogue_jp: はい　放送しています

dialogue_en: Um...is this being broadcast in Midgar?
dialogue_jp:
あの～　これって
ミッドガルにも流れてるの？

dialogue_en: And may I say what an honor it is to work under such a born leader─and to contribute to his success!
dialogue_jp:
これからは我々社員一同で　しっかりと
新社長を支えていく所存ですよ

dialogue_en: For that is the Shinra creed!
dialogue_jp: なにより　神羅魂がありますよ

dialogue_en: Well, he's very young─but qualified! Very qualified! Just the man to bring us peace and prosperity!
dialogue_jp:
新社長は　お若いのに
リーダーシップがあって
品格や威厳も申し分なし

dialogue_en: What can you tell us about our new president?
dialogue_jp: 新社長の印象などは　いかがでしょうか？

dialogue_en: Then I'm sure the inauguration has a personal significance for you.
dialogue_jp:
本日は　ルーファウス新社長の
就任式も行われますが

dialogue_en: A Shinra employee!
dialogue_jp: 神羅の方でしたか

dialogue_en: To, uh...witness the dawning of a glorious new era for our company!
dialogue_jp:
なんたって
我が社の一大イベントだからね

dialogue_en: No, but I happened to be here on business, so I figured I'd stick around!
dialogue_jp:
いや　出張に寄っただけだが
もちろんパレードも見るつもりだよ

dialogue_en: Yes, you! Did you come to Junon to watch the parade?
dialogue_jp:
はい　本日は
パレードを見にこられたんですか？

dialogue_en: Who? Me?
dialogue_jp: あたしかい？

dialogue_en: Excuse me, sir? Do you think you could spare a minute?
dialogue_jp:
こんにちは～
ちょっとよろしいでしょうか？

dialogue_en: The masterworks mako cannon? Oh yeah, it's as good as bought!
dialogue_jp:
おう　決まってんだろ！
魔晄キャノンのマスターモデルだよ

dialogue_en: But you know, the smaller one's a real beauty too.
dialogue_jp: でも　俺たちの目的は……な？

dialogue_en: They've got everything! Shame I can't take this baby home.
dialogue_jp:
さすが　要塞都市ジュノン！
実戦的な武器がそろってるな
はあ……

dialogue_en: Oh, just a few more seconds!
dialogue_jp: もうすこしだけ　頼むよ

dialogue_en: That's all we have time for...
dialogue_jp: あの～　そろそろ

dialogue_en: And don't play too much Fort Condor.
dialogue_jp: コンドルフォートは　ほどほどにな

dialogue_en: I'm bringing back a ton of presents, so make sure to finish your homework! And your chores! And listen to Mommy!
dialogue_jp:
お土産　たくさん買って帰るから
ママの言うことを聞いて
ちゃんと　勉強するんだぞ？

dialogue_en: Are we still live?
dialogue_jp: あの～

dialogue_en: So you know what? Next family vacation, we'll all come here together!
dialogue_jp:
次は　仕事じゃなくて
家族旅行で来ような　約束だ！

dialogue_en: I only wish you and Mommy were here to see it with me.
dialogue_jp:
本当は　家族でいっしょに
見たかったんだけど

dialogue_en: And it was so big! Way bigger than in your picture books!
dialogue_jp: 想像していたよりも　何倍も大きくてね

dialogue_en: Oh! And I got to see the cannon!
dialogue_jp: そうそう　魔晄キャノンを見たよ

dialogue_en: I miss you very, very much, but I promise I'll be home real soon!
dialogue_jp:
いま　パパはお仕事で
ジュノンに来てま～す

dialogue_en: Sir, please.
dialogue_jp: アナウンサー

dialogue_en: Look, honey! It's me! Daddy's on television!
dialogue_jp:
お～い　見てますか～
パパですよ～！

dialogue_en: Whenever you're ready, sir!
dialogue_jp: お願いしまーす！

dialogue_en: Oh, perfect timing, Captain! Would you mind taking the picture so I can get in there?
dialogue_jp:
隊長　いいところに！
カメラをお願いしてもいいですか？

dialogue_en: C'mon! You gonna pose or what?
dialogue_jp: ほら　しっかりポーズを取れよ～！

dialogue_en: Sorry, Mr. President! Don't mind me.
dialogue_jp: 社長　失礼します！

dialogue_en: Fangirl a little toward the middle then, would ya?
dialogue_jp:
もうちょっと　全体的に
真ん中に寄ってくれ

dialogue_en: Not yet! Let me fangirl for a sec.
dialogue_jp: 待って　まだ心の準備が……

dialogue_en: Alright! Everybody ready?
dialogue_jp: お～い　準備はいいか～？

dialogue_en: Right away, sir!
dialogue_jp: 了解しました！

dialogue_en: Break time's over. Outside. Now.
dialogue_jp: 自由時間終了　外に出るんだ

dialogue_en: Captain! Please forgive me, sir!
dialogue_jp: 隊長　失礼しました！

dialogue_en: Check the helmet, you dipshit!
dialogue_jp: バカ　メット見ろ！

dialogue_en:
Lemme guess: you're here
for the limited model too?
dialogue_jp: なに　あんたも限定キットが欲しいのか？

dialogue_en: Man, I can't wait to put it together.
dialogue_jp: 俺　これを組むのが夢だったんだよ

dialogue_en: That's what I'm talkin' about! Can't find it anywhere else.
dialogue_jp:
だよな　ここでしか買えない
限定キットだもんな～

dialogue_en: I bet she'll love that.
dialogue_jp: 彼女が　かわいそうになってきた

dialogue_en: Yeah, you're right. I should go with the two bayonets.
dialogue_jp:
銃剣がクロスしてるやつのほうが
いいかな

dialogue_en: This brooch has two machine guns on it, and you want to give it to your girlfriend? Bro.
dialogue_jp:
その２丁の機関銃がクロスしてる
ブローチを彼女にあげるの？　正気？

dialogue_en: Let me take a closer look.
dialogue_jp: えっと　確認していい？

dialogue_en: D'you think my girlfriend would like it?
dialogue_jp: ああ　気に入るかな

dialogue_en: It's...fine?
dialogue_jp: 彼女に？

dialogue_en: Hey, whaddya think about this brooch?
dialogue_jp: このブローチなんか　どうかな

dialogue_en: Yessir!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: Break time's over, people. The parade's about to begin. Follow me!
dialogue_jp:
休みは終わりだ
パレード会場へ向かう　ついてこい

dialogue_en:
Wow, Captain... Who knew you were such a pro!?
I might just have to frame this!
dialogue_jp:
さすが隊長　バッチリです
家に飾らせていただきます！

dialogue_en: This looks great! Can't wait to share it.
dialogue_jp: いい感じですね　記念になりました！

dialogue_en: Oh, wow, this is... This is really something, sir.
dialogue_jp:
これは……
隊長　残念です

dialogue_en: Thanks a bunch!
dialogue_jp: ありがとうございます！

dialogue_en: That depends on the readiness of my men.
dialogue_jp: コンディションや状況を見て　判断する

dialogue_en:
What formations do you intend
to utilize for our performance?
dialogue_jp:
本日のパレード　フォーメーションは
どうされるつもりですか？

dialogue_en: Sir! Permission to ask a question?
dialogue_jp: 隊長　お聞きしてもよいでしょうか

dialogue_en: Captain!
dialogue_jp: 隊長！

dialogue_en: Hm... If only we could come up with a formation that allowed all of our troops to shine, the president's commendation would be as good as ours.
dialogue_jp:
む～ん　すべての部隊に
見せ場があるような隊列が生み出せれば
社長賞も確実なんだが

dialogue_en: Nothing beats the riot troopers' Shiva Formation. It's rock solid!
dialogue_jp:
安定感で言えば　鎮圧兵部隊による
『シヴァフォーム』だろ

dialogue_en: I dunno... The grenadiers' Ramuh is pretty tight too.
dialogue_jp:
いや　擲弾兵部隊による
『ラムウフォーム』も捨てがたい

dialogue_en: Call me biased if you wish, but I believe our Ifrit Formation is the pinnacle of perfection.
dialogue_jp:
我ら重火兵部隊が引っ張る
『イフリートフォーム』が
やはり　至高だと思うが

dialogue_en: Yessir!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: R & R's over, people. Seventh, outside!
dialogue_jp: 自由時間は終わりだ　全員外へ出ろ

dialogue_en: Don't bother the captain with your bullshit! Sorry, sir, he's being an idiot.
dialogue_jp:
バカなこと聞いてんじゃないの
すいません　気にしないでください

dialogue_en: Which do you think she'd like more: the machine gun brooch, or the bayonet one?
dialogue_jp:
機関銃のブローチと　銃剣のブローチ
どっちがいいと思います？

dialogue_en: I'm picking out a present for my girlfriend.
dialogue_jp: 彼女への　プレゼントを選んでるんですが

dialogue_en: Oh, Captain! Perfect timing.
dialogue_jp: 隊長　ちょうどよかった！

dialogue_en: Got some fine folios there, Captain!
dialogue_jp: スキルアップ　おめでとうございます！

dialogue_en: You earned it, sir!
dialogue_jp: お疲れ様です！

dialogue_en: Hope you had a restful stay, sir!
dialogue_jp: 隊長がホテルからお戻りだ！

dialogue_en: Hope so, sir!
dialogue_jp: いかがでしたか！

dialogue_en: Find what you needed, sir?
dialogue_jp: お買い物はいかがでしたか！

dialogue_en: Sir!
dialogue_jp: ハッ！

dialogue_en: Seventh─ten-hut!
dialogue_jp: 隊長に敬礼！

dialogue_en: Sir!
dialogue_jp: 万端です！

dialogue_en: Ready to move when you are, sir!
dialogue_jp: 我々は準備万端です！

dialogue_en: Welcome back, sir!
dialogue_jp: ご苦労さまです！

dialogue_en: Sir! Welcome back, sir!
dialogue_jp: 隊長　ご苦労さまです！

dialogue_en: Sir! Yessir!
dialogue_jp: ハッ　失礼しました！

dialogue_en: Is that clear? Now─out!
dialogue_jp: わかったら　すぐに外へ出ろ！

dialogue_en: But you can rest assured that your captain has everything under control.
dialogue_jp:
心配は無用だ
おまえたちは俺についてくればいい

dialogue_en: Sir...
dialogue_jp: コリンさん

dialogue_en:
It's filled with fun facts about our beloved bird.
I'm quite proud of it.
dialogue_jp:
ワシらの発行してるかわら版じゃが
見たことあるじゃろ？

dialogue_en: Surely you've seen our newsletter, haven't you?
dialogue_jp: 『安全第一　コンドル予報』

dialogue_en: Let's just hope it never develops a taste for us!
dialogue_jp: 人が襲われたりしたら　大変じゃからの

dialogue_en:
It's not really a danger to people,
but its hunger can drive it to hunt larger prey.
dialogue_jp:
あやつは悪いやつじゃないが
腹をすかせれば　獲物を襲う

dialogue_en:
We try to catch sight of it every time it takes flight─
make sure it's in good health and all that.
dialogue_jp:
ここからやつの様子を眺めて
定期的に健康状態を確認しとるんじゃよ

dialogue_en: We're on the lookout for the great condor.
dialogue_jp: どでかいコンドルの観察じゃ

dialogue_en:
You certainly do.
So...what're you all looking at?
dialogue_jp:
ほんとに　みなさん
ここでなにをしてるんですか？

dialogue_en:
Oho! Care to join us, young lady?
We've got a lovely breeze blowing today.
dialogue_jp:
おお　お客さんかな？
今日は良い風が吹いておるのう

dialogue_en: Hey, uh, you wouldn't happen to know anyone in the SRC, would you? If you do, I'd kill for an introduction!
dialogue_jp:
みなさんは　連絡会とは繋がってないんですか？
ご存知のことがあれば　教えてくださいよ

dialogue_en: Almost too much to keep track of─but I try!
dialogue_jp: 僕も絶賛　情報収集中です

dialogue_en: Hey there, buds. Things've gotten pretty crazy lately, huh? What a world!
dialogue_jp:
あっ　みなさん
なんだか　急に騒がしくなっちゃいましたねえ

dialogue_en: Say, you should do a seminar or something─teach us how to fight the power. Stick it to the man!
dialogue_jp:
そうだ　今度ここで勉強会を開いてくださいよ
報酬は弾みます

dialogue_en: How's business? Making bank?
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋のお仕事は順調です？

dialogue_en: Hey there! Goes without saying, but you dudes are always welcome here at the Crow's Nest.
dialogue_jp:
ようこそ　サイドジュノンへ
みなさんなら　いつでも大歓迎です！

dialogue_en: You might even catch a glimpse of the great condor if you're lucky!
dialogue_jp:
運が良ければ
コンドルの姿が見れるかもしれませんよ

dialogue_en: It's a big ask. But we can do it! Together!
dialogue_jp: しかし　恐れることはない！

dialogue_en: Failure is not an option!
dialogue_jp: 失敗は許されないだろう

dialogue_en: And we cannot─we will not─let our great city of Midgar down!
dialogue_jp:
我々の肩には
ミッドガル市民の期待がかかっている

dialogue_en: And we, um...
dialogue_jp: そして……

dialogue_en:
As we march...the eyes of the whole world...
will be...watching us.
dialogue_jp:
俺たちは　世界中が注目するなか
行進することになる

dialogue_en: Listen up!
dialogue_jp: これから

dialogue_en: You're on!
dialogue_jp: クラウド！

dialogue_en: Midgar Seventh Infantry! Attention!
dialogue_jp: ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊　気をつけ！

dialogue_en: Sir, yessir!
dialogue_jp: そろいました！

dialogue_en: Midgar Seventh Infantry! Attention!
dialogue_jp: ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊　そろいました！

dialogue_en: Ready to go, sir!
dialogue_jp: 集合しました！

dialogue_en: All troopers present and accounted for, sir!
dialogue_jp: 隊長　全員集合しました！

dialogue_en: Can't wait, sir!
dialogue_jp: ごちそうさまです！

dialogue_en: Looking forward to a celebratory drink, sir!
dialogue_jp:
祝賀会場の予約
ありがとうございます！

dialogue_en: First class, sir!
dialogue_jp: おめでとうございます！

dialogue_en: Of course.
dialogue_jp: はい……

dialogue_en: Don't wanna be late, sir.
dialogue_jp: エルジュノンへ行きましょう

dialogue_en: Captain. The parade's about to start.
dialogue_jp: 隊長　そろそろ会場へ

dialogue_en: We are!!!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: I can't hear you!
dialogue_jp: 俺たちは　最強だ！

dialogue_en: We are!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: Who's gonna show the rest of them how it's done!?
dialogue_jp: 俺たちは　誰にも負けない！

dialogue_en: Yessir!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: And we will return home as champions!
dialogue_jp: それ以外に　このパレードのゴールはない

dialogue_en: Today is our day. It was made for the Seventh Infantry! We will win that commendation for our city!
dialogue_jp:
俺たちは優勝するために　ここに来た
もちろん　社長賞もいただく

dialogue_en: Now bring it home!
dialogue_jp: 最後に決めて

dialogue_en: Uh... Right!
dialogue_jp: ああ……

dialogue_en: Isn't that right, sir?
dialogue_jp: ですよね　隊長！

dialogue_en:
Because we have our captain to guide us!
Look to him─trust in him─and he will lead us to victory, so long as we follow!
dialogue_jp:
隊長が先頭に立ち　みなを引っ張ってくださる
我々は隊長を信じ　ついていけばいいのだ

dialogue_en: Wow...
dialogue_jp: かわいい

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: You look...
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: Hah hah, very funny. I coulda shot you!
dialogue_jp:
なんだ　おまえらかよ
おどろかすなよ！

dialogue_en: Hey there! I was just checking my uniform. For lint! Y'all know how it is!
dialogue_jp:
なんだよ　オレはただの水兵だぜ？
怪しいもんじゃねえ

dialogue_en: Hey!
dialogue_jp: こら！

dialogue_en: No way. Is that who I think it is?
dialogue_jp: あれ　もしかしてバレット？

dialogue_en: Aw, how'd you know it was us?
dialogue_jp: あれ　バレてる

dialogue_en: Nice uniforms.
dialogue_jp: 似合っているじゃないか

dialogue_en: Wasn't feelin' it at first, but I'm startin' to appreciate the sheer audacity of us playin' dress-up!
dialogue_jp:
しっかし　大胆な作戦だな
気に入った　パレード応援するぜ！

dialogue_en: Long as we keep our heads down, we'll be okay.
dialogue_jp: 神羅にまぎれたら　なんとかなるだろう

dialogue_en: There's a lotta troopers in town, especially by the port. 'Cause of the crowds no doubt.
dialogue_jp:
港までの警備はそこそこ厳しいが
人が多いからな

dialogue_en: Think ya mean "I'm rooting for you."
dialogue_jp: 応援　よろしくね

dialogue_en: I'm sure you will!
dialogue_jp: そりゃ　すげえな

dialogue_en: We're gonna win the president's commendation.
dialogue_jp: 社長賞　狙っちゃうんだよ

dialogue_en: Yeah. Nobody's batted an eye.
dialogue_jp: ああ　意外となじんでいる

dialogue_en: look like you're fittin' in.
dialogue_jp: うまくやってるみてえだな

dialogue_en:
Anyway, I checked out the way to the port.
And y'all, uh...
dialogue_jp: 港の行き方は確認した　そっちは……

dialogue_en: Okay, I get it.
dialogue_jp: ごめん　ごめん

dialogue_en: It's not like I had a choice! Nothing else fit!
dialogue_jp: オレの苦肉の策を笑うな！

dialogue_en:
The parade is scheduled to begin shortly.
I trust your team is ready, Captain?
dialogue_jp:
パレードが　ほどなく始まる
心残りはないだろうな？

dialogue_en: And on time. Good.
dialogue_jp: 今度は　間に合ったようだな

dialogue_en: Midgar, Seventh Infantry, reporting as ordered, ma'am!
dialogue_jp: ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊　到着いたしました！

dialogue_en: Uh, Captain? Aren't you forgetting our orders?
dialogue_jp: 隊長　お仕事忘れてますよ？

dialogue_en: Should we find the rest of the troop first, sir?
dialogue_jp: 部隊の人たち　集めないと

dialogue_en:
I may be clad in fur...
but that doesn't mean I'll purr...
dialogue_jp: 毛皮をまといし者は……なめられたら終わりだ

dialogue_en:
Those children won't stop staring.
If they so much as try to pet me...
dialogue_jp:
子供たちが　私を狙っている
なでまわす気マンマンだ

dialogue_en: Though this place is starting to take its toll...
dialogue_jp: この街も　早く出たいものだな

dialogue_en: Leaving the mako-soaked streets of Midgar behind has done wonders for my faculties.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄の街を出て
本来の能力が戻りつつあるらしい

dialogue_en: That is some nose you got there, Red.
dialogue_jp: レッド　鼻もすごいんだ

dialogue_en: By your scent.
dialogue_jp: ニオイでわかる

dialogue_en:
If you ever get the chance,
you oughta swing by the hill too.
dialogue_jp:
お時間があれば
丘のほうにも寄ってみてください

dialogue_en: Feel like we should probably rope this place off. Don't want anyone else wandering inside and making trouble.
dialogue_jp:
この灯台は封鎖しておきます
また誰かが迷い込んだら　危ないですし

dialogue_en: Avalanche by day, traveling mercs by night. I dunno how you dudes find the time to do it all!
dialogue_jp:
アバランチに　なんでも屋ですか
いや～　僕たちももっと頑張らないとですね

dialogue_en:
But I hope you'll lend me a hand
the next time I need help!
dialogue_jp: なにかあったら　また力を貸してくださいね

dialogue_en:
I can't believe you didn't say anything!
Best buds don't keep secrets, y'know.
dialogue_jp:
いや～　最初から言ってくれればいいのに
水くさいなあ

dialogue_en: Oh yeah, Rhonda was telling me you do merc work on the side too. For real?
dialogue_jp:
それよりロドナーさんから聞きましたよ
みなさんも　なんでも屋をやってるって！

dialogue_en:
Bummer. Welp, guess we should
get this place cleaned up.
dialogue_jp:
そうですか
じゃあ　ここは片付けなくちゃ

dialogue_en: She moved on.
dialogue_jp: 出ていった

dialogue_en: Out of curiosity, what happened to that merc?
dialogue_jp: それで　なんでも屋さんはどうなりました？

dialogue_en: but it looks like I worried for nothing. I should've known Avalanche could hold their own!
dialogue_jp:
いや～でも　心配無用でしたね
さすが　アバランチのみなさん！

dialogue_en:
I saw the monsters headed your way...
and couldn't help but worry...
dialogue_jp:
変な放送が聞こえて外を見たら
モンスターがウヨウヨ移動してて

dialogue_en: My dudes!
dialogue_jp: みなさ～ん！

dialogue_en: You and me both.
dialogue_jp: 同感だ

dialogue_en: Gotta say, somethin' about her really rubs me the wrong way.
dialogue_jp: オイラ　あの人ちょっとニガテかも

dialogue_en: I wouldn't wish her on my worst enemy.
dialogue_jp: 距離を置きたい種類の人間だ

dialogue_en: Okay, later!
dialogue_jp: じゃね～！

dialogue_en: It's a new era. Let's ring it in with a bang.
dialogue_jp: 時代が変わったことを教えてやれ

dialogue_en: And?
dialogue_jp: かまわん

dialogue_en: Even a ceremonial display would constitute a violation of the cease-fire. Wutai would view it as a willful act of aggression.
dialogue_jp:
若　この大砲の射撃演習は休止中です
ウータイとの停戦条件のひとつですからな

dialogue_en: But...but, sir...
dialogue_jp: しかしながら……

dialogue_en: Let's blow off the dust.
dialogue_jp: 今日の式典で撃て

dialogue_en: Five years ago, sir.
dialogue_jp: ５年前であります！

dialogue_en: When did we last use her?
dialogue_jp: 最近撃ったのは　いつだ？

dialogue_en: Let's see what you've got. Now...begin!
dialogue_jp: 準備はいいな　では始め！

dialogue_en: Let's see what you've got. Now...begin!
dialogue_jp: 準備はいいな　では始め！

dialogue_en: You rounded up the whole team, Captain...
dialogue_jp: もう部隊はそろっているはずだが

dialogue_en: All set, then?
dialogue_jp: 準備はいいか？

dialogue_en: People have turned out in droves to catch a glimpse of the new president─Rufus Shinra!
dialogue_jp:
みな　ルーファウス新社長の登場を
いまかいまかと　待ちわびています

dialogue_en: As you can see, the streets of Junon are abuzz with excitement!
dialogue_jp: ご覧ください　この人の数　そして熱気

dialogue_en: Welcome to the celebration of the century.
dialogue_jp: ただいま私は　エルジュノンに来ております

dialogue_en: Mr. President. It's time.
dialogue_jp: 社長　そろそろお時間です

dialogue_en: Nothing like fireworks to rouse the spirits.
dialogue_jp: ドンパチは　気分が高揚しますからな

dialogue_en: Very good, sir! Very good.
dialogue_jp: さすがは若　すばらしい！

dialogue_en: Wanna leave with mama? C'mon, you know you do...
dialogue_jp: いっしょにくる？　ほら　おいで～

dialogue_en: Hey!
dialogue_jp: おい

dialogue_en: Anyway, I'm gonna split, but I'm sure you can take it from here. Catch ya later, fellow merc!
dialogue_jp:
じゃあわたし　もう行くから
あと片付けよろしくね　社員くん！

dialogue_en:
Oh, well...
Guess I'll just have to close up shop and clear out!
dialogue_jp: 仕方ない　ここでの営業はあきらめるとしよう

dialogue_en: I'm surprised it took you this long to figure it out.
dialogue_jp: 最初から　わかりそうな気もするけど

dialogue_en: I'm glad you learned something.
dialogue_jp: 学びがあって良かったな

dialogue_en: And now I know why I wasn't getting any customers: nobody could get past all those uglies.
dialogue_jp:
こんなモンスターウジャウジャな場所じゃ
そりゃ　お客さんなんてこないか～

dialogue_en: Whew! Glad that's over.
dialogue_jp: はあ　助かった～

dialogue_en: Okay, tick tock, tick tock! The boss's gettin' bored and she's not payin' you to have fun out there!
dialogue_jp:
ま～だで～すか～？
待ってるのも飽きたよお

dialogue_en: Cleave 'em in two, my loyal subordinate! Wish I could film this; it'd make for a great commercial!
dialogue_jp:
いいねえ　さすが自慢の社員
その調子その調子～！

dialogue_en: These losers oughta be easy pickin's for a merc like you!
dialogue_jp:
こんなやつら
なんでも屋さんなら楽勝だよね～

dialogue_en: I saw you take that hit, y'know! And they call you the pro? Psh!
dialogue_jp:
あっ　油断してたでしょいま
気をつけてよ～？

dialogue_en: C'mon, get rid of those things already, wouldja!? I thought you were supposed to be good at your job!
dialogue_jp:
ほら　なんでも屋さん
よそ見してないで　もっと働いて！

dialogue_en: with a single blast of Junon's famous cannon, Rufus Shinra has announced his arrival!
dialogue_jp:
ジュノンのシンボルである魔晄キャノン砲が
なんと　発射されました！

dialogue_en: Ladies and gentlemen...
dialogue_jp: なんということでしょう

dialogue_en: Fire!
dialogue_jp: 撃てーーー！

dialogue_en: Welcome to the new world order.
dialogue_jp: さあ　新時代の幕開けだ

dialogue_en: Ready to fire, sir.
dialogue_jp: 砲兵

dialogue_en: Uh... The president has stopped.
dialogue_jp: どうしたのでしょう？

dialogue_en: Wow! Can you even hear me over this crowd!?
dialogue_jp: お聞きいただけますでしょうか　この歓声

dialogue_en: There he is, folks! Rufus Shinra!
dialogue_jp: ここで　ルーファウス新社長の登場です！

dialogue_en: Their incredible skills are truly a sight to behold!
dialogue_jp: 見てください　あの華麗なドライビング！

dialogue_en: And here comes Midgar's mobile unit!
dialogue_jp: 続いて　バイク部隊の登場です

dialogue_en: Formation...change!
dialogue_jp: フォーメーションチェンジ！

dialogue_en: Final sequence...begin!
dialogue_jp: 最終演舞　はじめ！

dialogue_en: And...march!
dialogue_jp: 前進　はじめ！

dialogue_en: Left...face!
dialogue_jp: 左向け　左！

dialogue_en: Drill team...halt!
dialogue_jp: 全体　止まれ！

dialogue_en: Final sequence...begin!
dialogue_jp: 最終演舞　はじめ！

dialogue_en: Formation...change!
dialogue_jp: フォーメーションチェンジ！

dialogue_en: Left...face!
dialogue_jp: 左向け　左！

dialogue_en: Final sequence...begin!
dialogue_jp: 最終演舞　はじめ！

dialogue_en: Formation...change!
dialogue_jp: フォーメーションチェンジ！

dialogue_en: First sequence...begin!
dialogue_jp: 第１演舞　はじめ！

dialogue_en: Drill team...halt!
dialogue_jp: 全体　止まれ！

dialogue_en: Second sequence...begin!
dialogue_jp: 第２演舞　はじめ！

dialogue_en: First sequence...begin!
dialogue_jp: 第１演舞　はじめ！

dialogue_en: Left...face!
dialogue_jp: 左向け　左！

dialogue_en: And folks here seem to agree. The crowd is loving it!
dialogue_jp:
隊員たちの気合いの入った演舞に
歓声があがっています

dialogue_en: Frankly, I'm already blown away!
dialogue_jp: これは　最高の滑り出しとなりました！

dialogue_en: Let's see what they do next!
dialogue_jp: 引き続き　頑張ってもらいたいですね

dialogue_en: Based on that, the Seventh is off to a solid start, but can they build on this beginning?
dialogue_jp:
上々の滑り出しといったところでしょうか
ポテンシャルの高さは感じられました

dialogue_en: Perhaps the captain's orders weren't clear enough? Let's hope they manage to turn it around!
dialogue_jp:
チーム全体の動きがバラバラでしたね
次までに　立て直してもらいたいところです

dialogue_en: It seems like a lot of you think the team is marching to the beat of their own drum...
dialogue_jp: 隊長の指示が　うまく伝わっていないのでしょうか

dialogue_en: And here they are now!
dialogue_jp: さあ　結果はどうでしょう

dialogue_en: Our judges are currently tabulating the votes from you, the viewers.
dialogue_jp: 現在　視聴者の皆様からの投票が集計されています

dialogue_en: That concludes the first part of today's performance by the Seventh Infantry drill team.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊による
最初のパフォーマンスが終了しました

dialogue_en: Troopers of the Seventh Infantry, make us proud!
dialogue_jp: ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊に　ご注目ください！

dialogue_en:
I can't wait to see what kind of performance
they'll put on today!
dialogue_jp:
はたして　どのようなパフォーマンスを
見せてくれるのか

dialogue_en: determined to win the presidential commendation for everyone back home in Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルの復興を後押しするため
必ず　社長賞を持ち帰ると

dialogue_en:
The captain and his team have trained
long and hard...
dialogue_jp: 隊長は　力強く宣言していました

dialogue_en:
Ladies and gentlemen, I give you
Midgar's Seventh Infantry!
dialogue_jp: ミッドガルの精鋭　第七歩兵連隊の登場です！

dialogue_en: You join us in Starboard Junon as the final team of the day takes their position.
dialogue_jp:
エルジュノンで開催中のパレードも
次が最後の部隊となります

dialogue_en: Drill team shift!
dialogue_jp: 隊列を変えるぞ！

dialogue_en:
And with that, we've reached the end of
the Seventh Infantry's performance.
dialogue_jp:
たったいま
パレードの全パフォーマンスが終了しました

dialogue_en: Keep this up and the Seventh might well be destined for glory. I wouldn't bet against them!
dialogue_jp:
彼らなら　このままパレードのラストを
華麗に締めくくってくれることでしょう

dialogue_en: Universal acclaim! And little wonder, given the skill and coordination on display!
dialogue_jp:
すばらしいです！
統率のとれた美しい演舞に　言葉が出ません

dialogue_en: Here's hoping they're setting the stage for an impressive finale!
dialogue_jp: この調子なら　最後は大爆発が期待できそうです

dialogue_en: Clearly, there were a few moments when they weren't quite in sync, but the captain mostly kept his team on track.
dialogue_jp:
なんとか失敗なく乗り切りきりましたね
隊長の指示にも　熱が入っていました

dialogue_en: But it's not too late for them to redeem themselves!
dialogue_jp: 最後の巻き返しに　期待したいところです

dialogue_en: It pains me to say it, but if this is the best they can do after all their training, I'd hate to see how they perform on the battlefield.
dialogue_jp:
これは　訓練の成果がうまく出ていないようです
動きにキレがまったくありませんでしたね

dialogue_en: So, let's take a look at the results!
dialogue_jp: さあ　結果はどうでしょう

dialogue_en: As ever, our judges have been busy tallying all the votes we've received.
dialogue_jp: 現在　視聴者の皆様からの投票が集計されています

dialogue_en: And with that, the Seventh Infantry concludes the second part of their performance.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊の
セカンドパフォーマンスが終了しました

dialogue_en: The only question is how they're going to top this!
dialogue_jp: これは　次のパフォーマンスも楽しみですね

dialogue_en: But if we don't stop those monsters, we're all done for. C'mon!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド　行こう
このままじゃ　オイラたちも危ないよ

dialogue_en: Wait─our lives are in as much danger as hers now. We have to fight.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド　このままでは我々も危険だ
行くしかない

dialogue_en: Pass.
dialogue_jp: いらない

dialogue_en:
C'mon, don't be petty...
Oh! I'll even give you some of these!
dialogue_jp:
そう言わずに～！
あっほら　これあげるから

dialogue_en: So hire yourself. You're a pro, aren'tcha?
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋なら　自分でなんとかしろ

dialogue_en: Please, Cloud! You gotta help me! After all, nobody knows how to take down monsters like a merc.
dialogue_jp:
なんでも屋さん　お願い！
モンスター退治　得意だよね

dialogue_en: Really? You're kidding, right?
dialogue_jp: たぶん　この音のせいだよ

dialogue_en:
I'm sure your aggressive advertising
has nothing to do with it.
dialogue_jp: おそらく　この不愉快な音のせいだろうな

dialogue_en:
Wait, monsters!?
But what could've drawn them here?
dialogue_jp:
えっ　うそ
モンスター呼んじゃった？

dialogue_en: Pretty good, right? Folks'll be lining up in no time!
dialogue_jp: どうどう　宣伝効果バツグンでしょ？

dialogue_en: She's open for business, so come on down♪
dialogue_jp: なんでもやります　なんでも屋～♪

dialogue_en:
There's a new merc─a new merc in town
She's, like, the best─the best around♪
dialogue_jp:
なんでも屋　なんでも屋
新装開店　なんでも屋～♪

dialogue_en: But not to worry! I put my creative skills to work and came up with this ditty!
dialogue_jp:
ってことで　さっそく
こんなのも用意してみたんだよね～

dialogue_en: And if we don't get one really soon, your CEO and PR head is as good as done!
dialogue_jp:
このままじゃ　なんでも屋の社長兼
宣伝部長の名がすたる！

dialogue_en: Right! Anyway, as I was saying, I'm putting in all this work for us, yet we haven't managed to bring in a single customer!
dialogue_jp:
残念といえば　こんなに頑張ってるのに
いまだにお客さんゼロでさ～

dialogue_en: Maybe they're still warming up...
dialogue_jp: 動きが鈍いですね

dialogue_en: They don't seem very coordinated...
dialogue_jp: まったく統率が取れていません

dialogue_en: Is something wrong?
dialogue_jp: どうしたのでしょう

dialogue_en: Coming up next, the moment of truth for our competitors. Which team will take home the commendation? Stay tuned to find out!
dialogue_jp:
はたして　社長賞はどの部隊が手にするのか
注目の表彰式は　このあとすぐです！

dialogue_en: There's no denying it, folks─that was a performance for the ages!
dialogue_jp:
彼らのパフォーマンスは
神羅の歴史に刻まれることでしょう

dialogue_en: Judging by this response, it's clear that Midgar's Seventh Infantry has made a lot of new fans!
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊に
割れんばかりの拍手と歓声が送られています

dialogue_en: Listen to that crowd!
dialogue_jp: お聞きください

dialogue_en: But the question remains, will their efforts be enough to impress our new president? Let's wait and see!
dialogue_jp:
この堅実なパフォーマンスを　ルーファウス社長が
どのように評価するのか楽しみですね

dialogue_en: In the end then, Midgar's Seventh provided a satisfying conclusion to today's parade.
dialogue_jp:
ラストを飾ったミッドガル第七歩兵連隊は
手堅くまとめてきましたね

dialogue_en: But while they weren't able to win you over─who knows? The president may feel differently!
dialogue_jp:
なんとも盛り下がる最後となってしまいました
しかし　最終審査はまだわかりません

dialogue_en: Oh dear... It looks like the team had a day to forget out there. At least in the eyes of the public.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊の演舞は
正直　期待ハズレでしたね

dialogue_en: And now─let's see the results!
dialogue_jp: さあ　結果はどうでしょう

dialogue_en: For the final time, the judges are tallying the votes from you the viewers.
dialogue_jp: 現在　視聴者の皆様からの投票が集計されています

dialogue_en: They're in perfect sync!
dialogue_jp: 完全にシンクロしています！

dialogue_en: They've still got a chance.
dialogue_jp: まずまずといったところです

dialogue_en: Do they seem a tad nervous?
dialogue_jp: 緊張しているのでしょうか？

dialogue_en: It all looks a little stiff.
dialogue_jp: すこし動きが硬い気がします

dialogue_en: It's good, but they can surely do better.
dialogue_jp: 彼らなら　もっとやれると思います

dialogue_en: That's not bad at all!
dialogue_jp: 調子は悪くなさそうです

dialogue_en: This is looking promising!
dialogue_jp: これは期待できそうですね

dialogue_en: They're doing quite well.
dialogue_jp: まだまだ　いけるはずです

dialogue_en: Solid work!
dialogue_jp: 堅実な動きです

dialogue_en: So far, so good!
dialogue_jp: なかなかいいですね！

dialogue_en: That's unfortunate.
dialogue_jp: これは　ひどいですね

dialogue_en: They're not in step.
dialogue_jp: 呼吸が合っていません

dialogue_en: Oh, that's going to cost them.
dialogue_jp: 細かなミスが目立ちます

dialogue_en: They did practice, right?
dialogue_jp: 完全に訓練不足ですね

dialogue_en: I'm not sure they know what they're doing...
dialogue_jp: 隊長の指示が伝わっていないようです

dialogue_en: The captain needs to rally his troops...
dialogue_jp: いちど立て直したほうがよさそうです

dialogue_en: My friends...
dialogue_jp: さて　諸君

dialogue_en:
We're back on the clock.
I trust you know the mission by now.
dialogue_jp: 休みは終わりだ　黒マントの追跡を再開する

dialogue_en: Understood.
dialogue_jp: 了解しました

dialogue_en:
Leave them to me.
I want you and your people tracking the robes.
dialogue_jp: やつらと話をする　おまえは黒マントを追え

dialogue_en: Yes, sir... Around the clock. They remain unaware.
dialogue_jp:
はい　大丈夫です
監視には気づかれていません

dialogue_en: You're watching history in the making, folks!
dialogue_jp: これは伝説のパフォーマンスになりそうです！

dialogue_en: Their movements are so crisp and clean!
dialogue_jp: すべての動きにキレがありますね

dialogue_en: Practice makes perfect.
dialogue_jp: ノーミスじゃないですか？

dialogue_en: What a performance!
dialogue_jp: すばらしい演舞です

dialogue_en: I can't take my eyes off them!
dialogue_jp: これは目が離せません

dialogue_en: It all looks so effortless!
dialogue_jp: 軽やかな動きですね

dialogue_en: That practice is paying off.
dialogue_jp: 部隊の絆を感じます

dialogue_en: Such excellent direction!
dialogue_jp: 隊長の指示が完璧です！

dialogue_en: Come on up, Commander!
dialogue_jp: 指揮官　前へ

dialogue_en: Midgar's Seventh Infantry!
dialogue_jp: ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊！

dialogue_en: The prize for outstanding performance goes to...
dialogue_jp: 最優秀パフォーマンス賞は――

dialogue_en: For our first award, we will recognize the division whose exemplary display eclipsed all others'.
dialogue_jp:
まずは　総合部門より
最優秀パフォーマンス賞を発表する

dialogue_en:
Of course, some among you are
deserving of special praise.
dialogue_jp: それでは　これより表彰式を執り行う

dialogue_en: Your passion and patriotism is beyond question─and I know our president can't wait to thank you all.
dialogue_jp:
みなの情熱と忠誠心を目の当たりにして
新社長も　大変喜ばれている

dialogue_en: Allow me to congratulate you on a stirring performance. You've done your company proud.
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス新社長就任祝賀パレード
ご苦労であった

dialogue_en: Okay, scratch that.
dialogue_jp: ざんねん……

dialogue_en: ...Yikes!
dialogue_jp: ううう　こわっ！

dialogue_en: C'mere─come to mama!
dialogue_jp: ほら　おいで～

dialogue_en: Hey─y'know, I've always wanted a pet of my own!
dialogue_jp: ねえキミ　わたしのペットにならない？

dialogue_en: Aw, aren't you just the most adorable boy!
dialogue_jp: うわ～　すっごい　かっわい～！

dialogue_en: Uh, is that a problem?
dialogue_jp: 獣がしゃべったら　ダメなの？

dialogue_en: Indeed.
dialogue_jp: よろしく

dialogue_en: What!? Shut. Up. This thing can talk!?
dialogue_jp: うわ　なにこの子　しゃべれるの？

dialogue_en: ...Sorry.
dialogue_jp: あっ　ごめん

dialogue_en: Ahem... Allergies.
dialogue_jp: ……すまない

dialogue_en: Sounds like a one-way ticket to bankruptcy to me.
dialogue_jp: そんなんじゃ　廃業まっしぐらだよ

dialogue_en: what's your brand? Tall, blond, and "not interested"?
dialogue_jp: じみ　くらっ　ぶあいそ

dialogue_en: But...like...
dialogue_jp: キリエ

dialogue_en: Midgar's mobile unit!
dialogue_jp: ハイウェイバイク警備隊！

dialogue_en: Congratulations once again to the team, and to Midgar.
dialogue_jp: ジュノンの街に　称賛の拍手が鳴りやみません

dialogue_en: Even the Seventh's unflappable commander can't help but crack a smile, as she warmly acknowledges the crowd.
dialogue_jp:
いつもは厳しい指揮官も
笑顔を浮かべ　観客の声援に応えています

dialogue_en: Director Heidegger of Public Security is here from Midgar to present this prestigious award.
dialogue_jp:
ハイデッカー統括より
ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊へ盾が授与されました

dialogue_en: After congratulating her captain on a job well done, the commander makes for the stage.
dialogue_jp:
指揮官が　隊長と力強く握手を交わし
壇上へと向かいます

dialogue_en: And from their joyful reactions, it's clear how much this means to them.
dialogue_jp: 隊員たちが抱き合い　喜びの声をあげています

dialogue_en: Midgar's Seventh Infantry has won the prize for outstanding performance in today's parade!
dialogue_jp:
最優秀パフォーマンス賞は
ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊が受賞しました！

dialogue_en: Captain Roche, once more showing off his breathtaking skills!
dialogue_jp:
ローチェ隊長とバイクは
一心同体ということでしょうか

dialogue_en: And there he goes again, folks!
dialogue_jp: おおっと　これはすごい！

dialogue_en: Aye aye!
dialogue_jp: オーケー！

dialogue_en: Come on up, Commander!
dialogue_jp: 指揮官　前へ

dialogue_en: Commendation's what counts.
dialogue_jp: 狙いは　社長賞だ

dialogue_en:
Captain Roche already seemed pleased
with his performance─but this award has really
got his motor running!
dialogue_jp:
部隊を率いた　ソルジャーのローチェ隊長が
喜びのエンジン音を響かせています

dialogue_en:
And there you have it, folks!
Midgar's mobile unit takes the prize!
dialogue_jp:
最優秀パフォーマンス賞は
ハイウェイバイク警備隊が勝ち取りました！

dialogue_en: Since you suck so bad at self-promotion, I had to pick up the slack and come up with an ad campaign.
dialogue_jp:
仕方ないから　わたしがこうして
大々的に宣伝してあげてるってわけ

dialogue_en:
Zero publicity, which means zero clients!
I mean, this is Business 101!
dialogue_jp:
知名度ゼロ　仕事の依頼もゼロ
ホント　まいっちゃってさ～

dialogue_en: I came all the way out to Junon to strike it rich, but nobody knows we're here...or even that we exist!
dialogue_jp:
せっかくジュノンにまで進出したっていうのに
だ～れも　なんでも屋さんのこと知らないんだもん

dialogue_en: And besides─arguably this whole mess can be laid at your feet, mister.
dialogue_jp:
それに　元はといえば
ぜ～んぶ　クラウドのせいなんだから

dialogue_en: What even is a merc? Nobody really knows!
dialogue_jp: あ～　いっぺんに言われてもわかりませ～ん

dialogue_en:
And quit calling yourself a merc.
You're giving the real ones a bad name.
dialogue_jp:
勝手に　なんでも屋を名乗るな
いますぐここから立ち去れ

dialogue_en: Not in a million years.
dialogue_jp: 社員になるつもりはない

dialogue_en: Ah, I've got it! Why don't you come work for me? I could use another merc, and you're not half bad.
dialogue_jp:
あっそうだ　クラウドもここで働く？
歓迎するよ　新入社員くん

dialogue_en: I swore to myself I'd make a killing outside the city so I could rub it in her face!
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルの外でガッツリ稼いで
見返してやろうと思って

dialogue_en: Um...just a little business venture? Grandma went off on another one of her tirades.
dialogue_jp:
あ～　ちょっとしたビジネス？
おばあちゃんとケンカしちゃってさ

dialogue_en: Kyrie... What the hell are you doing here?
dialogue_jp:
キリエ……
ここでなにをしている

dialogue_en: Oh my gosh. Cloud!?
dialogue_jp: えっうそ　クラウド？

dialogue_en:
And quit calling yourself a merc.
You're giving the real ones a bad name.
dialogue_jp:
勝手に　なんでも屋を名乗るな
いますぐここから立ち去れ

dialogue_en: Not your "fellow" anything.
dialogue_jp: 社員になった覚えはない

dialogue_en: Well, thanks for makin' the trip out here to say hi, fellow merc.
dialogue_jp: こんなところまで出張　ごくろうさまでーす

dialogue_en:
Some may feel that I am too young─
too inexperienced─to lead us.
dialogue_jp:
新たな社長が　私のような若造で
不安に感じている者もいるだろう

dialogue_en: We live in challenging times.
dialogue_jp: この中継を見ている者の中には

dialogue_en: So I invite you to join me in a moment of silence for a great man gone too soon.
dialogue_jp:
そんな　偉大な父に
まずは感謝の意を表したい

dialogue_en:
And transformed all of our lives with
the miracle of mako.
dialogue_jp: みなに　魔晄という名の富をもたらした

dialogue_en: single-handedly turned a small arms manufacturer into the greatest company the world has ever seen.
dialogue_jp:
ただの　兵器開発会社でしかなかった神羅を
世界一の企業へと発展させ

dialogue_en: The late president, my father...
dialogue_jp: 私の父である　プレジデントは

dialogue_en: If you would do the honors, sir?
dialogue_jp: それでは若　どうぞ

dialogue_en: Next, we have the president's commendation.
dialogue_jp: 続いて　社長賞を発表する

dialogue_en: The only thing louder than their motorcycles is the crowd's thunderous applause!
dialogue_jp:
ハイウェイバイク警備隊を称える拍手が
ジュノンに鳴り響いています

dialogue_en: No one can deny the spirit of the mobile unit's fearless leader!
dialogue_jp:
このバイク愛には
ほかの部隊も納得するしかありません

dialogue_en: Midgar's Seventh Infantry!
dialogue_jp: ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊！

dialogue_en: The award goes to...
dialogue_jp: 社長賞は――

dialogue_en: Now, I have a commendation to present.
dialogue_jp: それでは　社長賞を発表する

dialogue_en: My friends─place your trust in me, and together will we achieve our dream of a better world.
dialogue_jp:
さあ　諸君
新たな世界を　一緒に創ろうではないか

dialogue_en: This I do solemnly swear before you all, as president of the Shinra Electric Power Company.
dialogue_jp:
高潔で　揺るぎない精神をもって
責務をまっとうすることを　ここに誓う

dialogue_en: Follow me, and we will reach our promised land.
dialogue_jp: みなが　約束の地に辿りつけるまで

dialogue_en: And the first of a long, arduous journey which we must take together.
dialogue_jp:
私が　道を示そう
恐れずについてきてほしい

dialogue_en: For today is a new day.
dialogue_jp: 今日が　その第一歩となる

dialogue_en:
Yesterday is behind us.
We must look instead to the promise of tomorrow.
dialogue_jp:
古い殻を脱ぎ捨て
勇気を持って　進まなければならないのだ

dialogue_en: The challenges we face can be overcome, if we summon our courage, and cut ties with the past.
dialogue_jp:
我々はいま　多くの問題に直面している
世界は　変わらなければならない

dialogue_en: The Shinra Electric Power Company will endure.
dialogue_jp: 神羅カンパニーは　永遠であると

dialogue_en: But to them, and to you all, I say this...
dialogue_jp: しかし　私は断言する

dialogue_en: Aw, man. And here I got all excited thinking I had a customer...
dialogue_jp:
って　なんだあ
お客さんじゃなくて　ウチの社員じゃん

dialogue_en: Kyrie, Merc of Junon. And you are?
dialogue_jp:
おれがなんでも屋の　キリエだ
報酬は――

dialogue_en: Greetings.
dialogue_jp: よく来たな

dialogue_en: They'll be thrilled to hear it. Let's go.
dialogue_jp: キリエは中か　行くぞ

dialogue_en:
Gotta say, their passion's impressive.
I actually kinda dig it!
dialogue_jp:
へへ　このヤル気満々な感じ
オイラ嫌いじゃないよ

dialogue_en: They certainly poured their energy into the promotional aspect.
dialogue_jp: この商売根性は　尊敬に値するな

dialogue_en: Kyrie...
dialogue_jp: キリエ……

dialogue_en: Wow, someone really splurged on their advertising budget. Least they'll never have trouble finding the place!
dialogue_jp:
うわ～　すごく目立ってるね
これならぜったい道に迷わないよ

dialogue_en: "Tacky" would be an understatement.
dialogue_jp: ずいぶんと派手にやっているようだな

dialogue_en: The lighthouse isn't far─it's right on the cape. Be careful out there!
dialogue_jp:
灯台は　この先の岬です
どうぞお気をつけて

dialogue_en: Never in my wildest dreams did I think I'd end up becoming best buds with Avalanche!
dialogue_jp:
アバランチの方達と　こうしてお会いできるなんて
夢にも思わなかったな～！

dialogue_en: If you're into that kinda stuff.
dialogue_jp: 興味があれば　ぜひ

dialogue_en:
You might even catch a glimpse of
the great condor if you're lucky!
dialogue_jp:
運が良ければ
コンドルの姿が見れるかもしれませんよ

dialogue_en:
Oh, pro tip! If you ever get the chance,
you oughta swing by the hill too.
dialogue_jp:
ああそうだ　もしお時間があれば
丘のほうにも寄ってみてください

dialogue_en: You've got that right. Leave it to me! My nose always knows the right way to go.
dialogue_jp:
まかせて！
オイラ　厄介事を解決するのは得意なんだ

dialogue_en: To accept this award on behalf of the team...
dialogue_jp: それでは　隊を代表し

dialogue_en: the patriotism on display here today has been nothing short of inspiring. The future looks bright indeed for Shinra and the world!
dialogue_jp:
紙吹雪が舞う中　観客やほかの部隊が一体となって
新たな世界の幕開けを祝福しています

dialogue_en: I have to tell you...
dialogue_jp: ご覧ください

dialogue_en:
And our new president's commendation goes to
who else but Midgar's Seventh Infantry!
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルからやってきた第七歩兵連隊が
見事　社長賞の栄冠に輝きました！

dialogue_en:
One can only imagine what those three troopers
must be feeling...
dialogue_jp: 対する隊員たちは　万感の思いなのでしょうか――

dialogue_en: With generous praise, the president offers his congratulations to the team.
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス社長が隊員たちに
労いの言葉をかけています

dialogue_en: Congratulations.
dialogue_jp: おめでとう

dialogue_en: Your performance today was nothing short of incredible. Midgar's Seventh Infantry is, without a doubt, the pride of our people.
dialogue_jp:
貴殿たちの力強いパフォーマンスを称え
ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊に　社長賞を授与する

dialogue_en: Salute!
dialogue_jp: 敬礼！

dialogue_en: The president has invited three members of the Seventh Infantry to come and accept the award on the drill team's behalf.
dialogue_jp:
たった今　ルーファウス社長に指名された
隊員たちが　壇上へとあがっていきます

dialogue_en: Come on up.
dialogue_jp: どうした？

dialogue_en: three of the best will now join me.
dialogue_jp: そこの３名　あがりたまえ

dialogue_en: I suppose that does make me the most suitable candidate.
dialogue_jp: ならば　私が適任だろうな

dialogue_en: You can sniff out trouble.
dialogue_jp: トラブルのにおいがするんだ

dialogue_en: Wait─me?
dialogue_jp: えっ　オイラ？
私か？

dialogue_en: So? You gonna help, or...?
dialogue_jp: 誰か　いっしょに――

dialogue_en: Yo, you're the best! Y'know, I just knew I could count on you.
dialogue_jp:
ありがとうございます
みなさんの手腕　拝見させていただきます

dialogue_en:
Anyone who thinks customers'll come calling
is outta their mind.
dialogue_jp:
あんなところでお客を募っても
誰もこないですよ　ぜったい！

dialogue_en:
Anyway, it's super outta the way
and crawling with monsters.
dialogue_jp: とにかく辺鄙な場所だし　モンスターも出るし

dialogue_en: Apparently, it used to guide ships back in the republic days, but that was, like, forever ago.
dialogue_jp:
もともとは　共和国時代の航海で……
って　それはまあいっか

dialogue_en: The lighthouse is up ahead, right on the cape.
dialogue_jp: 灯台は　この先の岬にあります

dialogue_en:
And, like, if they're so good at "doing good,"
then why aren't they doing anything now?
dialogue_jp:
だいたい　なんでも屋ってなんなんですか
聞いたこともないですよねえ

dialogue_en: Allegedly, that is.
dialogue_jp: ど～も　うさんくさくて

dialogue_en: They've done many a good deed in Midgar and all throughout the grasslands.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルやグラスランドで大活躍していた
とのことなんですが

dialogue_en: Huh?
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: Barret. Over there.
dialogue_jp: 待て！　見ろ

dialogue_en: 'Scuse me. Need to get through.
dialogue_jp: すまねえ　ちょっと通してくれ

dialogue_en: That ain't right...
dialogue_jp: どうなってんだ？

dialogue_en: You! You're on crowd control!
dialogue_jp: おい　さっさと動かんか！

dialogue_en: Sir.
dialogue_jp: ハイデッカー

dialogue_en: I have a few private words to say to these troopers. Cut the feed.
dialogue_jp:
この者たちと直接話をしたい
放送を止めてくれ

dialogue_en: So I was hoping you could do me a solid and convince that merc to help us out.
dialogue_jp:
みなさんのお力で
どうにか　説得してもらえませんかね

dialogue_en: But it's too dangerous with all the monsters around, and that merc hasn't done a thing about 'em.
dialogue_jp:
最近は　モンスターも増えてて危ないし
はやく立ち退いてもらいたくて

dialogue_en: Anyway, that place has got a killer view. We used to go up there all the time and just chill.
dialogue_jp:
あの灯台は　もともと僕たちが
物見台として使っていた場所なんです

dialogue_en: No...
dialogue_jp: いや……

dialogue_en: Oh. Are they an...acquaintance of yours?
dialogue_jp:
あれ？
もしかして　お知り合いでしたか

dialogue_en: A "merc"?
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋？

dialogue_en: What are the chances!? I dunno about you, but I think fate brought us together.
dialogue_jp:
なんという偶然
いや　これはもう必然というべきですね

dialogue_en: Sorta.
dialogue_jp: まあな

dialogue_en: Oh. Are they an...acquaintance of yours?
dialogue_jp:
あれ？
もしかして　お知り合いでしたか

dialogue_en: Kyrie...
dialogue_jp: キリエだな

dialogue_en: And someone calling themselves "the Merc of Junon" has turned it into their hideout or something.
dialogue_jp:
『なんでも屋ジュノン支店』とかなんとか
よくわからない人に　乗っ取られてしまいまして

dialogue_en:
So, here's the situation.
There's this big lighthouse down by the cape...
dialogue_jp:
実はですね
岬にある灯台が　いつのまにか

dialogue_en: And here you are, lendin' me a hand! It's literally a dream come true!
dialogue_jp:
いや～　アバランチの方々に
力を貸してもらえるなんて　本当に夢みたいです

dialogue_en: You are a fascinating individual, Cloud Strife.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド・ストライフ
少々　調べさせてもらった

dialogue_en: But, sir!
dialogue_jp: しかし　若！

dialogue_en: Stand down.
dialogue_jp: さがれ

dialogue_en: You!
dialogue_jp: 貴様らは！

dialogue_en: One worthy of a SOLDIER.
dialogue_jp: さすが　慣れたものだ

dialogue_en: That was a first-class performance.
dialogue_jp: すばらしいパフォーマンスだった

dialogue_en: Cloud Strife.
dialogue_jp: クラウド・ストライフ

dialogue_en:
I rarely talk to the rank and file.
Why not take off your helmet?
dialogue_jp:
せっかくの晴れ舞台だ
メットを取ったらどうだ？

dialogue_en: Of all the times...
dialogue_jp: おいおい　なにする気だ？

dialogue_en: Provided you keep your distance from Midgar, that is. No more stirring the proverbial pot.
dialogue_jp:
もっとも市民感情までは操作できない
しばらく　ミッドガルには近付くな

dialogue_en: Yes.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: So what...you're gonna let us go? Just like that?
dialogue_jp:
もう　私たちを追わない……
そう言ってるの？

dialogue_en: None of which, frankly, are of any interest to me whatsoever. I'd gladly wash my hands of it all.
dialogue_jp:
それらすべて　私にとっては雑事だ
できることなら解放されたい

dialogue_en:
and, of course, the arrest and
execution of Avalanche.
dialogue_jp: そして　アバランチの逮捕と処罰

dialogue_en: the recovery of a stolen lab specimen...
dialogue_jp: 奪われた研究素材の回収

dialogue_en: My father left me a mountain of unfinished tasks. Like the recapture of a fugitive─of Ancient descent...
dialogue_jp:
オヤジの代から引き継いだ　負の遺産
本社ビルから奪われた古代種の奪回

dialogue_en: Get to the point.
dialogue_jp: どういうことだ？

dialogue_en:
To that end, I need to refocus my efforts,
and push certain duties to one side.
dialogue_jp:
その事業に集中するために
面倒な雑事を切り離したいと考えている

dialogue_en: The city is Shinra's beating heart. Its devastation is a humiliation, and the world must see us rebuild.
dialogue_jp:
市民の生活が元に戻らなければ
神羅は　大いに信頼を失うことだろう

dialogue_en:
At present, Midgar requires my full
and undivided attention.
dialogue_jp: 私は　ミッドガルの復興に集中しなければならない

dialogue_en: I have a proposition for you.
dialogue_jp: 私と取引をしないか？

dialogue_en: Which is why...
dialogue_jp: そこでだ

dialogue_en: Your file was as gripping as it was...enlightening.
dialogue_jp: なかなか興味深い経歴だ　気に入ったよ

dialogue_en: Follow them and you'll find him.
dialogue_jp: 宝条博士の仮説だ

dialogue_en: According to Hojo, they're connected to Sephiroth. "Shadows of the man," I believe he called them.
dialogue_jp:
あれはセフィロスの　言ってみれば分身
追えば　セフィロス本人に辿りつく

dialogue_en: You know who they are, don't you?
dialogue_jp: あの人たちは　なんなの？

dialogue_en: Clever you.
dialogue_jp: いい線だ

dialogue_en: The guys in black robes.
dialogue_jp: 黒マントの連中を追う

dialogue_en: You have a lead, I take it?
dialogue_jp: 手掛かりはあるのか

dialogue_en: It's a deal.
dialogue_jp: 引き受けよう

dialogue_en: So I turn to you.
dialogue_jp: 受けてもらえるかな？

dialogue_en: But in our current state, Shinra lacks the resources to get the job done.
dialogue_jp: 処分したいところだが　社内の調整が面倒だ

dialogue_en:
He's an unsavory relic of our past.
And I want him gone.
dialogue_jp: 古き神羅が生み出したモンスター　過去の遺物

dialogue_en: Sephiroth. Dead.
dialogue_jp: セフィロスをまかせる

dialogue_en: So we go free. And you get...?
dialogue_jp: 取引だと言ったな　条件は？

dialogue_en: Because I have a new vision for Shinra.
dialogue_jp: 神羅は変わる

dialogue_en: And the same goes for me? But...why?
dialogue_jp: わたしも　もういらない？

dialogue_en: Man, you Midgarinos are somethin' else. When I saw you on the news, I was blown away!
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルでのみなさんのご活躍
ニュースで見た時は　胸がスッとしましたよ～！

dialogue_en: Might've just sent 'em straight into the powder keg that is the Crow's Nest though.
dialogue_jp:
サイドジュノンの連中が
無茶を起こさなきゃいいけど

dialogue_en: Shooed 'em away as quick as I could.
dialogue_jp: そのときは　追い返したけどね

dialogue_en: Y'know, that Shinra Resistance Committee or whatever came here to try 'n' recruit once.
dialogue_jp:
反神羅連絡会……
まえにいちど　ここへも来たことがあったよ

dialogue_en: Thanks to that Lodbrok guy and his little speech, the town's so riled up I can't get a moment's peace...
dialogue_jp:
グレン大佐の演説以来　この調子でね
見張りもまともにできやしないよ

dialogue_en: What─just feel like pokin' the bear? 'Cause I do have things to do. Unlike some.
dialogue_jp:
なんだいしつこいね
私はヒマじゃないんだ　早く行きな

dialogue_en: Not to say we don't enjoy the company.
dialogue_jp: まあ　好きなだけいればいいさ

dialogue_en: Back again? Figured people like you had better things to do than watch the paint dry in a place like this.
dialogue_jp:
おや　また来たのかい
たいした用もないだろうに　ヒマだねえ

dialogue_en: Do you think it's gonna be a little boy, or a little girl? I bet you can't wait to find out, either, can ya, Sam?
dialogue_jp:
男の子かねえ　女の子かねえ
こんな楽しみなことってあるんだね

dialogue_en: You did a good job today, boy... Someone's gettin' extra pets.
dialogue_jp:
よ～しよしよし
おつかい　えらかったねえ

dialogue_en:
And if you're done makin' wisecracks,
I got work to do.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ話は終わりだ　世話になったね

dialogue_en: Hmph, wouldn't know about that.
dialogue_jp: ふん　なんのことだか

dialogue_en: Heh heh.
dialogue_jp: きたきた！

dialogue_en: You know you can do this...
dialogue_jp: よーく狙って……

dialogue_en: Take your time...
dialogue_jp: ふう　もう少し

dialogue_en: Focus...
dialogue_jp: よーし　集中！

dialogue_en: Alright, Shinra. Time to pay.
dialogue_jp: カタキ　討つからね

dialogue_en: Oh, no... Don't do it now!
dialogue_jp: おいおい　いまはマズイぞ！

dialogue_en: Look. Up there.
dialogue_jp: 見ろ　あそこだ！

dialogue_en: No, but she can't have gone far.
dialogue_jp: あせるな　探そう

dialogue_en: Shit─I don't see Little Miss Ninja anywhere. Do you?
dialogue_jp:
くそ……
ニンジャ娘　どこ行きやがった

dialogue_en: Seems like a good way up.
dialogue_jp: ここから登れそう！

dialogue_en: Right...
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Get down!
dialogue_jp: 若ーーー！

dialogue_en: Stop!
dialogue_jp: やめろーーー！

dialogue_en: You have my word.
dialogue_jp: ああ　もちろんだ

dialogue_en: No one comes for us. Not Hojo, not the Turks─no one.
dialogue_jp:
会社中に伝える？
宝条博士にも　タークスにも

dialogue_en: Only if you can honor it.
dialogue_jp: 約束だよ？

dialogue_en: So, we have ourselves a deal, then.
dialogue_jp: 取引は成立だな

dialogue_en: Okay. Just shake it off!
dialogue_jp: もう１回　集中！

dialogue_en: Ugh...
dialogue_jp: ぐう……

dialogue_en: Tch...
dialogue_jp: ちっ！

dialogue_en: Aw...
dialogue_jp: ああ……
おっとっと！

dialogue_en: Gotcha!
dialogue_jp: よしっ！

dialogue_en: Here goes!
dialogue_jp: もうひと息……

dialogue_en: Don't let them get away!
dialogue_jp: 襲撃者を捕まえろ！

dialogue_en: Sweep the rooftops! Now!
dialogue_jp: 襲撃者を見つけ出せ！

dialogue_en: Sir. Please.
dialogue_jp: 若　避難を！

dialogue_en: Spare me. You had your chance.
dialogue_jp: なめるなよ　野良犬ども

dialogue_en: It wasn't us.
dialogue_jp: いや　これは

dialogue_en: Ah, so that's your game.
dialogue_jp: これが　おまえたちの答えか？

dialogue_en: Get over here!
dialogue_jp: おい　警備兵！

dialogue_en: Psh... Apple didn't fall far from this stubborn-ass tree, that's for damn sure.
dialogue_jp:
ったく　なにが手切れ金だ
意地張りやがってよ

dialogue_en: You gonna stand there and pretend this wasn't all about Claire and her bun in the oven?
dialogue_jp: 腹んなかのガキもな　知ってたんだろ

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: So...how's my son? Seem okay?
dialogue_jp: それで　あの子は元気にしてたのかい？

dialogue_en: He even need us in the first place? Your mutt'd give Stamp a run for his money.
dialogue_jp:
ワンコに聞けよ
そいつは　スタンプ以上だぜ

dialogue_en: Hey! What were you thinking, sending Sam back alone like that!?
dialogue_jp:
ちょっと　コハダだけ先に帰すなんて
どういうつもりだい

dialogue_en: Don't worry. No matter what happens in this crazy world, Mommy's gonna keep you safe. I promise.
dialogue_jp:
大丈夫よ
あなたのことは私が必ず守るわ　大丈夫

dialogue_en:
War's no good for anyone...
I just pray we get through this. All of us.
dialogue_jp:
こんなタイミングで戦争だなんて
どうなっちゃうのかしら　私たち

dialogue_en: We really ought to start thinking of names for the baby. Would be nice if Rhonda could give us a few suggestions, but...
dialogue_jp:
この子の名前も　そろそろ考えないとね
お義母さんにも相談できたらいいのだけど

dialogue_en:
My husband's got spirit, I'll give him that.
I just hope he stays out of trouble.
dialogue_jp:
もう　ディランったら……
やる気なのはいいけど　無茶はしないでね

dialogue_en: Still, if there's anything we can do to ensure a brighter future for our child, just say the word.
dialogue_jp:
この子のためにも　アバランチのみなさんとは
力を合わせて行けたらと思ってます

dialogue_en:
We despise Shinra just as much as you do,
but with a baby on the way, it's hard to offer aid to the resistance.
dialogue_jp:
私たちも　反神羅を掲げてはいますが
思うように活動できていない状況で

dialogue_en:
I'm happy we were able to meet you.
Almost feels like this little one brought us together.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチの方とのご縁
この子が繋いでくれたのかもしれませんね

dialogue_en:
Handin' out flyers ain't gonna cut it anymore.
It's time to take up arms!
dialogue_jp:
もう　ビラ配りなんかしてる場合じゃないぞ
まずは武器を集めないと！

dialogue_en: You hear that speech from the SRC? Got me all fired up! I'm ready to fight for my family and their future.
dialogue_jp:
聞きましたか　反神羅連絡会の演説！
クレアと子供のためにも　俺は戦いますよ

dialogue_en: We've still got the uniforms.
dialogue_jp: 変装で　しばらくは行けるだろう

dialogue_en: Place is on alert─are you sure about that?
dialogue_jp: 警備がヤバイぜ　強化された

dialogue_en: Let's follow him.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちも行こう

dialogue_en:
I saw one of the robed men.
He was headed for the port.
dialogue_jp:
たったいま　黒マントを見た
港へ行くらしい

dialogue_en: Shit... So what now?
dialogue_jp: さあ　どうする？

dialogue_en: Long gone.
dialogue_jp: 逃げた

dialogue_en: What happened to Rufus?
dialogue_jp: ルーファウスの野郎は？

dialogue_en: Hey!
dialogue_jp: クラウド！

dialogue_en: Get the hell outta here.
dialogue_jp: ここから　離れよう

dialogue_en: Whadda we do?
dialogue_jp: どうしよう

dialogue_en: Yup.
dialogue_jp: たぶんな

dialogue_en: Yuffie. That was her, right?
dialogue_jp: いまの　ユフィだよね

dialogue_en: Midgar's Seventh Infantry never leaves a man behind!
dialogue_jp: ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊は　一心同体です！

dialogue_en: For your own safety, sir, allow us to accompany you.
dialogue_jp: おひとりでは危険ですから　我々もお供します

dialogue_en: we've heard rumors that there are others in league with the terrorist. Conspirators─in stolen uniforms.
dialogue_jp:
襲撃者とその仲間は　我々に紛れ込むため
姑息にも変装をしているという情報があります

dialogue_en: If I may, sir...
dialogue_jp: お言葉ですが　隊長

dialogue_en:
I'm to convey this information to all nearby units.
Go join the search. I'll catch up.
dialogue_jp:
俺は　この情報の伝令に回るから
おまえたちは先行して　捜索を始めてくれ

dialogue_en: Just received new intel. The suspect is en route to Larboard Junon.
dialogue_jp:
これは極秘情報だ　襲撃者はすでに
アルジュノンに移動したらしい

dialogue_en: Sir! Your orders?
dialogue_jp: 隊長　ご指示を！

dialogue_en: Get going.
dialogue_jp: 港で会おう

dialogue_en: Captain!
dialogue_jp: 隊長！

dialogue_en: Trust me. It's easier this way.
dialogue_jp: ああ　ひとりのほうがやりやすい

dialogue_en: Alone? You sure?
dialogue_jp: ひとりで　大丈夫？

dialogue_en:
Go on without me. I'll take care of the
Seventh Infantry. Throw 'em off the scent.
dialogue_jp:
あんたたちは先に行ってくれ
俺は残って　第七歩兵連隊を港から引き離す

dialogue_en: Where are the other units, sir?
dialogue_jp: ほかの隊は　いないようですね

dialogue_en: Make sure to tell any who'll listen.
dialogue_jp: 引き続き　伝令を頼む

dialogue_en: I bet most troopers have no idea what's going on.
dialogue_jp:
俺みたいに　まだ
なにも知らされていないヤツもいる

dialogue_en: Shit... Well, here─if you run into that bastard...
dialogue_jp:
そうか　ありがとう
よかったらこれ　使ってくれ

dialogue_en: That's correct. The latest report is that the assailant fled to Larboard Junon.
dialogue_jp:
襲撃犯はすでに　アルジュノンに移動した
俺は伝令をして回っている

dialogue_en: Is it true someone tried to kill the president?
dialogue_jp: 社長が襲撃されたって　本当なのか？

dialogue_en: The thoroughfare is closing! Please proceed to Larboard Junon!
dialogue_jp:
中央通路のシャッターをおろします
アルジュノンまで避難してください！

dialogue_en: Yessir!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: Got it?
dialogue_jp: ついてこい

dialogue_en: We'll alert all units from here to the port elevator. When that's done, we'll regroup with the rest in Larboard Junon.
dialogue_jp:
港へ降りるリフトまで伝令をして回ったら
アルジュノンに移動して　襲撃者の捜索に合流する

dialogue_en: But you can trust us, sir─like we trust you.
dialogue_jp: 信用できるのは　仲間だけです

dialogue_en: Uh...good point.
dialogue_jp: ああ　そうだな

dialogue_en: If the enemy is among us, other units are a potential threat, and we must treat them as such.
dialogue_jp:
襲ってくる者があれば　たとえ同じ兵装でも
敵とみなして戦うしかありません

dialogue_en: Right...
dialogue_jp: いや……

dialogue_en: You hear that? Daddy's gonna make you proud.
dialogue_jp:
聞こえてるか？
父さん　頑張るからな

dialogue_en:
These used to be our waters, y'know.
And they will be again someday.
dialogue_jp:
生まれてくる子供のためにも
俺たちの海を取り戻さないとな

dialogue_en:
Once you're outta there,
we'll go pay your grandma a visit.
dialogue_jp:
生まれてきたら
ばあちゃんに会いに行ってみるか？

dialogue_en:
You think my mom knew about me and Claire?
And the baby?
dialogue_jp: 母さんはこの子のこと　知っていたんでしょうか

dialogue_en: Right this way!
dialogue_jp: どうぞ　中へ！

dialogue_en:
Excellent! In that case,
why don't we step into my office for a chat?
dialogue_jp:
ということでしたら　さっそく
僕の話も聞いていただけると助かります

dialogue_en: Yep. S'all good.
dialogue_jp: おう　バッチリだ！

dialogue_en:
Seein' as Dillan's, uh, "situation"
seems to be taken care of?
dialogue_jp:
ディランの件は　え～っと
いちおう解決したんですかね

dialogue_en:
Actually, while you're here,
think I could ask you for a favor?
dialogue_jp:
実は　みなさんに折り入って
お願いしたいことがありまして

dialogue_en:
The superstars themselves! I just wanna say,
it is such an honor to meet you.
dialogue_jp:
そう　まさに僕たちの希望の星！
いやあ　お目にかかれて光栄です～

dialogue_en: Avalanche? Wait─you mean they're the ones who blew up those reactors?
dialogue_jp:
アバランチ？
まさかあの魔晄炉爆破を成功させた？

dialogue_en:
Hang on─aren't these guys with Avalanche?
Rhonda said I might run into you!
dialogue_jp:
アバランチのみなさんですよね
ロドナーさんから　話は聞きました

dialogue_en: Sorry, got a little tied up.
dialogue_jp: 遅くなってすみません

dialogue_en: Toby?
dialogue_jp: トビー

dialogue_en: Dilster! Was lookin' for ya, dude!
dialogue_jp: ディラン　ここにいたのか

dialogue_en: Awoo!
dialogue_jp: ワオーン！

dialogue_en: Yessir!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: Never doubt your brothers.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちの目は　ごまかせないさ

dialogue_en: You don't think the enemy has infiltrated the Seventh, do you?
dialogue_jp: 襲撃者はまさか　我が隊にまぎれていませんよね

dialogue_en: Careful. It's an absolute shit show in here.
dialogue_jp: みんな混乱してる　気をつけろよ

dialogue_en: Alright... Well, thanks for the update.
dialogue_jp: ご苦労さま　これ受け取ってくれ

dialogue_en: Only that they've been spotted in the area of Larboard Junon. Nothing else to report.
dialogue_jp:
襲撃犯はすでに　アルジュノンに移動した
俺は　その伝令だ

dialogue_en: You hear anything more about that assassin?
dialogue_jp: 襲撃犯について　なにか聞いてないか？

dialogue_en: Yessir!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: Up ahead. C'mon.
dialogue_jp: もっと　奥へ行ってみよう

dialogue_en: The mobile unit would have loved to have you.
dialogue_jp: バイク隊に　スカウトしたのに

dialogue_en: You really ought to have told me you wanted to join the parade, my friend.
dialogue_jp: パレードに出るなら言ってくれよ　マイフレンド

dialogue_en: Protect the captain!
dialogue_jp: 隊長を守れ！

dialogue_en: Damn terrorists!
dialogue_jp: おまえらが不審者だ！

dialogue_en: The captain needs us!
dialogue_jp: 隊長を援護するぞ！

dialogue_en: You! Hands where I can see 'em!
dialogue_jp: あいつら　怪しいぞ！

dialogue_en: They're with the assassin!
dialogue_jp: 暗殺者の仲間か？

dialogue_en: Suspect sighted!
dialogue_jp: 不審者発見！

dialogue_en: Yessir!
dialogue_jp: イエッサー！

dialogue_en: Indulge me, trooper.
dialogue_jp: 気が済むまで　やらせてくれ

dialogue_en: Perhaps it's time we returned to Larboard Junon, sir?
dialogue_jp: 隊長　伝令はもう不要ではないでしょうか？

dialogue_en: I got this.
dialogue_jp: 離れてろ

dialogue_en: Didn't you know? You and I are living legends.
dialogue_jp: キミと私は　すでにレジェンドなんだ

dialogue_en: Fans of ours!
dialogue_jp: 観客だよ！

dialogue_en: Fans of yours?
dialogue_jp: こいつらは？

dialogue_en: Oh dear... My quarry has cast you aside. How tragic.
dialogue_jp: 残念　マイレディにはフラれたか

dialogue_en: We'll take it.
dialogue_jp: わかりました

dialogue_en: Woof! Woof, woof!
dialogue_jp: ワン　ワンワン！

dialogue_en: That's true...
dialogue_jp: 親になれば……

dialogue_en:
And in my experience, that don't come cheap.
Think it over.
dialogue_jp: 親になれば気持ちが変わる　たぶんな

dialogue_en: But as a parent, I'm sure you wanna give your kid the best life ya can.
dialogue_jp: でも　赤ん坊が生まれるまで待て

dialogue_en: If ya really don't want it, I'll take it off your hands.
dialogue_jp: どうしてもって言うなら　返してもいい

dialogue_en: This is a fortune!
dialogue_jp: えっ　こんなに！

dialogue_en: Why don't you hang on to it?
dialogue_jp: これは　あんたに預ける

dialogue_en: You really are your mother's kid. Got her stubbornness and everything. Have it your way.
dialogue_jp:
がんこなとこは母ちゃん譲りってか？
ったく　しゃあねえなあ

dialogue_en: I know you came all this way, but I can't accept that. Just make sure Sam gets home safe for me.
dialogue_jp:
とにかく　これは受け取れません
コハダといっしょに　お引き取りください

dialogue_en:
Claire, what're you doing out of bed!?
You know you need to stay off your feet.
dialogue_jp:
クレア　出てきたら危ないだろ！
転んでケガでもしたら……

dialogue_en: Who're they, Dillan? Friends of yours?
dialogue_jp: ディラン　お客さんなの？

dialogue_en: What? Are you not entertained?
dialogue_jp: 声が聞こえないなあ

dialogue_en: Come! Unleash your passion. Succumb to your instincts! Let us revel in a turbocharged tryst!
dialogue_jp:
それでは　情熱的で　官能的な
ランデブーと行こうじゃないか！

dialogue_en: Actors! To your marks!
dialogue_jp: これで　準備万端だ！

dialogue_en: Let's not forget the lights!
dialogue_jp: そして　照明！

dialogue_en: We have to set the stage. First, the music!
dialogue_jp: まずは　ミュージック！

dialogue_en: Let's not get ahead of ourselves.
dialogue_jp: あせるなよ　マイフレンド

dialogue_en: Are we fighting or what?
dialogue_jp: さっさと　終わらせよう

dialogue_en: Picture it─a duel to end all duels.
dialogue_jp: キミも　同じ気持ちだろう？

dialogue_en:
Isn't it exciting?
The two of us, together again at long last!
dialogue_jp: あ～この時を　どれほど待ち望んでいたか

dialogue_en:
Keep it─I ain't takin' her money.
I can make ends meet on my own.
dialogue_jp:
母からの荷物なら受け取れません
俺　家出中なんで

dialogue_en: Woof!
dialogue_jp: ワン！

dialogue_en: And to make sure her boy got his allowance.
dialogue_jp: 母ちゃんからあんたに　おこづかいだってよ

dialogue_en:
We're Sam's bodyguards.
Your mom hired us to keep him safe.
dialogue_jp:
あんたの母ちゃんに雇われた
コハダのボディガードだ

dialogue_en: Uh, do I know you?
dialogue_jp: あれ　あなたたちは？

dialogue_en: Woof woof!
dialogue_jp: ワン　ワン！

dialogue_en: Came all this way and you're still full of energy!
dialogue_jp:
はは！
相変わらず元気いっぱいだな　おまえは

dialogue_en: Uh, do I know you?
dialogue_jp: あれ　あなたたちは？

dialogue_en: Woof!
dialogue_jp: ワン！

dialogue_en:
Aw... You must be beat, buddy.
Coming all this way just to say hi.
dialogue_jp:
ちょっと疲れてるか？
ここまで遠かっただろ

dialogue_en: Who're you?
dialogue_jp: なんなんです

dialogue_en: Poor boy... It's okay, you're safe now.
dialogue_jp:
つらかったな
うん　よく我慢した

dialogue_en: Arf arf!
dialogue_jp: ワフン　ワフン！

dialogue_en:
And you're hurt!
You come all this way alone?
dialogue_jp: 傷だらけじゃないか　いったい誰に……

dialogue_en: Sam? What're you doing here?
dialogue_jp: コハダ！　どうしてここに

dialogue_en: Woof woof!
dialogue_jp: ワン　ワン！

dialogue_en: For I refuse to be upstaged a second time, my friend!
dialogue_jp: 私のすべてを　受け止めてくれ！

dialogue_en: But our dance has only just begun!
dialogue_jp: さあ　マイフレンド

dialogue_en: Whew... I see you've still got it!
dialogue_jp: くう～　シビれるねえ！

dialogue_en: Come! Let's give the people a proper spectacle!
dialogue_jp: さあ　高らかに歌おうじゃないか！

dialogue_en: And we have a reputation to live up to.
dialogue_jp: そうだろ　マイフレンド

dialogue_en: My friend! I fear our audience finds this sport underwhelming.
dialogue_jp:
ステージは　演者と観客が
一体となって作りあげるもの

dialogue_en: Here.
dialogue_jp: 受け取ってくれ

dialogue_en:
Well done, Seventh Infantry. To honor your efforts,
I present your captain a gift.
dialogue_jp:
そんな　隊長想いの
ミッドガル第七歩兵連隊に捧げよう

dialogue_en: If your troops had shown any less valor, I daresay you may not have made it at all.
dialogue_jp:
身をていして隊長を守るなんて
いい部下じゃないか

dialogue_en:
Your journey here was a rather arduous one,
it would seem.
dialogue_jp: ここまで来るのに　かなり苦労したみたいだな

dialogue_en: I insist.
dialogue_jp: 受け取ってくれ

dialogue_en: And so for you, our fearless captain─a gift.
dialogue_jp: そんな部下想いのキミに　プレゼントだ

dialogue_en:
As a leader of my own band of brothers,
I hold you in the highest respect.
dialogue_jp:
同じく　バイク警備隊を率いた隊長として
リスペクトを送るよ

dialogue_en: I must say, you have proven yourself as a capable leader of men. Then again, I expected nothing less than the best!
dialogue_jp:
隊長として　しっかりと部下を率いてきたようだな
さすがはマイフレンド

dialogue_en: Ladies and gentlemen, I give you your champion!
dialogue_jp: マイフレンドに　敬礼！

dialogue_en: Come now. This match was ours alone.
dialogue_jp: そんな　無粋なマネはさせないさ

dialogue_en: Who's next!?
dialogue_jp: 次は　だれだ？

dialogue_en:
I swear...
You get better, stronger, and faster with every lap.
dialogue_jp:
また　一段と速くなったじゃないか
マイフレンド

dialogue_en: I'm gonna have to ask you to leave.
dialogue_jp: この先は立入禁止よ

dialogue_en: Although it's a little hectic right now...
dialogue_jp: いまはちょっと　ゴタゴタしててね

dialogue_en: Up ahead's the Crow's Nest, where our brave resistance fighters come home to rest and regroup.
dialogue_jp:
ここはサイドジュノン
あたしたち　ここで反神羅活動してるのよ

dialogue_en: Sorry, sweetheart. No visitors allowed.
dialogue_jp:
ごめんなさい
この先は立ち入り禁止です

dialogue_en: Can't let you through.
dialogue_jp: ここは通せないよ

dialogue_en: Sorry, but we're keeping things locked down after the trouble in Under Junon.
dialogue_jp:
悪いけど　いまはアンダージュノンで騒動があって
通せないんだ

dialogue_en: This here's the Crow's Nest, base of operations for our anti-Shinra activities.
dialogue_jp:
ここはサイドジュノン
オレたち　反神羅青年団の拠点だ

dialogue_en: Hey!
dialogue_jp: おい！

dialogue_en: Then again...
dialogue_jp: たぶんな

dialogue_en:
I'm just gettin' worked up over nothin'! Yeah!
She won't be leavin' me for a while!
dialogue_jp:
そうそう想像　ただの想像
まだまだ先の話だ

dialogue_en: Right, right...
dialogue_jp: だよな　そうだよな

dialogue_en:
Barret! Get your shit together.
Marlene's barely outta diapers. You've got time!
dialogue_jp:
落ち着けバレット
マリンが家を出るにしても　まだずっと先だ

dialogue_en:
He's gonna fail you! Oh, I can't let you go.
I just can't!
dialogue_jp: がああああ　やっぱ無理だーーー！

dialogue_en: Your daddy... Your silly daddy... He's gonna...
dialogue_jp: 父ちゃん　父ちゃんは……

dialogue_en: What now?
dialogue_jp: 今度はなんだ

dialogue_en: Oh my sweet, baby girl...
dialogue_jp: ああ　マリン……

dialogue_en:
What I wanted to ask is...
why you keep trying to shake us.
dialogue_jp:
知りたいのは　隊長が
我々を追い払おうとする理由です

dialogue_en: That we know, sir.
dialogue_jp: 見ればわかります

dialogue_en: a jackass.
dialogue_jp: 変なやつだ

dialogue_en: Oh, the jackass with the bike? He's...
dialogue_jp: さっきのバイクのやつか　あれは……

dialogue_en: Sir, I have to ask...
dialogue_jp: 説明してもらえないのでしょうか

dialogue_en: You guys head Larboard without me.
dialogue_jp: おまえたちは　アルジュノンへ行ってくれ

dialogue_en: Don't go dying on me. I demand another dance.
dialogue_jp: 私がリベンジするまで　死なないでくれよ

dialogue_en:
Run along now.
Shouldn't keep your comrades waiting.
dialogue_jp:
急がなくていいのか？
仲間が　待ってるんだろう

dialogue_en: I bid you bon voyage, my friend.
dialogue_jp: よい旅を　マイフレンド！

dialogue_en: Suit yourself.
dialogue_jp: 勝手にしろ

dialogue_en: I'll be right behind you.
dialogue_jp: また　追いかけるさ

dialogue_en: You sure?
dialogue_jp: いいのか

dialogue_en: That's your cue to exeunt. Yonder elevator will take you down─and to your ship.
dialogue_jp:
さあ　行きたまえ
この先のリフトをおりれば　港だ

dialogue_en: You're not "outta line." It's been an honor, trooper.
dialogue_jp:
そんなことはない
パレードは　俺も楽しんだ

dialogue_en: the Seventh feels more like a family than ever, and...we hope you feel the same.
dialogue_jp:
ひとつになれたというのは
我々の　一方的な思い込みだったのでしょう

dialogue_en:
I might be outta line for sayin' this,
since we only just met, but...
dialogue_jp:
でも　よく考えれば
隊長とはお会いしたばかり

dialogue_en: The fact is...we would've never won that commendation if you hadn't brought us all together.
dialogue_jp:
我々は　隊長のリーダーシップの元で団結した
パレードの高揚感が忘れられません

dialogue_en: It's okay... At ease.
dialogue_jp: いや　気にするな

dialogue_en: Sorry, sir!
dialogue_jp: 申し訳ありません！

dialogue_en: We're sorry that we didn't see it sooner, sir!
dialogue_jp: お察しできず　申し訳ありません

dialogue_en: You clearly have things to do─things you can't divulge to us.
dialogue_jp:
隊長は　とにかく
なにがなんでも　ひとりになりたい

dialogue_en: But we get it.
dialogue_jp: でも　わかりました

dialogue_en:
We know the culprit's a young woman.
Just lightening the mood.
dialogue_jp: 襲撃者は若い女です　隊長ではありません

dialogue_en: No need to take the joke that far, Captain!
dialogue_jp: 申し訳ありません　冗談が過ぎました

dialogue_en: For what it's worth, I want you to know...I'm sorry.
dialogue_jp: だましたことはあやまる　すまなかった

dialogue_en: Or are you the assassin everyone's looking for?
dialogue_jp: それとも隊長が　襲撃者本人なのでしょうか

dialogue_en: Are we really that much of a burden to you?
dialogue_jp: 我々は　それほどまでに足手まといでしょうか

dialogue_en: Can I help you?
dialogue_jp: 君たちは　なんだ？

dialogue_en: We try the back door.
dialogue_jp: うしろから　乗り込もう

dialogue_en: What now?
dialogue_jp: どうする？

dialogue_en: They're screening passengers.
dialogue_jp: チェック　されてるね

dialogue_en:
Let's not keep our "friends" waiting─
we better get in line.
dialogue_jp: 黒マントたちといっしょに　船旅としゃれこむか

dialogue_en: Great. Now then...
dialogue_jp: よし　そんじゃあ

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: You okay?
dialogue_jp: 無事だった？

dialogue_en: Whew...
dialogue_jp: クラウド！

dialogue_en: Count on it.
dialogue_jp: ああ　もちろん

dialogue_en: Will we see each other again, sir?
dialogue_jp: また　お会いできますよね

dialogue_en: But you're right. It's time you guys went your way, and I went mine.
dialogue_jp:
でも　わかってくれたなら行ってくれ
俺はひとりになりたい

dialogue_en: Aye, sir!
dialogue_jp: りょうかい！

dialogue_en: As for you... Back to work.
dialogue_jp: おまえはサボってないで　仕事しろ

dialogue_en:
Be sure to mind your p's and q's, huh?
Lotta bigwigs on board.
dialogue_jp: お客様は裕福な方々が多い　失礼のないようにな

dialogue_en: Got space in second class.
dialogue_jp: 二等室で頼むよ

dialogue_en: Looks like we're in for another fun crossing...
dialogue_jp: ワガママな客が多くてね

dialogue_en:
Captain! Sorry, but you're needed on deck.
A fight's broken out.
dialogue_jp:
船長　お客様同士がもめています
仲裁お願いします

dialogue_en: Where'd they come from?
dialogue_jp: いつの間に！

dialogue_en: Those guys with you too?
dialogue_jp: うしろの連中もかね？

dialogue_en: Well, the president's a busy man!
dialogue_jp: 社長　気まぐれですよね

dialogue_en: First I'm hearing of this.
dialogue_jp: なにも　聞いていないが

dialogue_en:
The commander in chief said that we could hitch
a ride on your ship.
dialogue_jp: ルーファウス社長が　この船に乗れって

dialogue_en: We're the winners of the president's commendation. As a reward, we got a trip to Costa del Sol.
dialogue_jp:
パレードで社長賞　もらいました
ごほうびで　コスタ・デル・ソルへ行けるんです

dialogue_en: Yeah, we're uh...
dialogue_jp: 俺たちは……

dialogue_en: Though perhaps a little sharp for my taste.
dialogue_jp: あたしにはちょいと　塩辛いね

dialogue_en: Compared to Midgar? Very different, indeed.
dialogue_jp: ミッドガルとは違う　いい風だ

dialogue_en: The air's different here, isn't it?
dialogue_jp: 潮風がしみるねえ

dialogue_en: Well, that was...odd.
dialogue_jp: ったく　なんだい　あの子……

dialogue_en: Worst day ever!
dialogue_jp: あ～もう　サイアク！

dialogue_en:
I'm a passenger, goddammit!
Now turn that thing around!
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　ちょっと　ウソでしょ？
乗るって言ってんじゃん

dialogue_en: Come on, man! You can't leave without me!
dialogue_jp: はいはーい　乗りまーす

dialogue_en: Stop the ship! I have a ticket!
dialogue_jp: 待って待って　ちょっとタンマ～！

dialogue_en: All clear! Pull 'er up!
dialogue_jp: 急げ　出航するぞ！

dialogue_en: Just play along.
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Got it.
dialogue_jp: わかった

dialogue_en: Oh, and your dog stays in the hold.
dialogue_jp: それから　犬は船倉だ

dialogue_en:
Oh, Marlene, I wish you could be
my baby girl forever...
dialogue_jp: はあ　マリン……

dialogue_en: Maybe I'll panic─get in her way, hold her down, all to keep her safe!
dialogue_jp:
マリ～ン　マリ～ンって
しがみついて邪魔する気がする

dialogue_en: And that's what scares me! As much as I wanna let her fly, I dunno if I'll be able to let go when the time comes.
dialogue_jp:
そうなんだよ　心に決めてはみたものの
ぜんぜん　できる気がしねえ

dialogue_en: Oh yeah.
dialogue_jp: まあな

dialogue_en:
I hear you scoffin'. You think I can't do it.
You think I'll keep her all to myself!
dialogue_jp:
笑ったな　鼻で笑い飛ばしたな？
オレには無理だとか思ってんだろ

dialogue_en: Heh.
dialogue_jp: ふん

dialogue_en: I don't wanna clip her wings─I want her to soar!
dialogue_jp: マリンの独立心を尊重してやりてえ

dialogue_en: Loads of parents're like that, but I told myself I'd be different─I'd never keep my little girl from flyin'.
dialogue_jp:
いるんだよ　でもオレは
そうはならねえって心に決めてるんだ

dialogue_en: What about it?
dialogue_jp: いるのかもな

dialogue_en: Claimin' it's too soon, or they're not ready─any excuse to keep 'em at home.
dialogue_jp:
まだ早いとか　甘いとか
なんだかんだ理由つけてよ

dialogue_en: Know how some parents stop their kids from leavin' the nest?
dialogue_jp: 子供の独り立ちを邪魔する親がいるだろ

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: 聞いてる

dialogue_en: Okay, hear me out.
dialogue_jp: なあ　聞けよ

dialogue_en: But you still can't help settin' your price at two grand. Sentimental, ain'tcha!
dialogue_jp:
ははははは！
おまえが２０００にこだわる謎が解けたぜ

dialogue_en: I turned the money down, though. Didn't need it, since I was planning to enlist straightaway.
dialogue_jp:
俺は断った　軍に直行だったから
必要なかった

dialogue_en: Guess moms're the same all over.
dialogue_jp: ロドナーんちと同じじゃねえか

dialogue_en: I'm here if you wanna talk.
dialogue_jp: なんでも　聞くからね

dialogue_en: I bet...
dialogue_jp: そっか

dialogue_en: No, but there are times when I think I do─and I freeze up...till I realize it's someone else.
dialogue_jp:
それっきり　いまでも
大きな人を見るとドキッとする

dialogue_en: Ever see that Faz guy again?
dialogue_jp: それから　ファズは？

dialogue_en: Time for a little reconnaissance.
dialogue_jp: 私が探ってこよう

dialogue_en: Not bad.
dialogue_jp: 悪くねえな

dialogue_en: So how's it looking up top?
dialogue_jp: 見まわり　どうだった？

dialogue_en: Meeting adjourned─for now.
dialogue_jp: 初恋編は　また今度

dialogue_en: It's me.
dialogue_jp: 俺だ

dialogue_en: Oh, that kind.
dialogue_jp: うわ　大事件！

dialogue_en: Boys.
dialogue_jp: はつこい

dialogue_en: You know. Business.
dialogue_jp: それが　そうなの

dialogue_en: Uh... What kind of business...?
dialogue_jp: うそ　これ以上の事件があるの？

dialogue_en:
Well, actually─I was kinda hoping
we could talk business.
dialogue_jp: さて次は　いよいよ大事件

dialogue_en:
Two thousand gil─she offered me that.
"To make a fresh start."
dialogue_jp:
２０００ギルくれたんだ
新生活には　それくらい必要だとか言って

dialogue_en: "But"?
dialogue_jp: なんだ？

dialogue_en: But...
dialogue_jp: ああ……

dialogue_en:
Not much─didn't try to stop me.
Like you said, nothing unusual about it.
dialogue_jp:
反対はされなかった
それくらいで村を出るのは普通だったからな

dialogue_en: Suppose that ain't too unusual for small-town boys like you. What'd your mom have to say?
dialogue_jp:
田舎じゃあ　そんなもんだな
母ちゃんはどう言ってた？

dialogue_en: Fourteen. Wait, it was spring, so...thirteen.
dialogue_jp: １４……いや　春だからまだ１３だ

dialogue_en:
Hey, Cloud, remind me.
How old were you when ya left home?
dialogue_jp:
よう　クラウド
おまえはいつ　家を出たんだ

dialogue_en: Bow wow!
dialogue_jp: バウバウッ！

dialogue_en: Don't you worry. Any monster that wants to getcha is gonna have to go through me!
dialogue_jp:
おう　ちゃんと守ってやっから
心配すんな

dialogue_en: Woof!
dialogue_jp: ワン！

dialogue_en: Woof woof!
dialogue_jp: ワン　ワン！

dialogue_en:
You mind hurrying it along?
I just wanna put this whole business to bed.
dialogue_jp:
なるべく早く済ませてほしいんだ
スッキリしたいからね

dialogue_en: C'mon!
dialogue_jp: 行こう

dialogue_en: You heard the man. To the lounge!
dialogue_jp: クイーンズ・ブラッドの大会だって！

dialogue_en:
Any and all interested guests are welcome
to join, regardless of experience.
See the lounge staff for details.
dialogue_jp:
参加を希望されるお客様は　この後
ラウンジにお集まりください

dialogue_en: As for this evening's onboard entertainment, we will be holding a Queen's Blood tournament in the lounge.
dialogue_jp:
なお　船旅の余興として
クイーンズ・ブラッドの大会を開催します

dialogue_en: Though your time with us may be brief, we wish you all a pleasant voyage.
dialogue_jp:
短い船旅となりますが
どうぞ　おくつろぎください

dialogue_en: We're sailing smoothly towards Costa del Sol and expect to arrive right on schedule.
dialogue_jp:
本船は　コスタ・デル・ソルへ向け
順調に航行中です

dialogue_en: Ladies and gentlemen, this is your captain speaking. Good evening and welcome aboard the Shinra-8.
dialogue_jp:
連絡船第八神羅丸へようこそ
船長のチトフです

dialogue_en:
Nothin' good ever came from makin' deals
with the devil. Shinra can't be trusted─
no matter who's in charge.
dialogue_jp:
誰が社長だろうが　神羅は神羅
取引なんかしたくねえ

dialogue_en: I know it's off─thanks to Little Miss Ninja's stunt─but personally, I think she did us a favor.
dialogue_jp:
ニンジャ娘がメチャクチャにしちまったが
正直　オレはホッとしてるんだ

dialogue_en:
Hey.
About this deal Rufus wanted to make with you...
dialogue_jp: ルーファウスの提案　聞いたぜ

dialogue_en: Captain.
dialogue_jp: ごくろうさま

dialogue_en: Aww... Well, it's been an honor, Captain!
dialogue_jp: そっか　じゃあ最後に　敬礼！

dialogue_en: We can ditch the uniforms.
dialogue_jp: 変装は終わりだな

dialogue_en:
All the robes are in second class.
Haven't seen any sign of Shinra, though.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントは　二等船室に集められてる
神羅の追手の気配はない

dialogue_en: H-hurry! ...Blerk!
dialogue_jp: はやく～……おえっ！

dialogue_en: Why won't you open!?
Let me outta here!
dialogue_jp: 出～せ～！

dialogue_en:
Blurk... Ungh...
I'm dyin' in here...
dialogue_jp:
ううっ……おえっ……
つらい～……

dialogue_en: Haven't you ever heard of "personal space"!? Well this is mine, so scram!
dialogue_jp:
あ～もうっ　あっち行け～！
ひっつくな～！

dialogue_en: Yeh... Uhn...
dialogue_jp: う……ああ……

dialogue_en: Re...union...
dialogue_jp: リユ……ニオン……

dialogue_en: Urgh...
dialogue_jp: うう……

dialogue_en: C'mon! Open this friggin' door already!
dialogue_jp: こ～ら～！　開けろ～！　うう……

dialogue_en:
Got Shinra on speed dial,
so if my dog gets hurt, you get hurt.
dialogue_jp:
コハダになにかあれば
今度こそ　神羅に突き出すよ

dialogue_en: Woof woof!
dialogue_jp: ワン　ワン！

dialogue_en: You keep my boy safe.
dialogue_jp: ちゃんと　守っておくれよ

dialogue_en:
But if I find a single hair outta place on Sam,
you won't live to enjoy it.
dialogue_jp:
いいかい　コハダにケガなんかさせたら
報酬から差っ引くからね

dialogue_en:
Once you make it to the Crow's Nest, find Toby.
He'll make sure you get the reward I promised.
dialogue_jp:
報酬は向こうにいるトビーって男から受け取ってよ
手配しといたからさ

dialogue_en: Much obliged.
dialogue_jp: じゃ　よろしくね

dialogue_en: Woof!
dialogue_jp: ワン！

dialogue_en: 'Sides, I've got someone else to take care of now... Don't I, Sam?
dialogue_jp:
それに私にはこの子もいるしね
ねえ　コハダ

dialogue_en: I raised him best I could─gave him every advantage. But he's gotta learn to stand on his own two feet.
dialogue_jp:
ここまで育ててやりゃ　もうじゅうぶんだろう
あとは勝手にどこへなり行ってもらおうと思ってさ

dialogue_en:
I meant what I said.
Can't afford to take care of this town and his shit.
dialogue_jp:
文字どおりの意味だよ
私は村のことで　手いっぱいだからね

dialogue_en: Don't half-ass it.
dialogue_jp: 中途半端ったらないよ

dialogue_en: Kinda sad, if I'm being honest. If you're gonna run away, at least go somewhere interesting.
dialogue_jp:
ったく　家出するならするで
もっと遠くに行けばいいのにさ

dialogue_en: So he went into the mountains way east of here. Found some more like-minded idiots.
dialogue_jp:
そういう連中が寄り集まって
ジュノンのはずれで　活動してんのさ

dialogue_en:
Boy got sick of living under this steel sky...
and my thumb, I suppose.
dialogue_jp:
日陰の暮らしに飽きただの
私のやりかたは　生ぬるいだの

dialogue_en: The Crow's Nest.
dialogue_jp: サイドジュノンだよ

dialogue_en: You're pretty good at this game, huh?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　これ得意なんだよね

dialogue_en: I bet deep down you're a card shark─and you can smell blood in the water.
dialogue_jp:
ほら　クラウドもはやく
豪華賞品　豪華賞品！

dialogue_en: Ah, now's my chance! I'll be right back.
dialogue_jp: わたしの番みたい　行ってくるね

dialogue_en:
Well, you won't go far with that attitude.
O ye of zero faith.
dialogue_jp:
そこは
『がんばろう　優勝できる』でしょ

dialogue_en: Yeah right.
dialogue_jp: どうだろうな

dialogue_en:
A little friendly competition could be fun.
And who knows─one of us might win it all!
dialogue_jp:
大会　楽しみだね
優勝できるかな？

dialogue_en: Then I might see you around.
dialogue_jp: 楽しみにしてるわ

dialogue_en: I might.
dialogue_jp: どうかな

dialogue_en: So─you playing?
dialogue_jp: あなたも出るんでしょ？

dialogue_en: No cards of your own? No problem! Decks are available for rental, so come and join in the fun!
dialogue_jp:
カードをお持ちでない方もレンタルいたしますので
皆様　ふるってご参加ください

dialogue_en: The winner of today's competition will take ashore a trophy as well as a fabulous prize.
dialogue_jp:
見事優勝したお客様には
トロフィーと豪華賞品を贈呈いたします

dialogue_en: Attention, passengers: the Queen's Blood tournament will be starting shortly! This is your last chance to sign up.
dialogue_jp:
大会開催まで　もうまもなくと迫りました
まだまだエントリーは受け付けております

dialogue_en: You're getting in on this too?
dialogue_jp: おまえも　参加するんだな

dialogue_en: Daddy's gonna make you proud, honey.
dialogue_jp: 父ちゃん　がんばるからな

dialogue_en: Let's do this.
dialogue_jp: おっと！

dialogue_en: Now's your chance.
dialogue_jp: 受付があいたぞ

dialogue_en:
Tell me I don't look good.
Like I was born of the brine.
dialogue_jp:
けっこう　似合ってんだろ？
海の男って感じでよ

dialogue_en: Outta this? Nah, I'm startin' to dig it.
dialogue_jp: これか？　実は気に入っちまってよ

dialogue_en: But...maybe change first.
dialogue_jp: なあ　着替えないのか

dialogue_en: Cool...
dialogue_jp: そうか

dialogue_en:
Hell yeah, I am!
Fabulous prize, here I come!
dialogue_jp:
おうよ！
豪華賞品だぜ　ほしいだろ？

dialogue_en: You joinin'?
dialogue_jp: 出るのか？

dialogue_en: This is gonna be fun.
dialogue_jp: 大会　楽しもうね

dialogue_en: "I guess" we'll find out!
dialogue_jp: それじゃあ　おさきに

dialogue_en: Good enough to beat me, though?
dialogue_jp: 全力で来なさい

dialogue_en: I guess.
dialogue_jp: まあな

dialogue_en: So, who should I say is competing?
dialogue_jp: では　お名前をお願いします

dialogue_en: Registration won't close for a while yet, so if you reconsider, you know where to find us.
dialogue_jp:
エントリー終了まで　まだ時間があります
ぜひお声がけください

dialogue_en: Well, we'll be here if you change your mind.
dialogue_jp: エントリーされる場合は　お声がけください

dialogue_en: Here to sign up for our Queen's Blood tournament?
dialogue_jp: クイーンズ・ブラッド大会　エントリーですね？

dialogue_en: Grr...
dialogue_jp: うー……

dialogue_en: Why am I only just now learning this is restricted to humans? There should be a sign.
dialogue_jp:
なぜ　最初から人間限定をうたわない
そう思うだろう？

dialogue_en: Grr!
dialogue_jp: ぐるるるる……

dialogue_en: That's it. I want to speak with your manager.
dialogue_jp: 悪いが　責任者を呼んでもらおう

dialogue_en: I'm no mere "animal," thank you.
dialogue_jp: 私が　ただの動物に見えるか？
