dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: なんだと……

dialogue_en: But I'm afraid animals are not allowed to participate.
dialogue_jp: 動物の大会への参加は　ご遠慮いただいております

dialogue_en: My apologies...sir.
dialogue_jp: まことに　申し訳ございません

dialogue_en: Solely as a means to study human leisure activities. Now, if you'll excuse me.
dialogue_jp:
人間の娯楽は興味深い
では　エントリーしてくる

dialogue_en: Best of luck today!
dialogue_jp: 健闘をお祈りしております

dialogue_en:
Welcome! If you're looking for cards,
we've got you covered.
dialogue_jp:
いらっしゃいませ
カードは　こちらで販売しております

dialogue_en:
Well, you're all set to join! Good luck,
and have a great time today.
dialogue_jp:
これにて　エントリー完了です
それでは大会をお楽しみください！

dialogue_en: Yep.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Alright, Mr. Strife. Do you have your own cards?
dialogue_jp:
クラウド様ですね
カードはお持ちですか？

dialogue_en:
That's...quite the letter, isn't it?
An inside joke of some sort?
dialogue_jp:
なんとも　熱烈なメッセージですね
ファンの方でしょうか

dialogue_en: Goodness me...
dialogue_jp: 以上となります

dialogue_en: "May a sanguine thirst consume you for many matches to come..." Signed, "a friendly specter"...
dialogue_jp:
『その調子だ　もっと血に溺れろ
　親愛なる亡霊より』

dialogue_en: "It pleases me to see you continue your Queen's Blood journey, Mr. Strife...
dialogue_jp:
『クラウド・ストライフへ
　クイーンズ・ブラッドを楽しんでいるようだな』

dialogue_en: Odd, I know, but...if I may?
dialogue_jp: はい　お読みしてもよろしいでしょうか

dialogue_en: Okay...
dialogue_jp: メッセージ？

dialogue_en: As it happens, we received a message for you.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド様宛に
メッセージカードが届いております

dialogue_en: Oh! You're Mr. Strife!
dialogue_jp: クラウド様ですか！

dialogue_en: Cloud Strife.
dialogue_jp: クラウド・ストライフ

dialogue_en: So put your best foot forward and seek out your first competitor!
dialogue_jp:
運命を決める
初戦の対戦相手を探しましょう

dialogue_en: Every journey begins with a single step.
dialogue_jp: 優勝への道は　まず一歩から！

dialogue_en: I, Titov, will be your host for this spectacular event, as we seek to crown our next Queen's Blood champion!
dialogue_jp:
司会は　船長のチトフでお送りいたします
皆様　おおいに楽しんでいってください！

dialogue_en: Only one of our card battlers will walk away with the trophy and the glory in today's competition, but who will it be?
dialogue_jp:
いま　すべてのカードバウターがそろいました
はたして　栄光のトロフィーは誰の手に渡るのか！

dialogue_en:
Welcome to the Shinra-8's
Queen's Blood tournament!
dialogue_jp: 第八神羅丸恒例のクイーンズ・ブラッド大会！

dialogue_en: He's a grown man. Can't be clingin' to his mom's skirts─or her pocket book.
dialogue_jp:
もう　子供って歳でもないし
いい加減　独り立ちしてもらわないとね

dialogue_en: This gil's me washing my hands of him.
dialogue_jp: この金は　手切れ金ってとこさ

dialogue_en: Haven't seen him in a spell, not since he left town...and never looked back.
dialogue_jp:
しばらく会っちゃいないけどね
勝手に村を出てって　それっきり

dialogue_en: My son.
dialogue_jp: 息子だよ

dialogue_en:
Doesn't seem like too much of a hassle,
but...who exactly is this money for?
dialogue_jp:
引き受けてやってもいいが
誰に届けるかくらい　聞かせてもらおうか

dialogue_en: Woof!
dialogue_jp: ワン！

dialogue_en:
Since he'll be the one makin' the drop,
it's your job to get him there safe.
dialogue_jp:
あんたたちの仕事は
コハダのボディガードってところだね

dialogue_en: This here's Salmon.
dialogue_jp: コハダっていうんだ

dialogue_en: I've already got a porter picked out too.
dialogue_jp: 届け先は　この子が知ってる

dialogue_en:
The remainder of your bounty─
I need it delivered to someone.
dialogue_jp: 懸賞金の残りを　ある場所まで届けたくてね

dialogue_en: Well, since you clearly don't have anything better to do, think I could put you to work?
dialogue_jp:
しばらくこのあたりにいる気なら
ひとつ　おつかいでも頼もうかね

dialogue_en: Huh. Didn't think you'd still be hangin' around...
dialogue_jp: なんだい　まだウロウロしてたのかい

dialogue_en: Thankweh kindly!
dialogue_jp: ありがとうございました～

dialogue_en: Some players may be out of the running, but they're enjoying casual games.
dialogue_jp:
すでに敗北した選手は
エキシビションマッチを楽しんでいます

dialogue_en: Today's tournament is shaping up to be one for the books!
dialogue_jp:
では　ここで
対戦の様子を見てみましょう

dialogue_en: Let's see how today's brave competitors are faring.
dialogue_jp:
ここで　各選手の
試合状況をお伝えします

dialogue_en: It's anyone's guess how this match will end!
dialogue_jp: 勝負の行方に注目しましょう

dialogue_en: But will he be able to defeat the formidable Chadley?
dialogue_jp:
対戦相手のチャドリー選手が
待ち受けています

dialogue_en: Wow! Cloud is on one hell of a roll in today's tournament!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　クラウド選手
ついにここまで勝ち進んだ

dialogue_en: Cloud's looking for his next opponent, folks. This decision could very well determine his fate in today's competition!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　クラウド選手
次の対戦相手は誰なのか？
勝負の行方に注目です

dialogue_en: It looks like Cloud is on the prowl for an opponent to challenge. Who will he choose?
dialogue_jp:
さあ　クラウド選手
対戦相手に誰を選ぶのか注目しましょう

dialogue_en: Round 4 is upon us─welcome to the semifinals!
dialogue_jp:
第４ラウンド
セミファイナル開幕です！

dialogue_en: The final act is close at hand!
dialogue_jp: さあ　フィナーレは近い！

dialogue_en: Players! It's time for Round 3!
dialogue_jp: 第３ラウンド　開幕です！

dialogue_en: The competition's only growing more intense!
dialogue_jp: さあ　いよいよ大会は大詰めです

dialogue_en: Without further ado, let's proceed to Round 2!
dialogue_jp: つづいて　第２ラウンド開幕です！

dialogue_en: Round 3 is now complete.
dialogue_jp: 第３ラウンド　終了しました

dialogue_en: Round 2 is in the rearview.
dialogue_jp: 第２ラウンド　終了しました

dialogue_en: Round 1 is over and done!
dialogue_jp: 第１ラウンド　終了しました

dialogue_en: Chadley with the win! It doesn't look like this boy wonder's hot streak is close to fading.
dialogue_jp:
チャドリー選手　勝利！
この勢いは　すさまじいものがあります

dialogue_en: Tifa wiped the floor with her opponent! There's no stopping her in today's tournament!
dialogue_jp:
ティファ選手　勝利しました
着実に順位を上げていきます！

dialogue_en: If he keeps playing this well, the sky's the limit!
dialogue_jp:
このまま　勢いに乗ることが
できるでしょうか！

dialogue_en: Cloud isn't letting up the pressure one bit!
dialogue_jp: クラウド選手　隙を見せません！

dialogue_en: That's a victory in the bag for Barret, folks!
dialogue_jp: バレット選手　勝利を収めています！

dialogue_en: How are today's competitors holding up? Let's find out.
dialogue_jp:
では　引き続き
対戦状況をお伝えします

dialogue_en: Let's check in on our players and see how each is faring.
dialogue_jp:
では　引き続き
試合状況をお伝えします

dialogue_en: Looking at our standings, one thing is clear: none of these competitors are ready to throw in the towel yet!
dialogue_jp:
以上　ここまでの試合状況でした
それぞれのバウトから目が離せません

dialogue_en: That covers the state of our competition for now, but this is still anyone's tournament to win─and I mean anyone!
dialogue_jp:
以上　ここまでの対戦状況でした
各選手　熱い試合が続いています

dialogue_en: Finally, our sixth pair!
dialogue_jp: 最後に　第６バウト！

dialogue_en: Up next: our fifth match!
dialogue_jp: つづいて　第５バウト！

dialogue_en: And what about our fourth match?
dialogue_jp: さらに　第４バウト！

dialogue_en: Moving on to our third bout!
dialogue_jp: そして　第３バウト！

dialogue_en: As for our second pair...
dialogue_jp: つづいて　第２バウト！

dialogue_en: We'll start with our first pair!
dialogue_jp: まずは　第１バウト！

dialogue_en: A few former competitors are playing for fun─proof that winning isn't everything!
dialogue_jp:
すでに敗退した選手たちの
エキシビションマッチも続いています

dialogue_en: Tifa has been defeated.
dialogue_jp: ティファ選手　敗北です

dialogue_en: She played well, but in Queen's Blood, you've gotta fight dirty!
dialogue_jp:
まっすぐな戦いは
クイーンズ・ブラッドでは厳しいか

dialogue_en: And Tifa takes the L!
dialogue_jp: ティファ選手　負けたー！

dialogue_en: It was a hard-fought battle, but Aerith failed to come out on top.
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手　敗北！
手こずっているようです

dialogue_en: She's a force of nature, and we just can't get enough!
dialogue_jp:
無駄のないカードさばきは
誰もマネできない！

dialogue_en: Cloud keeps the hits coming as he maintains a solid advantage!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手
ジリジリと相手を追い詰めています

dialogue_en: What an incredible play from Regina!
dialogue_jp: レジー選手　アンビリーバブル！

dialogue_en: Can anyone stop her from taking home today's trophy!?
dialogue_jp:
彼女を止められる選手は
果たしているのか！

dialogue_en: Another win for Regina, who is obliterating the competition!
dialogue_jp:
レジー選手
圧倒的勝利で順位を上げていきます

dialogue_en: Don't let Regina's small stature fool you─she's as tough as they come!
dialogue_jp:
レジー選手　強い！
相当なやり手です

dialogue_en: Regina nets herself a solid win, living up to her prodigious reputation!
dialogue_jp:
レジー選手　勝利！
天才の名にふさわしい勝利です

dialogue_en: A fabulous performance by Andrea Rhodea! He danced circles around his opponent!
dialogue_jp:
アニヤン選手　美しく勝利！
華麗な技で快進撃です

dialogue_en: Madam M does not believe in mercy─she's out for blood! Queen's Blood!
dialogue_jp:
マム選手　順調に勝利しています
ゆっくりと牙を研いでいます！

dialogue_en: Felix wins! He might just ride this wave all the way to the top of the tournament!
dialogue_jp:
フレッサー選手　大勝利！
勢いに乗っているようです

dialogue_en: But can they win it all before they short circuit?
dialogue_jp: 頭はすでに　ショート寸前のようです

dialogue_en: Wize is crunching numbers and crushing the competition!
dialogue_jp:
ワイズ選手
苦戦しながらも順位を上げています！

dialogue_en: A masterful play from Cloud! Can his opponent recover?
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手
いまの一手はすばらしいですね

dialogue_en: Chadley beats Cloud again!
dialogue_jp: チャドリー選手　勝利！

dialogue_en: It was a hard-fought battle, but in the end, Cloud couldn't hold his own against Chadley, the boy wonder!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　及ばない！
やはりチャドリー選手強い　強すぎる！

dialogue_en: Cloud is now a front-runner in today's tourney, but can he go all the way? Only time will tell!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　上位陣に食いこんできた
まだまだ勝負の行方はわかりません！

dialogue_en: Which player will take the crown!?
dialogue_jp: さあ　勝負の行方は！

dialogue_en: Both are relentless, but there can be only one!
dialogue_jp:
優勝争いは
このふたりが競り合っています！

dialogue_en: Cloud's opponent had better watch out: he's hungry like the wolf for victory!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手
獲物を狩る狼のごとく全力です！

dialogue_en: Chadley and Regina fight on!
dialogue_jp: チャドリー選手　レジー選手

dialogue_en: Could it be there's a flaw in their programming?
dialogue_jp:
いつになったら
本気を出すのでしょうか！

dialogue_en: It looks like Wize 3.0 has been bested! How is this possible?
dialogue_jp:
ワイズ選手　敗北！
実力を出せていないようです

dialogue_en: Andrea may look unfazed after that loss, but I can tell his soul is burning for revenge!
dialogue_jp:
アニヤン選手　敗北です！
涼しい顔で大して堪えていないようです

dialogue_en: Ooh, tough break, Madam M! I'm afraid your star is falling.
dialogue_jp:
マム選手　残念！
順位を落としてしまいました

dialogue_en: Madam M goes down, and she is not gracious in defeat!
dialogue_jp:
マム選手　敗北
相手が悪かったか！

dialogue_en: Felix is no match for his opponent! Maybe it's time to reread the rules?
dialogue_jp:
フレッサー選手　負けです！
ルールが難しすぎるのか？

dialogue_en: Ouch! A tough loss for Barret. Let's hope his ego is less bruised than his record after that one!
dialogue_jp:
バレット選手　敗北！
自慢の勢いを潰され　そのまま撃沈です

dialogue_en: She may have lost this round, but she could still surprise us in the next!
dialogue_jp:
まっすぐな勝利を
次こそは　見てみたいものです！

dialogue_en: Talk about relentless: Tifa isn't letting up!
dialogue_jp: ティファ選手　手を緩めません！

dialogue_en: A bold play from Tifa proves she's a force to be reckoned with.
dialogue_jp:
ティファ選手
なるほど　強いですねえ

dialogue_en: That smile says it all, folks: Aerith knows she's winning this one!
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手
余裕の笑みを浮かべていますね

dialogue_en: Aerith's got her opponent in the palm of her hand!
dialogue_jp: エアリス選手　手堅くまとめていきます

dialogue_en: An astute and amazing play from Aerith!
dialogue_jp: エアリス選手　これは鋭い攻めだ！

dialogue_en: This match isn't going in Cloud's favor. Can he still turn things around?
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手
なかなか思惑どおりに事が運ばない

dialogue_en: Cloud's gonna need to up his game if he wants to survive...
dialogue_jp: クラウド選手　ここは正念場ですね

dialogue_en: He may be down, ladies and gentlemen, but Cloud is not out!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手
まだ勝負をあきらめてはいません

dialogue_en: Cloud's future in this competition is looking pretty grim...
dialogue_jp: クラウド選手　これは苦しい展開か

dialogue_en: It'll take a miracle for Cloud to come back from this...
dialogue_jp: クラウド選手　形勢逆転なるか！

dialogue_en: Cloud is cool and composed─his focus unmatched!
dialogue_jp: クラウド選手　その集中力には脱帽です

dialogue_en: And Regina continues her undefeated streak! Will Cloud rise to the challenge and face her again?
dialogue_jp:
レジー選手　もはや敵ナシ！
クラウド選手　あきらめてしまうのか

dialogue_en: Regina delivers an even more decisive victory in Round 2! Does Cloud even stand a chance!?
dialogue_jp:
レジー選手強い　強すぎる！
クラウド選手　打つ手はあるのか

dialogue_en: She came, she saw, and she dominated!
dialogue_jp: カードバウトの天才の牙城は崩れません

dialogue_en: It's official: Regina has defeated Cloud!
dialogue_jp:
レジー選手の強さの前に
クラウド選手　敗北！

dialogue_en: One loss would be hard enough, but taking another has to sting.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手
敗北の苦みを噛みしめています！

dialogue_en: Andrea knows how to captivate his audience and his opponent!
dialogue_jp:
アニヤン選手
エレガントなステップで惑わします！

dialogue_en: Andrea is the picture of confidence and swagger!
dialogue_jp:
アニヤン選手
不敵な笑みを浮かべております！

dialogue_en: The astounding Andrea Rhodea is once again winning in style!
dialogue_jp:
アニヤン選手
美しい手際　エクセレントです！

dialogue_en: This is no gentle massage, folks─Madam M is crushing it!
dialogue_jp:
マム選手
妖艶なカードさばきでもみしだきます！

dialogue_en: Madam M is fanning the flames of her foe's frustration!
dialogue_jp:
マム選手
余裕で扇子をあおいでいます

dialogue_en: Madam M must be winning: you can hear her cackling with delight!
dialogue_jp:
マム選手
見事な高笑いが聞こえるようです！

dialogue_en: Felix is just rubbing it in now. Have mercy!
dialogue_jp:
フレッサー選手
軽くもてあそんでますね

dialogue_en: I think that smug smile on Felix's face says it all!
dialogue_jp:
フレッサー選手
笑顔がこぼれるのを隠せない！

dialogue_en: Decorum be damned, folks: Felix is taunting his opponent!
dialogue_jp:
フレッサー選手
挑発する余裕を見せています！

dialogue_en: Wize is fighting with a passion that rivals any living player's!
dialogue_jp:
ワイズ選手
意外にも持ちこたえています

dialogue_en: Our AI competitor is pushing their programming to its absolute limits!
dialogue_jp:
ワイズ選手　なぜだ？
予想外に健闘していますね

dialogue_en: Wize 3.0 seems to have devised an unstoppable strategy.
dialogue_jp:
ワイズ選手
おっとまさか余裕があります！

dialogue_en: The tide of battle is turning in Barret's favor!
dialogue_jp: バレット選手　いい流れです

dialogue_en: I think it's clear that Barret is running away with this match!
dialogue_jp: バレット選手　勢いが止まりません！

dialogue_en: Barret is taking no prisoners in today's competition!
dialogue_jp: バレット選手　勇猛果敢に攻めます！

dialogue_en: Tifa is on the verge of victory. Can she bring it home?
dialogue_jp:
ティファ選手
このまま一気に決着をつけるか！

dialogue_en: Looks like storm clouds're rolling in on Barret's day in the sun!
dialogue_jp: バレット選手　苦々しい顔つきだ！

dialogue_en: I've got a feeling Barret might need to gracefully accept defeat.
dialogue_jp:
バレット選手
まずい　いまにも暴れ出しそうだ

dialogue_en: It's looking grim, but Tifa isn't calling it quits yet!
dialogue_jp:
ティファ選手
まだあきらめてはいけません！

dialogue_en: Can Tifa mount a comeback? Let's find out!
dialogue_jp: ティファ選手　逆転を狙えるか！

dialogue_en: Uh-oh. Tifa's opponent has her on the ropes!
dialogue_jp: ティファ選手　これはまずいですねえ

dialogue_en: Not a lot of options left for Aerith... What will she do?
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手
ここからどう打って出る？

dialogue_en: It might be all over for Aerith this round!
dialogue_jp: エアリス選手　万事休すか！

dialogue_en: Aerith is in trouble. Will she survive?
dialogue_jp: エアリス選手　追い詰められています

dialogue_en: Victory is all but assured for Regina─and she knows it.
dialogue_jp:
レジ―選手
すでに勝利を確信していますね

dialogue_en: Regina outdoes herself with every hand. It's incredible!
dialogue_jp:
レジー選手
その実力は底が知れません！

dialogue_en: It's small wonder Regina's the talk of the tournament: her game is on another level!
dialogue_jp:
レジー選手
噂にたがわぬ圧巻の立ちまわりです！

dialogue_en: What a play by Regina! She's the one to beat, folks!
dialogue_jp: レジー選手　すごい一手が出ました！

dialogue_en: Regina has her opponent wrapped around her little finger!
dialogue_jp: レジー選手　相手を手玉に取ります

dialogue_en: It should come as no surprise that Chadley is projected to win.
dialogue_jp:
チャドリー選手
シミュレートに問題ナシ！

dialogue_en: Chadley's play has been flawless. Can he keep it up?
dialogue_jp:
チャドリー選手
まったく油断が見られませんね

dialogue_en: Every move Chadley's made has been perfectly calculated!
dialogue_jp:
チャドリー選手
緻密な計算が活きています

dialogue_en: Chadley's scanning for an opening... Will he find one in time?
dialogue_jp:
チャドリー選手
逆転の目を探っております

dialogue_en: A rare misstep by Chadley! But will it cost him dearly?
dialogue_jp:
チャドリー選手
どうした　めずらしい失態です

dialogue_en: Has Chadley miscalculated!? I can't believe it!
dialogue_jp: チャドリー選手　計算が狂ったか！

dialogue_en: Andrea's fallen behind, but he may still have a trick or two up his sleeve!
dialogue_jp:
アニヤン選手
劣勢ですが　手立てはあるのか？

dialogue_en: Andrea's dancing on a knife-edge. But how long until he gets cut!?
dialogue_jp:
アニヤン選手
静かに闘志を燃やしている

dialogue_en: Was that a sigh of despair I heard? I think Andrea's struggling!
dialogue_jp:
アニヤン選手
フッとため息を漏らしました！

dialogue_en: After this match, I think Madam M's the one who'll need a massage!
dialogue_jp: マム選手　扇子が怒りで震えております

dialogue_en: I shouldn't repeat what Madam M just said...but she's not happy!
dialogue_jp: マム選手　大きな舌打ちが聞こえました

dialogue_en: Madam M is not pleased with this match!
dialogue_jp: マム選手　イライラしております！

dialogue_en: Felix looks asleep at the wheel─wait, is he actually sleeping!?
dialogue_jp:
フレッサー選手
おっと　これは寝たフリか！

dialogue_en: Felix is gonna need to get his head in the game if he wants to win!
dialogue_jp:
フレッサー選手
集中できていないようです

dialogue_en: Felix might need to brush up on the basic rules.
dialogue_jp:
フレッサー選手
やはりセオリーをわかっていない

dialogue_en: Looks like our AI competitor might need a reboot!
dialogue_jp: ワイズ選手　ほぼほぼ自滅です

dialogue_en: Is that smoke I see coming from Wize's circuitry!?
dialogue_jp: ワイズ選手　激しく暴走気味だ！

dialogue_en: This might be more than Wize 3.0 can process.
dialogue_jp:
ワイズ選手
パニックを起こしています！

dialogue_en: Can Barret recover and snatch victory from the jaws of defeat!?
dialogue_jp: バレット選手　ここはガマンの時間帯

dialogue_en: He's gotta be feeling sore after that one.
dialogue_jp: あと一歩　及びませんでした

dialogue_en: What's this!? The match just barely slipped through Cloud's fingers!
dialogue_jp:
おーっと　どうしたんでしょうか
クラウド選手　惜敗！

dialogue_en: That one really must've stung. Let's see if he makes a better showing in the next match!
dialogue_jp:
惜しい　惜しかった！
次こそ期待したいですね

dialogue_en: And Cloud takes it on the chin!
dialogue_jp: クラウド選手の敗北です！

dialogue_en: It could've gone either way right up until the end!
dialogue_jp:
どちらが勝っても
おかしくありませんでした

dialogue_en: Close, but no cigar for Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド選手　惜敗です！

dialogue_en: Cloud walks away in defeat─but if my nose doesn't deceive me, I smell a comeback!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手敗北！　しかし
かなりの手ごたえを感じたようです

dialogue_en: That's a tough break for Cloud, who narrowly loses an intense match.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　惜しかった！
勝利まであとすこしでした

dialogue_en: All players must report their match results to tournament staff before we can proceed.
dialogue_jp:
では　クラウド選手
勝利の報告を　受付までお願いします

dialogue_en: Don't forget to report your results to tournament staff so we can make that last match official!
dialogue_jp:
では　クラウド選手
勝利の喜びを　受付まで報告ください

dialogue_en: That's the match! It's looking like Cloud could be the dark horse in today's tourney.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　勝利！
見どころ満載の好ゲームでした

dialogue_en: Give it up for Cloud! He snagged himself a win and moved up in the rankings.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　勝利しました！
順調に順位を上げていきます

dialogue_en: Cloud is kicking ass and taking names in this tournament! Who will be his next victim?
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　手堅く勝利です！
猛攻を見事さばききりました

dialogue_en: And Cloud takes it! He's moving up, but will he make it all the way to the top?
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手の勝利だ！
順調に順位を上げていきます

dialogue_en: A victory for Cloud! I spy a card shark in these waters!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　勝利！
すばらしいカードさばきでした

dialogue_en: That's a win for Cloud! His star is on the rise.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　勝利！
順位が上がっていく

dialogue_en: Barret is sitting pretty after his last match: I can hear him humming victory fanfare from here!
dialogue_jp:
バレット選手　順調な様子ですね
勝利の鼻歌が聞こえます！

dialogue_en: Aerith wins her match with ease, proving she is not to be underestimated!
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手　勝利！
なかなかのやり手のようです

dialogue_en: Aerith is victorious! If she keeps this up, they'll be calling her the countess of cards!
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手　見事な勝利！
このまま上位勢に食いこめるのか

dialogue_en: That covers the matches we've seen thus far, but how the tournament proceeds from here is anyone's guess!
dialogue_jp:
以上　各選手の戦績でした
今後も勝負の行方に注目です！

dialogue_en: It's time for a recap of this round's matches. Let's see how our competitors performed.
dialogue_jp:
ここで　ラウンドの対戦結果です
各選手の戦績を振り返ってみましょう

dialogue_en: And now for an overview of our other matches.
dialogue_jp: さて　勝負の行方を見てみましょう

dialogue_en: How is the rest of the competition stacking up? Let's see.

dialogue_jp: 決勝戦　応援してますね

dialogue_en: Right this way, sir!
dialogue_jp: どうぞ　こちらです

dialogue_en:
Congratulations on making it to the finals!
Allow me to escort you to the next match.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　おめでとうございます！
決勝会場へは私がご案内します

dialogue_en: Let's find out in our final round!
dialogue_jp: ファイナルラウンドの開幕です！

dialogue_en: Can he steal the title from this peerless prodigy, or will Regina reign supreme?
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドの頂点が決まる
運命の決戦の火蓋が　いま切られます！

dialogue_en: His opponent, however, is formidable.
dialogue_jp: 次はレジー選手との決勝戦！

dialogue_en: In a stunning turn of events, Cloud has fought his way into the finals!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　クラウド選手
ついについに　ここまで勝ち上がった！

dialogue_en: I'm looking forward to you winning it all.
dialogue_jp: 優勝まで　応援していますよ

dialogue_en:
Nicely done, Cloud!
That was quite the match, I must say.
dialogue_jp:
さすが　クラウドさん！
いつもながら　見事な勝利です

dialogue_en:
Nice work, Cloud!
You put in another impressive performance.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手
第２ラウンド勝利　お見事でした！

dialogue_en:
Well done!
Let's hope Round 1 is the first of many wins.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手！
第１ラウンド　余裕の勝利でしたね

dialogue_en: It's the upset of the century! The crowd is going wild!
dialogue_jp:
予想を超えた勝利に
会場も大盛り上がりを見せています

dialogue_en: Can you believe it, folks? Cloud is our winner!
dialogue_jp: クラウド選手　まさかまさかの勝利です！

dialogue_en: No... There's no way I lost...
dialogue_jp: ありえない　こんなの……！

dialogue_en: Yeah, not surprised I won, but I doubt anyone is, really. Still, I suppose you put up more of a fight than most.
dialogue_jp:
まあ当然　誇ることでもなんでもない
でも　わりといい勝負だったかもね

dialogue_en: Hmph. Just you wait.
dialogue_jp: ふん　ここからよ

dialogue_en: Finally, a challenge.
dialogue_jp: 面白くなってきたわ

dialogue_en: Guess you're not absolutely abysmal at this.
dialogue_jp: やるじゃない　ほんのすこしね

dialogue_en: So predictable. You're gonna have to work harder than that if you wanna win.
dialogue_jp:
いいデキね
あなたの手　見えるわ

dialogue_en: It's like you're not even trying...
dialogue_jp: 一方的すぎて　退屈

dialogue_en: Wow, I'm winning. Shocker.
dialogue_jp: 優勢　読みどおりね

dialogue_en: At least try to make it interesting.
dialogue_jp: すこしは楽しませてね

dialogue_en: So, do you want me to crush you now, or toy with you first?
dialogue_jp: さてと　どうやって攻めてほしい？

dialogue_en: I'm all set. Let's hope you can keep up.
dialogue_jp: カードセット　対応してみせてね

dialogue_en: When will you learn?
dialogue_jp: 何度やっても同じよ

dialogue_en: If that's what you want, then so be it. I've removed you from the bracket. See you at the awards ceremony.
dialogue_jp:
残念ですが　うけたまわりました
では　このあと表彰式をお楽しみください

dialogue_en: One more victory and you're the champion. Give it your all!
dialogue_jp:
ファイナルラウンド
思う存分　やっちゃってください！

dialogue_en: I'll be cheering you on all the way to the final round!
dialogue_jp: 応援してます　大会を楽しみましょう

dialogue_en: That's the spirit! I know you can do it.
dialogue_jp:
ファイト！
まだまだ　がんばれますよ

dialogue_en: Sorry, I just... I would hate to see you throw in the towel, but if you really want to...
dialogue_jp: ここまできて……まさか　棄権しますか？

dialogue_en: That's your decision to make, of course, but...I was moved to tears watching you play today!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手の試合を見て
わたくし　もらい泣きしてしまいました

dialogue_en: Even after you've made it this far?
dialogue_jp: ここまで勝ち上がるとは……

dialogue_en: Oh, you aren't planning on dropping out of the tournament...are you?
dialogue_jp: えっと　もしかして棄権しますか？

dialogue_en: I can't wait to see what you do in Round 4!
dialogue_jp: 第４ラウンドも応援してますよ！

dialogue_en:
Looking forward to hearing
good news about Round 3!
dialogue_jp: 第３ラウンドも勝利の報告お待ちしてます！

dialogue_en: Keep up the good work in Round 2!
dialogue_jp: 第２ラウンドも頑張ってください！

dialogue_en: Best of luck against your first opponent!
dialogue_jp: 第１ラウンド　頑張ってください！

dialogue_en:
Incredible! You've already got
three wins under your belt, Cloud!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手
第３ラウンド勝利　おめでとうございます！

dialogue_en: What a twist! At the eleventh hour, a bold new challenger has taken the stage!
dialogue_jp:
おっと　ここで優勝者に
挑戦状が叩きつけられました！

dialogue_en: It can't hurt you.
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫よ

dialogue_en: Mom!
dialogue_jp: なにあれ……

dialogue_en: Two legs? Nothin'...to it.
dialogue_jp: 二本足で立つのは難しいものだな

dialogue_en: Not so fast, good captain! I've yet to show my hand!
dialogue_jp:
その宣言　待ってもらおう
カードバウトを申し込む！

dialogue_en: I present to you...
dialogue_jp: その名は──

dialogue_en:
Ladies and gentlemen, after that heated battle,
we are finally ready to crown the winner of
tonight's tournament!
dialogue_jp:
白熱した大会もファイナルラウンドを終え
ついに栄光の王者が決定しました！

dialogue_en: I can't believe it! Cloud is giving up! Was the pressure simply more than he could handle?
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　まさかの棄権です！
戦意を喪失してしまったのでしょうか

dialogue_en: Choco-bye-bye for now! Come back soon!
dialogue_jp: チョコボ～！　ばいば～い

dialogue_en: Kweh-lcome! How can I help you?
dialogue_jp: チョコボ～！　いらっしゃいませ～

dialogue_en: We got everything ya need to get your bird lookin' spiffy!
dialogue_jp: ガボン牧場　チョコボショップで～す！

dialogue_en: Give that bird a pat on the head for me, will ya?
dialogue_jp: チョコボ　かわいがってあげてくださいね

dialogue_en: Sure hope Gabe starts pulling his weight soon...
dialogue_jp: ガボンさん　やる気出してくれないかなあ

dialogue_en: Howdy! Care to give our wares a once-over?
dialogue_jp:
どうも
チョコボのグッズ　見ていきます？

dialogue_en: Business is booming at our one-stop fashion shop!
dialogue_jp: チョコボショップは　元気に営業中です！

dialogue_en: Stay safe out there!
dialogue_jp: どうぞ　お気をつけて

dialogue_en: Okay then...
dialogue_jp: そうですか

dialogue_en: Another time!
dialogue_jp: またのご利用を

dialogue_en: No one works harder than Gabe, but I sure try!
dialogue_jp: ガボンさんに負けないよう　僕も働きますよ！

dialogue_en: Nothing beats a ride in a bird-drawn carriage!
dialogue_jp: 今日は絶好のチョコボ日和ですね

dialogue_en: So─need a lift somewhere?
dialogue_jp: チョコボ車のご利用ですか？

dialogue_en: If you're in the market for a ride, Gabe's chocobos will get ya where you need to go lickety-split!
dialogue_jp:
遠方へおでかけでしたら　ぜひ
ガボン牧場のチョコボ車をご利用ください

dialogue_en: I flew right on over here when I heard Gabe was back in business!
dialogue_jp:
ガボンさんが仕事を再開したと聞いて
飛んできました

dialogue_en: Your package'll make tracks when ya send it on chocoback!
dialogue_jp: チョコボ運送におまかせあれ

dialogue_en: and take another look!
dialogue_jp: 先入観を捨てろ

dialogue_en: Don't let prior knowledge blind you. Clear your mind...
dialogue_jp: それは　おまえが私を知っているからだ

dialogue_en: No.
dialogue_jp: 問題しか見えない

dialogue_en: Impressed?
dialogue_jp: 問題ないだろう

dialogue_en: Though I am far from humanoid, the illusion can be maintained─with the aid of a little flamboyance.
dialogue_jp:
普段の私が　ケモノに見えることは否定しない
しかしこの格好なら　どう見ても兵士だ

dialogue_en: Seriously?
dialogue_jp: レッド……

dialogue_en:
And is our man of mystery a contender!?
I know I can't wait to find out!
dialogue_jp:
挑戦者のバウトの腕はどうなのか
期待が高まります

dialogue_en: But will our champion agree to face him!?
dialogue_jp: この挑戦は受け入れられるのか

dialogue_en: Gotta earn your thrashing.
dialogue_jp: あなたの腕を見せてもらうわ

dialogue_en: Prove you can beat him first.
dialogue_jp: そこのクラウドと戦って

dialogue_en: If you want me to beat you that badly...
dialogue_jp: どうしてもやりたいなら

dialogue_en: I'm not above begging.
dialogue_jp: この私の頼みだ

dialogue_en: ...Why would I?
dialogue_jp: 受けるわけないじゃない

dialogue_en: Regina! Do you accept my challenge?
dialogue_jp: レジー　私の挑戦を受けるか？

dialogue_en: Regardless, we can discuss your misgivings about my appearance later.
dialogue_jp:
いまは　私という存在について
議論するときではない

dialogue_en: Yeah, hard pass. I've had enough cards for one night.
dialogue_jp:
受ける気はない
もう　じゅうぶん楽しんだからな

dialogue_en: But enough talk. I've issued you a challenge, Cloud. Face me─if you dare.
dialogue_jp:
それよりクラウド　私の挑戦を受けるのか
それとも　受けないのか？

dialogue_en: Alright, giddyup!
dialogue_jp: よ～し　出発！

dialogue_en: Just leave it right there!
dialogue_jp: 置いてけ置いてけ！

dialogue_en: You got it.
dialogue_jp: まかせとけ

dialogue_en: We'll get it there in a flash!
dialogue_jp: チョコボで配達するよ

dialogue_en: Do ya need something delivered?
dialogue_jp: 荷物の依頼はあるか？

dialogue_en: Don't drop it now!
dialogue_jp: 持ってけ持ってけ

dialogue_en: Here ya go.
dialogue_jp: おう！

dialogue_en: Special delivery comin' in!
dialogue_jp: お届け物の到着だ

dialogue_en: Gabe's Chocobo Express!
dialogue_jp: ガボン牧場のチョコボ運送だよ～！

dialogue_en: Wish I could say they kept me in shape, but, well... Those roads do a real number on my back.
dialogue_jp: 腰痛とんでけ　肩こりとんでけ

dialogue_en: We discovered all sorts of secret paths, safe from Shinra's prying eyes. Not the easiest trails, but they keep the birds in shape.
dialogue_jp:
神羅に見つからん抜け道も　まだまだあるぞ
険しい道だが　チョコボの健康にはいいな

dialogue_en:
Freddie and I are "war buddies."
Well, more like "snore buddies" these days.
dialogue_jp:
ブレディとは
昔は戦友　いまは昼寝友達よ

dialogue_en: Probably oughta drop by Freddie's place at some point too.
dialogue_jp:
ブレディのところにも
そのうち顔を出さなきゃな

dialogue_en: Don't wanna ruffle that bird's feathers any more than I already have...
dialogue_jp:
チョコボに愛想尽かされないように
しっかりしねえとな

dialogue_en: Ain't she?
dialogue_jp: なあ？

dialogue_en: You're quite the businesswoman yourself.
dialogue_jp: 姉ちゃんにはかなわねえなあ

dialogue_en: Never!
dialogue_jp: もちろんだ

dialogue_en: Down, boy.
dialogue_jp: やりたかったんだな

dialogue_en: Take up the gage!
dialogue_jp: さあ　始めよう

dialogue_en: Let's play!
dialogue_jp: カードバウトだ！

dialogue_en: Alright then.
dialogue_jp: いいだろう

dialogue_en: One last time─get ready to shuffle!
dialogue_jp: さあ　エキシビションマッチの開幕です！

dialogue_en:
It appears that Cloud has agreed to play
an exhibition match!
dialogue_jp: クラウド選手　挑戦を受ける模様です

dialogue_en: Oh yeah! It's on!
dialogue_jp: おうおう　やれやれ！

dialogue_en: You got this, Red!
dialogue_jp: レッドも　がんばって！

dialogue_en: C'mon, Cloud! Kick his butt!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　ファイト！

dialogue_en: For what? I didn't agree to this.
dialogue_jp: 待て　やるなんて言ってない

dialogue_en: Very well, then. Cloud, are you ready!?
dialogue_jp:
いいだろう
勝負だ　クラウド！

dialogue_en: It was just a matter of applying what I'd learned.
dialogue_jp: あとは　それを応用してやればいい

dialogue_en: By watching others play; a hunter must be observant. I first gleaned the rules and then the strategies.
dialogue_jp:
狩りの基本は観察だ
試合を見ていれば　ルールも定石も把握できる

dialogue_en: How the hell did you get so good?
dialogue_jp: いつの間に　そんなにやりこんだんだ？

dialogue_en: I win this round─though well fought on your part. These human pastimes are quite amusing, aren't they?
dialogue_jp:
私の勝利だな　良い勝負だった
人間の娯楽はやはり面白い

dialogue_en: I'll beat you again if you like.
dialogue_jp: 気が済むまで　バウトするぞ

dialogue_en: You're welcome to keep trying.
dialogue_jp: 何度やっても　同じだろう

dialogue_en: Oh... I expected better.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　弱いな

dialogue_en: Nothing stirs the warrior spirit like a close battle. I love it!
dialogue_jp: 闘争本能が騒ぐな　ここからが本番だ

dialogue_en: Not an ideal position, but with a bit of cunning...
dialogue_jp:
嫌な流れだが
最後まであきらめはしない

dialogue_en: This bodes ill, but I can yet turn the tide... I must focus!
dialogue_jp:
私の劣勢か……
だが　逆転の芽はある！

dialogue_en: Well? Are you prepared to admit defeat?
dialogue_jp: どうした　もう終わりなのか

dialogue_en: The game proceeds in my favor. What now, Cloud?
dialogue_jp: 私が優勢だ　さあどうする

dialogue_en: It comes as no surprise that I have the upper hand.
dialogue_jp: 当然だが　私が上のようだな

dialogue_en: I've the instincts of a warrior.
dialogue_jp: 野性の勘が　私の強さだ

dialogue_en: Still underestimating me?
dialogue_jp: 私の腕前を見せてやろう

dialogue_en: Let the battle begin anew.
dialogue_jp: さあ　カードバウトだ！

dialogue_en: Human intellect simply can't compete.
dialogue_jp: これが人知を超えた力だ

dialogue_en: Then...the trophy goes to our newcomer!
dialogue_jp: では　トロフィーは謎の挑戦者へ！

dialogue_en: Oh, I know. When the time comes.
dialogue_jp: もちろん　いつか取り返すわ

dialogue_en: Should you ever wish to go a round...
dialogue_jp: いつでも　挑戦を受けよう

dialogue_en:
Honestly, I've never seen anyone play like that.
It was eye opening.
dialogue_jp:
いまのバウト　すごかった
わたしよりも彼のほうが上よ

dialogue_en: No, it's his. He earned it.
dialogue_jp: いらない　彼にあげていいわ

dialogue_en: and as there can be only one champion, this magnificent trophy rightfully belongs to Regina!
dialogue_jp:
盛り上がったところで　あらためて
レジー選手に優勝トロフィーの贈呈です

dialogue_en: But as this was only an exhibition match...
dialogue_jp: しかしこれは　エキシビションマッチ

dialogue_en:
Congratulations to our mysterious challenger!
Never in my life have I seen such skill!
dialogue_jp:
勝者は　謎の挑戦者だ！
すさまじいバウトを見せつけた

dialogue_en: He earned it.
dialogue_jp: 俺の負けだ

dialogue_en: No, not me─give it to him.
dialogue_jp: いや　そいつにやってくれ

dialogue_en: our magnificent trophy still goes to...
dialogue_jp: 優勝トロフィーはこのまま　クラウド選手に──

dialogue_en: But as this was only an exhibition match...
dialogue_jp: しかしこれは　エキシビションマッチ！

dialogue_en: Congratulations to our man of mystery for that astounding performance! Never in my life have I seen such skill!
dialogue_jp:
勝者はなんと　名もなきカードバウター
すさまじいバウトを見せつけた！

dialogue_en: Huh. Certainly paid off.
dialogue_jp: なるほど　さすがだな

dialogue_en: Hah. You'd better be ready to lose.
dialogue_jp: ああ　次は負けない

dialogue_en: Ready for a rematch when you are.
dialogue_jp: 挑戦は　いつでもどうぞ

dialogue_en: But now, the time has come to crown our champion. Let's have a big round of applause for Regina!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　盛り上がったところであらためて
レジー選手に　優勝トロフィーの贈呈です

dialogue_en: And what an astounding clash of cards that was!
dialogue_jp: すさまじいバウトを見せつけた

dialogue_en:
Congratulations to the winner of
our exhibition match, Cloud Strife!
dialogue_jp:
エキシビションマッチの勝者は
クラウド・ストライフ！

dialogue_en: For your magnificent performance tonight, I present to you this sparkling trophy. Congratulations!
dialogue_jp:
すさまじいバウトを見せつけた
栄光の優勝トロフィーは　君のものだ！

dialogue_en: Ladies and gentleman, our champion: Cloud Strife!
dialogue_jp: 完全なる勝者は　クラウド・ストライフ！

dialogue_en: Huh. It certainly paid off.
dialogue_jp: なるほど　さすがだな

dialogue_en: It was just a matter of applying what I'd learned.
dialogue_jp: あとは　それを応用してやればいい

dialogue_en: By watching others play; a hunter must be observant. I first gleaned the rules and then the strategies.
dialogue_jp:
狩りの基本は観察だ
試合を見ていれば　ルールも定石も把握できる

dialogue_en: How the hell did you get so good?
dialogue_jp: いつの間に　そんなにやりこんだんだ？

dialogue_en: Close too. You nearly had me.
dialogue_jp: おまえもな　いい勝負だった

dialogue_en:
How exhilarating.
I may have lost, but that was a good match.
dialogue_jp: 完敗だ……クラウド　強いな

dialogue_en: The winds of change brought me here, but who knows where they'll take me next? I hope I'll see you there, though.
dialogue_jp:
風にまかせて　世界をさすらうのもいいものだ
また　会えるといいな

dialogue_en: But no matter. Once we get off in Costa del Sol, I'll be making money hand over fist.
dialogue_jp:
まあいいさ　負けたぶんは
コスタで上乗せして取り返してやるよ

dialogue_en: Well, that didn't turn out at all like I'd hoped.
dialogue_jp: 景気づけのつもりが　アテがはずれたね

dialogue_en: Nah, we'll come with.
dialogue_jp: ああ　そうだな

dialogue_en: Well, then─I'm gonna get me some much needed shut-eye. You all can do as ya please.
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　到着まで寝ちまうか
さすがに疲れたぜ

dialogue_en: Yep.
dialogue_jp: 明日だよ

dialogue_en: So, what now? We arrive in the morning, right?
dialogue_jp: で　どうする　船はいつ着くんだ？

dialogue_en: Well, lucky for us that you didn't! You were amazing!
dialogue_jp: すご～く　強かったよね　さすが！

dialogue_en: I couldn't bear to pass up the chance.
dialogue_jp: せっかくの大会だからな

dialogue_en: Didn't expect to see you!
dialogue_jp: レッドには　びっくり！

dialogue_en: Yeah...
dialogue_jp: そうだな

dialogue_en: That was a blast!
dialogue_jp: 楽しかったね

dialogue_en: We hope all our passengers enjoyed the tournament, and that the remainder of your voyage with us is both peaceful and relaxing.
dialogue_jp:
コスタ・デル・ソルまでは　順調に航行中です
到着まで　ごゆっくりお過ごしください

dialogue_en: Thank you again to our amazing contenders for making today so memorable.
dialogue_jp:
ご参加いただいたカードバウターの皆様
誠に　ありがとうございました

dialogue_en: And on that incredible note, our Queen's Blood tournament draws to a close.
dialogue_jp:
盛り上がりを見せたクイーンズ・ブラッド大会も
これにて　終了となります

dialogue_en: Could be fun going up against you. If you get the chance, that is.
dialogue_jp:
いずれ　機会があれば
あなたとも対戦してみたいわ

dialogue_en: You weren't half bad.
dialogue_jp: 楽しみにしてるわ

dialogue_en: I don't tell a lot of people this, but for what it's worth, I wouldn't mind playing you again.
dialogue_jp:
いちおう　言っておく
あなたとなら　また対戦してみたい

dialogue_en: Does losing always feel this shitty? 'Cause I never wanna feel this way again.
dialogue_jp:
これが　悔しいという感情ね
次は負けないから

dialogue_en: The combination of red and blue pigments makes for an almost otherworldly sight...
dialogue_jp:
青成分に赤成分の溶け込み具合で
吸い込まれそうになるのかな

dialogue_en: I'm taking the night off from my reports. Now to rest and recharge with this incredible view...
dialogue_jp:
今日は　レポートはお休みです
海というものは美しいですね

dialogue_en: Here for another round? Sorry, man, but no can do. Time to get my vacay on!
dialogue_jp:
なんだい　まだ遊びたいの？
ダメダメ……もうリラックスタイムだよ

dialogue_en: Thank you, thank you! 'Preciate the love, dudes.
dialogue_jp: ハッハハハハハ！

dialogue_en: Just wait until my software is updated...
dialogue_jp: ヴァージョンアップするでゴザイマス

dialogue_en: I will become the perfect player.
dialogue_jp: 次は　負けないでゴザイマス

dialogue_en: Analyzing archived games... Optimizing performance...
dialogue_jp: コレがアレで　アレがコレで……

dialogue_en: Resuming simulation.
dialogue_jp: プシュー　プシュー

dialogue_en: Then the deal is sealed!
dialogue_jp: では　よろしく

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエッ！

dialogue_en: You hear that?
dialogue_jp: 聞いたよね

dialogue_en: I'll stock up on parts so I can keep the carriage moving, and make sure my birds never get bored again.
dialogue_jp:
部品もストックして　すぐに直せるようにするし
チョコボの世話もちゃんとする

dialogue_en: Starting today, I'm giving this job my all.
dialogue_jp: これからは　仕事に精を出すよ

dialogue_en: Okay, fine. I shouldn't've been so quick to throw in the towel. Ya happy?
dialogue_jp:
わかった　俺が悪かった
全面的に悪かった

dialogue_en: How responsible.
dialogue_jp: めんどうだった？

dialogue_en: So there ya have it! I just...let it go.
dialogue_jp: おう　ようするに面倒だったんだよ

dialogue_en: It's like I told ya─my carriage broke. And getting the parts to fix it sounded like a real hassle, so...
dialogue_jp:
そりゃあんた　荷車が壊れちまって
直すにも部品の調達が面倒だし

dialogue_en: Oh? Then why'd you shut down the business?
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　どうして　お仕事やめたの？

dialogue_en:
Hey! I ain't scared of those sons of bitches.
Not one bit.
dialogue_jp: そりゃ違う　神羅にビビったりはしねえよ

dialogue_en: But I get it. Shinra's a big company─and what they say goes. I can't blame you for being too scared to fight back.
dialogue_jp:
でも　神羅カンパニー怖いから仕方ないよね
口出しされたら逆らえないし

dialogue_en: I see.
dialogue_jp: そっか

dialogue_en: Maybe.
dialogue_jp: かもな

dialogue_en: If we hadn't shown up, would you have even tried to give your birds a better life?
dialogue_jp:
わたしたち来なかったら
チョコボ　ずっとあのままだった？

dialogue_en:
That's great. But before we head out,
I just wanna ask one more thing.
dialogue_jp:
よかった　じゃあ帰るまえに
ひとつ　質問

dialogue_en: This way's closed! Take the stairs up instead!
dialogue_jp:
こっちは封鎖中だ！
あそこの階段から行ってくれ

dialogue_en: Head up to the deck! These stairs'll get you there!
dialogue_jp:
甲板に向かってくれ！
ここから行けるぞ

dialogue_en: Military personnel are to report to the deck immediately.
dialogue_jp:
神羅軍関係者は
至急　甲板まで集合願います

dialogue_en: Return to your cabins and remain there.
dialogue_jp: お客様は船室にお戻りください

dialogue_en: Attention all passengers. We have an emergency on board.
dialogue_jp:
船長のチトフです
緊急事態が発生いたしました！

dialogue_en: Military, huh? Guess that's us.
dialogue_jp: 軍関係者……俺たちか？

dialogue_en:
Return to your cabins and remain there
for the duration. Military personnel are to report
to the deck immediately.
dialogue_jp:
お客様は船室にお戻りください
神羅軍関係者は　至急甲板まで集合願います

dialogue_en:
Attention all passengers.
We have an emergency on board.
dialogue_jp:
船長のチトフです
緊急事態が発生いたしました！

dialogue_en: Pretty tired...
dialogue_jp: 休むか

dialogue_en: C'mon!
dialogue_jp: 急ごう！

dialogue_en: Thanks. Follow me.
dialogue_jp: ありがとう　こっちだ！

dialogue_en: Lead the way.
dialogue_jp: 行きます

dialogue_en: You. Gimme a hand?
dialogue_jp: 君　手伝ってくれるか

dialogue_en:
Good. I'll round up the stragglers─but there's
a lot of ground to cover.
dialogue_jp:
私は逃げ遅れた客がいないか見まわりに行く
だれか──

dialogue_en: Copy. We're on it.
dialogue_jp: ああ　わかった

dialogue_en: Please, you have to help.
dialogue_jp: 頼む　なんとかしてくれ

dialogue_en:
The whole ship is crawling with fiends.
They're everywhere!
dialogue_jp:
船がモンスターに囲まれてしまった
とんでもない数だ！

dialogue_en: Oh! There you are! Over here, quickly!
dialogue_jp: 来てくれたか　急げ　こっちだ！

dialogue_en:
'Preciate it, kids. I can finally get
the business back up and running again.
dialogue_jp: ありがとうな　これでいつでも運送業に戻れるよ

dialogue_en: Kweh, kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエ　クエ～！

dialogue_en: I gotta say, that old dog really outdid himself this time. Helluva job. Don't think my carriage has ever looked even half this good!
dialogue_jp:
おお　ブレディのやつ　ずいぶんはりきったな
申し分のない　立派な荷車だよ

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエッ！

dialogue_en: Guess Freddie hasn't lost his touch─even after all these years.
dialogue_jp: ブレディのやつ　まだまだ衰えてはいないようだ

dialogue_en: Or close enough, I suppose.
dialogue_jp: なかなか　悪くない

dialogue_en: Kweh...
dialogue_jp: クエ～……

dialogue_en: Well...almost.
dialogue_jp: まあ　こんなもんだろうな

dialogue_en: Phew, good as new.
dialogue_jp: ふう　できた……

dialogue_en: Good. In that case, no time like the present.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　いますぐ　始めてくださいな

dialogue_en:
Well, twist my arm, why don't ya.
Alright, little lady─it's a deal.
dialogue_jp:
うん？　まあ仕方ねえな
ああ　やるよ

dialogue_en: Only if you promise to fix your carriage and take better care of your chocobos.
dialogue_jp:
荷車　ちゃんと直して
チョコボ　大切にする？

dialogue_en: Is that so...?
dialogue_jp: ほう

dialogue_en: Guess what! Brought you a present from your good friend Freddie.
dialogue_jp:
ブレディさんから
いいもの　お届けです

dialogue_en:
The wind and rain take a toll on these graves.
Gotta patch 'em up every now and then.
dialogue_jp:
墓も風化して壊れちまうんだ
直してやらねえとな

dialogue_en: I'm just doing my usual rounds, making sure these good folks can rest in peace.
dialogue_jp:
見まわりの時間だ
こいつらが安らかに眠れるようにってな

dialogue_en: Tifa!
dialogue_jp: ティファ！

dialogue_en: Y-yeah... But those fiends! They got below deck!
dialogue_jp: はい　でも下の客室にモンスターが……

dialogue_en: You okay?
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫か

dialogue_en: Get them away from me!
dialogue_jp: 誰か　モンスターを！

dialogue_en: Please! Somebody help me!
dialogue_jp: うわあ　助けてくれ！

dialogue_en: Ahh! Stay back!
dialogue_jp: うわっ　やめろ！

dialogue_en: We can handle this!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　先に行け！

dialogue_en: Uh-oh!
dialogue_jp: たいへん！

dialogue_en: Bring it!
dialogue_jp: 来るぞ！

dialogue_en: Cloud─look!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　あれ！

dialogue_en: Don't know. He said something about "getting more firepower," then took off.
dialogue_jp:
武器を取りに行くって　別れたきり
無事だといいけど

dialogue_en: Where's Titov?
dialogue_jp: 船長は？

dialogue_en: Bad─those things're everywhere.
dialogue_jp: モンスターが　かなり入り込んだと思う

dialogue_en: How's it look?
dialogue_jp: 状況は？

dialogue_en: Little help here!?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　お願い！

dialogue_en:
Y'know, Gabe swung by the other day.
Said he's "back in business," that old dog.
dialogue_jp:
ガボンがチョコボで来るようになったぜ
また商売っ気出しやがって

dialogue_en: 'Sides, Gabe's waitin'.
dialogue_jp: ガボンが待ってんだろ

dialogue_en: Best be on your way if you don't need to hassle me for anything else. This old dump's no place for the young.
dialogue_jp:
用が済んだら　長居は無用
生き急げ若人よってな

dialogue_en:
Like catching some Z's, for one.
So, if we're all done here...
dialogue_jp:
ふわ～あ……
用が済んだなら　帰った帰った

dialogue_en: I dunno about that. 'Sides, I've got things to do.
dialogue_jp:
どうだか
まあ　気が向いたらな

dialogue_en: You oughta make more than that. Gabe's definitely gonna need 'em at some point.
dialogue_jp:
もっと　作っておいてください
ガボンさん　きっと来るから

dialogue_en:
Nobody makes 'em like I do, and that's no lie.
Go on─take it.
dialogue_jp:
オレにしか作れねえ頑丈なやつだ
好きに持ってけ

dialogue_en: Tell me she ain't a beauty.
dialogue_jp: ほら　できたぞ

dialogue_en: This'll just take a sec.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと待ってろ

dialogue_en: Oh, yeah. You did mention that.
dialogue_jp: ああ　そういや　そんな話だったな

dialogue_en: We fought tooth and nail for ourselves and the republic, but...wasn't enough. Now I'm just hoping to live out the rest of my days in peace.
dialogue_jp:
お互い　じゅうぶん過ぎるほど戦った
これからは　静かに隠居生活でも送るつもりさ

dialogue_en:
Had some close calls too.
Dunno how we survived.
dialogue_jp: いま思えば　ずいぶん無茶をしたもんだ

dialogue_en: We scoured every inch of these mountains─huntin' for Shinra units and attackin' 'em when they least expected it.
dialogue_jp:
ふたりで山の中を駆けまわって
何度も神羅に奇襲を仕掛けてな

dialogue_en: You'd never know it now, but he used to ride front and center in the chocobo cavalry.
dialogue_jp:
あのオッサンも昔は
チョコボ騎兵隊のエースだったんだぜ

dialogue_en: Gabe and I? We go way back. Comrades in arms.
dialogue_jp: ガボンとは　まあいわゆる戦友だ

dialogue_en:
And let's just say it wasn't pretty...
Got our asses handed to us, and what you see now is all that remains.
dialogue_jp:
最後のほうは　そりゃひどいもんだった
オレたちは無残に負けて　このザマさ

dialogue_en:
A small contingent of troopers is engaging
the creatures as we speak.
dialogue_jp:
現在　船に乗り合わせていた兵士の一団が
対処中です

dialogue_en:
Unidentified fiends have surrounded and
boarded our vessel.
dialogue_jp:
船の周囲に現れたモンスターによる
襲撃を受けました

dialogue_en: The Shinra-8's currently en route to Costa del Sol.
dialogue_jp: 遭遇地点は　コスタ・デル・ソル近海

dialogue_en: Those guys aren't being targeted at random.
dialogue_jp: モンスターの狙いは　黒マントかもしれない

dialogue_en: Son of a...! Get back here, dammit!
dialogue_jp:
クソ　やってくれたな
待ちやがれ！

dialogue_en: However...do mark your body to aid in identification.
dialogue_jp: だが　わかりやすい目印を用意してくれよ？

dialogue_en:
Ensure the experiment proceeds uninterrupted.
And in return, you will have pride of place in my lab.
dialogue_jp:
身をもって実験に協力してくれるならば
敬意とともに　君を探してあげよう

dialogue_en: So...what should we do?
dialogue_jp: 私は　どうすれば……

dialogue_en: How I envy your opportunity to be present for this epochal event! At the very least, I must harvest a sample of its DNA.
dialogue_jp:
君　これは大きな進化の瞬間かもしれないよ
すぐにでも　サンプルを採取したいねえ

dialogue_en: And one resulting from fusion, no less─the superior genetics producing a far stronger being.
dialogue_jp:
融合体は　優勢な遺伝子を継ぎ
元素体よりも強化されるのが常識だ

dialogue_en: An intriguing development, this new mutation.
dialogue_jp: 新たな変異　融合反応か

dialogue_en: I contacted Public Security, but they said this falls under your jurisdiction.
dialogue_jp:
治安維持部門が
この件を　宝条博士と話すようにと

dialogue_en: Tattooed men in black robes...
dialogue_jp: そう　合体しています

dialogue_en:
The fiends have...merged with
some of the passengers.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントを着た乗客とモンスターが
なんと言えばいいのか……

dialogue_en: And?
dialogue_jp: で？

dialogue_en: Anyway, I fought in the republic army.
dialogue_jp: オレは　共和国の兵士だった

dialogue_en: Ya didn't think all those buildings demolished themselves, didja?
dialogue_jp: あちこち　壊れた建物が残ってただろ

dialogue_en: Junon versus Shinra. Before your time.
dialogue_jp: 共和国と神羅の戦争だよ

dialogue_en: Can't bring back the dead, but...least I can do is sit here and pay 'em my respects.
dialogue_jp:
生き残ったオレにできるのは
静かに寄り添ってやることくらいさ

dialogue_en: Lotta folks lost their lives─good, decent folks.
dialogue_jp: 市民も兵士も　大勢が犠牲になった

dialogue_en: Other than thinking about the war, that is. This used to be a shelter, y'know. One of the few safe spots during the air raids.
dialogue_jp:
ただ　戦争のことを思うのさ
ここは戦争中　防空壕として使われてたんだ

dialogue_en: Frankly, I'm not doin' much of anything.
dialogue_jp: なにって　具体的にはなにも

dialogue_en:
Anyway, name's Freddie.
So what was it ya needed again?
dialogue_jp:
ふわ～あ　オレはブレディ
で　なんの用だって？

dialogue_en: Oho! Now that's what I'm talkin' about!
dialogue_jp: おお　大盛りか！

dialogue_en: I guess I can make do with this.
dialogue_jp: ほう　まあまあだな

dialogue_en: Thought I said everything on the list...
dialogue_jp: ふ～ん　ケチったなあ

dialogue_en: Been bustin' my ass tryin' to keep these guys alive.
dialogue_jp: こいつら　襲われるってのに逃げもしねえ

dialogue_en: Oh! Hey!
dialogue_jp: おう　来たか

dialogue_en: Barret!
dialogue_jp: バレット！

dialogue_en: Come and get it, assholes!
dialogue_jp: オラオラオラアアア！

dialogue_en: Copy.
dialogue_jp: もちろん

dialogue_en: Be ready for anything, okay?
dialogue_jp: ティファ　準備はいいか

dialogue_en: Those men... They're...through here...
dialogue_jp: 奥に……黒マントたち……

dialogue_en: Hey! Anyone in here!?
dialogue_jp: 黒マント　どこだあ！

dialogue_en: C'mon!
dialogue_jp: 行こう！

dialogue_en: Barret.
dialogue_jp: バレットか

dialogue_en: Don't shoot! I'm not one of them, I swear!
dialogue_jp: 無実　アタシは無実！

dialogue_en: What the─
dialogue_jp: ちょっ　ちょちょ……

dialogue_en: Hey! Take it easy!
dialogue_jp: おい　待て！

dialogue_en: But no more... Not on my ship.
dialogue_jp: 私の職権で　全員処分する

dialogue_en: Those robed men have been merging with the fiends─becoming monstrosities bent on killing us all!
dialogue_jp:
その連中は　モンスターと融合して
より危険な存在に変化するらしい

dialogue_en: Stand aside! Now!
dialogue_jp: そいつらから離れろ！

dialogue_en: They won't fight back!
dialogue_jp: 見てらんねえぜ

dialogue_en: This some kinda joke? You ain't got nothin'!
dialogue_jp: ああ？　持ってねえじゃねえか

dialogue_en:
What? Didn't you read the list?
Everything I need's written right there.
dialogue_jp:
うん……？
メモを見て　必要なモン集めてこいよ

dialogue_en: Hrm?
dialogue_jp: うん……？

dialogue_en: Special delivery!
dialogue_jp: 持ってきたぞと！

dialogue_en: I say we get his ass up.
dialogue_jp: やる　ぜったい

dialogue_en: Well?
dialogue_jp: どうする？

dialogue_en: You wanna get my ass up? Then you bring me exactly what's on that list, got it?
dialogue_jp:
オレを動かしたいなら
そのメモを見て　ぜんぶ集めてくるんだな

dialogue_en: You're leaving? But you just got here!
dialogue_jp: なんだよ　さみしいねえ

dialogue_en: Forget it.
dialogue_jp: 帰ろっか

dialogue_en: Scared me half to death.
dialogue_jp: おっかねえなあ

dialogue_en: for the...reunion...
dialogue_jp: リユ……オ……ン……

dialogue_en: The time...has come...
dialogue_jp: 時は……満ちた……

dialogue_en: Guys! Look at the dead guys!
dialogue_jp: あれ　見て見て見て！

dialogue_en: Uh...guys?
dialogue_jp: ユフィ

dialogue_en: I had to...for the sake of my passengers and crew.
dialogue_jp: 私には　乗客を守る責任がある

dialogue_en: Holy shit...
dialogue_jp: かんいっぱつ……

dialogue_en: Move!
dialogue_jp: ユフィ！

dialogue_en: Whoa! You're not serious, are you!?
dialogue_jp: おい　本気か！

dialogue_en: Wake up!
dialogue_jp: 起きなさい！

dialogue_en:
The voice of an angel...
I'm gonna dream sweet dreams tonight...
dialogue_jp:
うう～ん　心地のいい声だ
スリプル並みだな

dialogue_en:
Rise and shine! Get up, sleepyhead.
C'mon! Please?
dialogue_jp:
もしも～し　起きてくださ～い
ねえ　お願い

dialogue_en: Think a swift kick'd get him up?
dialogue_jp: どうする　叩き起こすか

dialogue_en: Well, you'll have to come back tomorrow─or the day after. I'm too tired to help ya right now.
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　明日か明後日に来てくれ
いまは眠くて眠くて……

dialogue_en: Ah, so you're looking for parts.
dialogue_jp: ああ　部品か

dialogue_en: We're trying to fix Gabe's cart.
dialogue_jp: ガボンの荷車を　直したいんだ

dialogue_en: Can I help you?
dialogue_jp: う～ん　なんだあ？

dialogue_en: Hrm... Hng...
dialogue_jp: むむ……むう……

dialogue_en: Zzz...
dialogue_jp: ぐう……ぐう……

dialogue_en: Jenova.
dialogue_jp: ジェノバ

dialogue_en: And they call her...
dialogue_jp: その怪物の名は──

dialogue_en: That she can become those you hate. Those you fear. Those you love.
dialogue_jp:
怖れる顔　愛する顔を見せて
人を動かしたという

dialogue_en:
That she can peer inside you─into the very
depths of your soul.
dialogue_jp: その怪物は　人の心を読み　姿を変えた

dialogue_en: They say she's a monster.
dialogue_jp: かつて　怪物がいた

dialogue_en: Sephiroth!?
dialogue_jp: セフィロス！

dialogue_en: Keep it away from me!
dialogue_jp: カンベンしてよぉ～！

dialogue_en: What...what is that?
dialogue_jp: なにこれ……

dialogue_en: Zzz...

Whatever. I'm not doing it for him anyway.
I'm doing it for the chocobos!
dialogue_jp:
でも　チョコボのため
がんばるぞ　おう！

dialogue_en: That jerk...
dialogue_jp: くう～

dialogue_en: 'Fraid so.
dialogue_jp: かもしれない

dialogue_en:
Wait─seriously? Are you saying I got duped?
That he's just using me?
dialogue_jp:
もしかして　わたし　だまされた？
うまく使われてる？

dialogue_en: Not can't─won't. Hate to break it to you, but...pretty sure that guy's better off than he looks.
dialogue_jp:
なあ　エアリス
弱々しく見せていたが　あの男は強いと思う

dialogue_en: Sorry for roping you into this even though he can't pay.
dialogue_jp: ごめんね　報酬もないのに

dialogue_en: Kweh, kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエ　クエ～！

dialogue_en: You mind your manners around that fella on the mountain, or he's liable to kick ya off it.
dialogue_jp:
山の上のオヤジは　変わり者だ
ムカついたら負けだぞ

dialogue_en: Curious to see how this all turns out.
dialogue_jp: 期待しないで待ってるよ

dialogue_en: Alright, let's roll!
dialogue_jp: では　しゅっぱつ！

dialogue_en: And she ain't a big fan of people.
dialogue_jp: 捕まえるのは　難しいぞ

dialogue_en: That so?
dialogue_jp: ほう

dialogue_en: She certainly was, but now she's with us!
dialogue_jp: そのチョコボなら　もういます

dialogue_en: Cloud...?
dialogue_jp: クラウド……

dialogue_en: Cloud, don't let her fool you.
dialogue_jp: だまされるなよ　クラウド

dialogue_en: We can kill it!
dialogue_jp: 斬りひらくまでだ

dialogue_en: Don't panic.
dialogue_jp: 問題ない

dialogue_en: They're everywhere!
dialogue_jp: 囲まれた？

dialogue_en: How many times I gotta shoot you!?
dialogue_jp: ウネウネさせてんじゃねえ！

dialogue_en:
Fort Condor, huh? Takes me back.
Used to study basic tactics with it.
dialogue_jp:
コンドルフォートか　懐かしいな
戦術訓練で使ったことがある

dialogue_en: What could be the cause...? This merits investigation. One moment.
dialogue_jp:
この反応はなんだろう……
すみません　すこしお待ちください

dialogue_en: So many energy spikes...
dialogue_jp: 周辺に　異常値を確認

dialogue_en:
Now then, all that remains is to─
...Hmm, that's odd.
dialogue_jp:
エンシェントマターの回収はこれで……
っと　あれ？

dialogue_en: Something indeed! That's it!
dialogue_jp: 当たりです　バレットさん！

dialogue_en: Hey... Is this somethin'?
dialogue_jp: おう　こいつはどうだ？

dialogue_en: Let's see what we got.
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: According to the energy readings, the protorelic should be nearby.
dialogue_jp:
周辺に　エンシェントマターらしきものは
見当たりませんか？

dialogue_en: I see you made it safe and sound.
dialogue_jp: 目的地への到着を確認

dialogue_en: I've confirmed protorelic energy signals in your vicinity. Would you mind investigating?
dialogue_jp:
近隣に　エンシェントマターのエネルギーを確認
調査に向かってください

dialogue_en: On behalf of the entire Shinra-8 crew, we wish you a peaceful night's sleep, and hope you wake refreshed and ready for fun in the sun.
dialogue_jp:
輝く太陽の下でのすばらしい休日を夢見て
今夜はどうぞ　ごゆっくりとお休みください

dialogue_en:
We will be arriving as scheduled at Costa del Sol
in the morning.
dialogue_jp: コスタ・デル・ソルへの到着は　明朝の予定です

dialogue_en:
All passengers are once again free to move about
the vessel as they please.
dialogue_jp: 現在本船は航路を戻し　順調に航行中

dialogue_en: This is your captain speaking. I'm happy to announce that the earlier disturbance has been resolved.
dialogue_jp:
お騒がせしておりました艦内のトラブルは
さきほど無事　収束いたしました

dialogue_en: Good evening, everyone.
dialogue_jp: 船長のチトフです

dialogue_en: I'm no fool.
dialogue_jp: ああ　だまされるものか

dialogue_en: Glad you're here, troopers! Shinra forces are poised to strike our position!
dialogue_jp:
援軍のみなさん
神羅軍は　もうすぐそこに迫っています！

dialogue_en: Nooo!
Don't give up the fight...
dialogue_jp: ぐぬぬ　あとは頼んだぞ……

dialogue_en: Captain!
dialogue_jp: 隊長！

dialogue_en: Hey, watch where you're shootin'!
dialogue_jp: うお　なんだなんだ？

dialogue_en: And why do we look...like this!?
dialogue_jp: どうなっちゃったの　私たち

dialogue_en: What in the hell is goin' on here!?
dialogue_jp: なんじゃこりゃああああ！

dialogue_en: Huh?
Wha─!?
dialogue_jp: なっ！

dialogue_en: Reinforcements are here! We're saved!
dialogue_jp: 援軍だ　援軍が来たぞ～！

dialogue_en:
Detecting rapid increase in─
Wait, Tifa! Don't!
dialogue_jp:
異常値が急上昇……
ティファさん　ダメです！

dialogue_en:
Game's pretty fun, actually. Wedge was into it,
and he and I'd play sometimes.
dialogue_jp:
ボードゲームにもなってるよね
ウェッジたちがハマってて　私も――

dialogue_en:
Bird by the name of Belle.
Last I saw, she was over yonder.
dialogue_jp: ベルってのが　その辺にいるはずだが

dialogue_en:
From this craftsman at the top of the mountain.
He'll have 'em. Can't go on foot though. Only a certain chocobo can make that climb.
dialogue_jp:
山の上の小屋に　職人がいる
だが　小屋までは山登り用のチョコボが必要だ

dialogue_en: So where can we get them?
dialogue_jp: どこにあります？

dialogue_en: I gotta warn ya─the parts I need are hard to come by. At least, around here they sure are.
dialogue_jp:
修理用の部品の調達は大変だぞ
このあたりじゃ　手に入らない

dialogue_en: I wasn't really askin', but...
dialogue_jp: 話が進んでいるが

dialogue_en: Sweet!
dialogue_jp: ありがと！

dialogue_en: Pretty, pretty please?
dialogue_jp: おねがい～

dialogue_en:
Maybe I just wanna feel like I...did a good deed.
But look at him. And his birds!
dialogue_jp:
もしかすると　自己満足
でも　見過ごせないの

dialogue_en:
Please, Cloud─he needs help.
If not for him, then at least for the chocobos?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　お願い
チョコボとわたしに　ちから貸して？

dialogue_en:
Hey, come on now.
Don't be so hard on yourself!
dialogue_jp: そんなの　責任じゃないと思います

dialogue_en:
Serves me right, thinkin' I could run a business.
Shoulda known it'd all fall apart.
dialogue_jp:
俺が責任持って
あいつらといっしょに　朽ちていくよ

dialogue_en: Well, nothing for it now.
dialogue_jp: こうなっては　仕方がない

dialogue_en:
The enemy's already upon us!
We'll explain on the way─just come!
dialogue_jp:
我々の作戦を説明するので
ちゃんと　ついてきてくださいね！

dialogue_en: There's no time!
dialogue_jp: 時間がありません！

dialogue_en: Now what did I just say!?
dialogue_jp: おいおいおいおい！

dialogue_en: We are!?
dialogue_jp: ええっ？

dialogue_en: Help us─you're our only hope!
dialogue_jp: どうか　力を貸してください！

dialogue_en: Curious about my birds? I've tried settin' 'em free, but they just keep comin' back. Force of habit.
dialogue_jp:
何度か放したが　戻ってくるんだ
いまさら野生には戻れないのさ

dialogue_en:
I wouldn't be able to pay ya for your time.
I'm flat broke.
dialogue_jp: 報酬を出す　余裕がないんだ

dialogue_en: Says the girl who ain't gotta fix it. But even if ya were some kinda secret grease monkey...
dialogue_jp:
それはまあ
でも　こんな状態でな

dialogue_en: It's just a matter of getting the right parts, isn't it?
dialogue_jp: 部品があれば　直りますよね

dialogue_en: Kind of you to offer, but nah.
dialogue_jp: いやあ　もういいんだ

dialogue_en: You know, I bet we could help you fix it.
dialogue_jp: 修理　手伝いましょうか？

dialogue_en: And since I don't have the parts to fix her, both she and my business are as good as dead. Even the chocobos're feelin' down about it all.
dialogue_jp:
修理のための部品もなくて　万事休す
俺もチョコボも　心が折れちまった

dialogue_en:
Still tryin' to keep it goin' best I can...
Well, was tryin', till my carriage shit the bed.
dialogue_jp:
それでも　のらりくらりと営業してきたが
ついに荷車が壊れたんだ

dialogue_en:
Used to run deliveries,
but Shinra put the kibosh on all that.
dialogue_jp: 運送の仕事は　神羅の規制が厳しくてね

dialogue_en:
And before you ask, my birds are not for rent.
Ain't worth the risk.
dialogue_jp:
最初に断っておくが
チョコボの貸し出しはしとらんよ

dialogue_en: I'm Gabe, by the way. Owner of the ranch here.
dialogue_jp: 俺はここの牧場主の　ガボンだ

dialogue_en: I told that idiot to take his signs down... Swamplands're dangerous, even on chocoback.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボの沼渡りは危険だから
あの看板は外せと言ったのに

dialogue_en: He what? Goddammit...
dialogue_jp: まったく　グリンのやつ

dialogue_en: The hell was that?
dialogue_jp: なんだったんだ？

dialogue_en: Captain!
dialogue_jp: 隊長～！

dialogue_en: Halt! Unhand that, you rogues!
dialogue_jp: ええい　待て待て～い！

dialogue_en: My memory is failing me, but intuition tells me that is the treasure I seek!
dialogue_jp:
なっ　なんだったかは思い出せんが
あれは我が探し求めしもの

dialogue_en: What is that I spy?
dialogue_jp: コンドル兵

dialogue_en: What is that I spy?
dialogue_jp: あれに見えるは？

dialogue_en: What is that I spy?
dialogue_jp: むむ　あれに見えるは……

dialogue_en: Hold up─the protorelic!
dialogue_jp: あっ　エンシェントマター！

dialogue_en: Not again...
dialogue_jp: まいったな

dialogue_en: The enemy could launch another attack at any moment. Please, you must stay and help us fight!
dialogue_jp:
やつらは　また必ず攻めてきます
俺たちといっしょに　ここで戦いましょう

dialogue_en: Captain! Fellow troopers! It would seem that our next battle is fast approaching!
dialogue_jp:
隊長　援軍のみなさん
次の戦いの時は迫っています！

dialogue_en:
And we owe it all to your gracious aid.
We thank you.
dialogue_jp: おぬしらのおかげで助かった　礼を言うぞ

dialogue_en: We did it! Victory is ours!
dialogue_jp: やった　我々の勝利です！

dialogue_en: Isn't Fort Condor kind of a big deal in Midgar?
dialogue_jp: コンドルフォートか～　おもしろそう！

dialogue_en: To secure it, I'm afraid you have no choice but to reenter Fort Condor.
dialogue_jp:
回収するには　もういちど
ボードの中へ入るしかなさそうです

dialogue_en: If I were to guess, I'd say it's somewhere within that temporal rift.
dialogue_jp:
エンシェントマターは　コンドルフォートの世界へ
取り込まれてしまったようです

dialogue_en: The protorelic appears to have vanished...
dialogue_jp: エンシェントマターの消失を確認

dialogue_en: We cannot ignore this amazing development!
dialogue_jp: さっそく　確認に向かってみましょう！

dialogue_en: Which means...a portal like the one you used to enter Fort Condor has opened elsewhere!
dialogue_jp:
ということは　コンドルフォートへの入口も
再び開かれていると考えられます

dialogue_en: It's faint, but I'm still tracking its signal.
dialogue_jp:
微弱ながら
エンシェントマターのエネルギーを確認

dialogue_en: Right, of course... The protorelic!
dialogue_jp: そうか　エンシェントマター……

dialogue_en: Protorelic's gone─one of those punks in there swiped it.
dialogue_jp:
エンシェントマターは
あっちのヤツらに持ってかれちまったぜ？

dialogue_en: So what now, little man?
dialogue_jp: で　どうするよ

dialogue_en: Chadley. Focus.
dialogue_jp: 落ち着け　チャドリー

dialogue_en: It was as if the very fabric of time and space was twisted...but how? And why?
dialogue_jp:
いったい　どんな原理で引き起こされたのでしょうか
仮にあの異常値を――

dialogue_en: No phenomenon like this has ever been observed before!
dialogue_jp:
ボクのデータベースでも
類似の例は見当たりません！

dialogue_en: Incredible... Simply incredible!
dialogue_jp: すごい　こんな現象が起こるなんて

dialogue_en: That's impossible! ...It is impossible, right?
dialogue_jp: んなバカな！　って言いてえとこだが

dialogue_en: Uh... Call me crazy, but we were inside the game, weren't we?
dialogue_jp: 私たち　ゲームの世界にいた……よね？

dialogue_en: But...you know who I bet has serious potential? Red.
dialogue_jp:
あ～でも　エアリスより
レッドのほうが向いてそう

dialogue_en: I could teach you a few tricks!
dialogue_jp: カンタン　カンタン！

dialogue_en: Maybe I shoulda gotten into it earlier. Think I can still learn the basics?
dialogue_jp:
わたし　やってみたい！
できる……かな？

dialogue_en: Just goes to show I'm a natural-born tactician.
dialogue_jp: でも　アタシはほら　カンがいいから

dialogue_en: Nope! I picked it up while I was in Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
はーはっは！
実は覚えたばかり

dialogue_en: You compete as a kid?
dialogue_jp: ウータイにもあるの？

dialogue_en: I'm like a grandmaster-level player, I'll have you know.
dialogue_jp:
コンドルフォート
けっこう得意なんだよね

dialogue_en: Aw, man! I really wanted to go too.
dialogue_jp: あ～あ　アタシも行きたかったな～

dialogue_en: Listen to y'all. As if we've got nothin' better to do.
dialogue_jp: のんきなモンだな　まったくよ

dialogue_en:
Oho, someone sounds confident.
No backing out, okay?
dialogue_jp:
ほほう　じゃあ約束
忘れないでね

dialogue_en: Yeah, let's go a round sometime!
dialogue_jp: へへ～ん　こんど対戦しようか

dialogue_en: I accept any and all challengers.
dialogue_jp: ふん　受けて立とう

dialogue_en: What do you say to that?
dialogue_jp: レッド　どう？

dialogue_en: I don't see why not! I bet both you and Red could pick it up quickly.
dialogue_jp:
もちろん　ねえ
レッドはこういうの得意でしょ？

dialogue_en: Maybe I shoulda gotten into it earlier. Think I can still learn the basics?
dialogue_jp:
わたし　やってみたい！
できる……かな？

dialogue_en: Yeah, it was really popular in Sector 7.
dialogue_jp: 七番街では　すごく流行ってたんだよ

dialogue_en: Failing that, you may be assured that I will retrieve you myself.
dialogue_jp:
万がいちのときは
ボクが必ず　みなさんを連れ戻します！

dialogue_en: Based on the analysis of your previous trip, I am confident you'll return following the conclusion of the match.
dialogue_jp:
前回のデータから推察するに　ゲームが終了すれば
元に戻る仕組みになっているようです

dialogue_en: Um, before we do this, are we sure we can get back?
dialogue_jp: 行くのはいいけど　ちゃんと戻ってこられるよね？

dialogue_en: Then what're we waitin' for? Let's get in there and crack some more Shinra skulls!
dialogue_jp:
しゃあねえな
神羅の野郎どもを蹴散らしてやらあ！

dialogue_en: I think we can safely say that's the entry point.
dialogue_jp: やはり　そこが入口になっているようですね

dialogue_en: Protorelic energy signature confirmed near the board game.
dialogue_jp:
コンドルフォート周辺に
エンシェントマターの反応を確認

dialogue_en: I wish you the best of luck, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: 引き続き　調査をお願いします！

dialogue_en: We must recover it and unravel the mystery behind its disappearance.
dialogue_jp:
にわかには信じがたい現象ですが
この謎を解き明かすためにも

dialogue_en: Previously, the protorelic in the Junon region was lost within a temporal rift.
dialogue_jp:
ジュノンエリアのエンシェントマターは現在
コンドルフォートの世界に取り込まれています

dialogue_en: I see you've taken a step back from our investigation. Perhaps a review is in order.
dialogue_jp:
以前の調査から時間が経ってしまったので
あらためて　状況を整理しておきますね

dialogue_en: Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん

dialogue_en: Listen to y'all. As if we've got nothin' better to do.
dialogue_jp: のんきなモンだな　まったくよ

dialogue_en: Ooh, someone sounds confident. No backing out, okay?
dialogue_jp:
ほほう　じゃあ約束
忘れないでね

dialogue_en: Yeah, let's go a round sometime!
dialogue_jp: へへ～ん　こんど対戦しようか

dialogue_en: I accept any and all challengers.
dialogue_jp: ふん　受けて立とう

dialogue_en: What do you say to that?
dialogue_jp: レッド　どう？

dialogue_en: With the captain's aggressive approach, I fear we'll surely fail. Please, we can't succeed without you!
dialogue_jp:
隊長の無謀な作戦では敗退は必至
どうか　力を貸してください！

dialogue_en: Your mission is to help us break through the enemy lines and retrieve the artifact they stole!
dialogue_jp:
本作戦の目標は
神羅軍に奪われた物資の奪還です

dialogue_en: Right now, we can but charge!
dialogue_jp: いまはとにかく　突撃～～～！

dialogue_en: Oh, cease your whinging, man! We've no time for it.
dialogue_jp:
ええい　黙れ黙れ
ゴタクはよいのだ！

dialogue_en: Whaddya mean "your" treasure? It came from our world─it belongs to us!
dialogue_jp:
あれは　オレたちの世界にあったもんだ
おまえのもんじゃねえ！

dialogue_en: Come, friends! Let us join forces to lay waste to those fiends and reclaim my treasure!
dialogue_jp:
おお　共にあやつらから
我が宝を取り戻そうぞ！

dialogue_en: Troopers! You're just in time.
dialogue_jp: みなさん　また来てくれたんですね！

dialogue_en: Captaaain!
dialogue_jp: 隊長～！

dialogue_en: How could this be!?
dialogue_jp: やられたあ～！

dialogue_en: I'm goin' in! Charge!
dialogue_jp: うおおお　突撃～～～！

dialogue_en: Oh?
dialogue_jp: えっ……

dialogue_en: It's not so bad.
dialogue_jp: 言うほど　悪くはない

dialogue_en: I don't think I'll ever get used to this.
dialogue_jp: 慣れないなあ　この感じ

dialogue_en: Don't be. I wish I could have done more, but there was so much interference.
dialogue_jp:
ボクのほうで観測した数値も
ノイズだらけで　使い物になりませんでした

dialogue_en: Sorry, kid.
dialogue_jp: すまねえ

dialogue_en: Oh...it seems you've returned empty-handed.
dialogue_jp:
エンシェントマターの回収は
失敗に終わったようですね

dialogue_en: Welcome back to reality, everyone.
dialogue_jp: クラウドさんたちの帰還を確認

dialogue_en: Captain!? Wait! Don't leave without us!
What is the meaning of this!?
dialogue_jp: なにゆえ～～～？

dialogue_en: Fie! What is the meaning of this!? Release me at once, I say! You hear me!? Release me at once!
dialogue_jp: なにゆえ～～～！

dialogue_en: Bwahaha! You fool!
dialogue_jp: ぬはははは　笑止！

dialogue_en: Oh no you don't!
dialogue_jp: 待て　この野郎！

dialogue_en: Indeed─yet we shan't rest till my prize is mine once more! Now charge!
dialogue_jp:
うむ　あとは我が宝を取り返すのみ
いざ突撃～～～！

dialogue_en: Captain! We've won!
dialogue_jp: やりましたね　隊長！

dialogue_en: ...That's our cue.
dialogue_jp: はあ　俺たちも行くぞ

dialogue_en: Captain! We're coming!
dialogue_jp: 援護します　隊長～！

dialogue_en:
Your princess and your treasure await you!
Make haste, my hero!
dialogue_jp:
はやく　迎えにきてちょうだい
待ってるわよ～！

dialogue_en: Over here!
dialogue_jp: ここよ～！

dialogue_en: Now then, if I were a protorelic, where would I be?
dialogue_jp: さ～て　エンシェントマターは……と

dialogue_en: C'mon, let's get this over with before the boy wonder tries to talk us into worse.
dialogue_jp:
これ以上ややこしくなる前に
とっとと行って　さっさと片付けちまおうぜ

dialogue_en: I swear...
dialogue_jp: ったく……

dialogue_en: Oh! ...Yes, of course. I seem to have gotten caught up in the excitement.
dialogue_jp:
あっ　そうでした
すっかり夢中になってしまって

dialogue_en: Wait─no! What happened to the protorelic? Ain't that what we came for?
dialogue_jp:
って　待て待て
目的はエンシェントマターの回収だろ？

dialogue_en: Yeah!
dialogue_jp: おうよ！

dialogue_en: Now then, let us risk life and limb to discover the truth of this phenomenon!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　今度こそ
この現象の謎を解き明かしましょう！

dialogue_en: Fort Condor portal confirmed.
dialogue_jp: コンドルフォートへの入口を発見

dialogue_en: I can, however, inform you of the relic's location! Let's head there next.
dialogue_jp:
エンシェントマターの位置は捕捉済みですので
次の現場へ向かってみましょう

dialogue_en: Sadly, no. While I could offer theories, I require more data to speak with confidence.
dialogue_jp:
いくつか仮説は立てられますが
いずれも確証に至るには　データが不足しています

dialogue_en: You know anything about that?
dialogue_jp: どういうことなのかな

dialogue_en: Hey, Chadley? I think I heard the captain call the protorelic his "treasure" or something.
dialogue_jp:
隊長さん　エンシェントマターのことを
『我が宝』って言ってたけど

dialogue_en: We're dealing with a powerful energy source. Powerful enough to call current models into question.
dialogue_jp:
なにか　既存の概念を越える
巨大な力が干渉しているのかもしれません

dialogue_en: Oh, my darling hero!
dialogue_jp: ああ　救世主さま～！

dialogue_en: Yeah─we gotta help 'em.
dialogue_jp: うん　やるしかない

dialogue_en: I don't think we can get the protorelic back without the captain.
dialogue_jp:
エンシェントマターを取り戻すには
隊長さんを助けなくちゃ

dialogue_en: So how should we handle this?
dialogue_jp: ったく　どうするよ

dialogue_en: Without him, we're as good as dead!
dialogue_jp: 俺たちには　隊長が必要なんです！

dialogue_en: I've never felt so alive─and it's all thanks to the captain!
dialogue_jp:
隊長が来てから　もう
毎日　楽しくて楽しくて

dialogue_en: Ever since that day, we've been able to move around─under our own power!
dialogue_jp:
ボクたち　自分の力で
自由に動けるようになったんです！

dialogue_en: But all of that changed when the captain showed up.
dialogue_jp: でもある日　隊長が現れて

dialogue_en: Normally, we'd be stuck here, waiting on the board until someone came along to play with us.
dialogue_jp:
本当なら　だれかが遊んでくれるのを
ボードの上で待つことしかできません

dialogue_en: We're nothing more than pieces in this game.
dialogue_jp: 俺たち　ゲームのコマですから

dialogue_en: Whaddya mean?
dialogue_jp: どういうことだ？

dialogue_en: And without him, we're doomed─all of us!
dialogue_jp:
隊長がいなくなったら
ボクたち　終わりなんです

dialogue_en: Friends, help us! The captain is in grave danger!
dialogue_jp: みなさん　どうか隊長を助けてください

dialogue_en: If he does, then he's farther gone than I thought.
dialogue_jp: 色々　とっちらかってんなあ

dialogue_en: Uh, does he really think we don't realize it's him?
dialogue_jp: あれって　隊長さん……だよね？

dialogue_en: Right... Speaking of which, I've reacquired its signal.
dialogue_jp: はい　エンシェントマターの位置は捕捉済みです

dialogue_en: Even so, we can't just abandon those guys─never mind the protorelic.
dialogue_jp:
だとしてもよ
やつらもエンシェントマターもほっとけねえぞ

dialogue_en: It's no surprise he's become a symbol of hope.
dialogue_jp: 希望と可能性の象徴なのかもしれません

dialogue_en: And the joy I felt when someone finally came along and set me free.
dialogue_jp:
彼らにとって　隊長さんは
ボクにとってのクラウドさんと同じ

dialogue_en: Indeed they were. I still remember the weight of the chains that bound me to Hojo's service...
dialogue_jp:
ボクも　宝条から離れたあの時の気持ちは
いまでもよく覚えています

dialogue_en: Yeah─when they gained free will. They were pretty happy about that, weren't they?
dialogue_jp:
自由に動けるようになったって
中のみんなは喜んでたけど

dialogue_en: You hear what the cavalry said? This whole thing started when the captain showed up.
dialogue_jp:
このおかしな現象は
あの隊長が来てから始まったらしい

dialogue_en: That polygonal piece of shit... Talk about a dick move!
dialogue_jp: あの野郎　恩を仇で返しやがって

dialogue_en: Captain!? Wait for us, Captain! Where are you going!?
dialogue_jp: 隊長　待ってください隊長～！

dialogue_en: We shall build ourselves a sprawling empire!
dialogue_jp: 共に　最強の帝国を作ろうぞ！

dialogue_en: Come, my loyal henchmen! With this, none can hope to stand against us.
dialogue_jp:
来い　我が兵士たちよ
宝を手にしたいま　我に敵ナシ！

dialogue_en: Uh... Captain?
dialogue_jp: たっ　隊長……？

dialogue_en:
This treasure is mine and mine alone!
Never would I allow you knaves to claim it!
dialogue_jp:
この宝は我のもの
おぬしらに渡す気などハナからないわ！

dialogue_en: That, I'm afraid, I cannot do.
dialogue_jp: そういうわけには　いかぬのだ

dialogue_en: Hey! Hands off, buttercup! You wanna thank us so bad, give us the protorelic!
dialogue_jp:
よせ　くっつくんじゃねえ
礼ならエンシェントマターをよこせ！

dialogue_en: Hey! Hands off, buttercup! You wanna thank us so bad, give us the protorelic!
dialogue_jp:
よせ　くっつくんじゃねえ
礼ならエンシェントマターをよこせ！

dialogue_en: Yeah... But hey, at least we can say we...went out with a bang...
dialogue_jp:
でも　久しぶりに思いきり戦えて
楽しかったな

dialogue_en: Time's up for this world...and everyone in it.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちの世界も　これで終わりか

dialogue_en: Cap...tain...

Urgle gurgle guh
Hrgle gurgle gurgle gaw...
Urgle gurgle...gaw...
dialogue_jp:
ゴゴゴゴゴ　ゴゴゴゴゴゴゴ
ゴゴゴゴゴ……！

dialogue_en: Back where it belongs.
dialogue_jp: こいつは　返してもらうぜ

dialogue_en: Fine. If it's a fight you want, you got it.
dialogue_jp: ケリをつけに来たんだ　望むところだ

dialogue_en:
We won't let anyone harm the captain!
Rest assured─we won't hold back!
dialogue_jp:
隊長は俺たちが守る
来るなら　容赦はしない！

dialogue_en: Stay back!
dialogue_jp: 来ないでください！

dialogue_en: What're you doin'?
dialogue_jp: おまえら……

dialogue_en: Many moons have passed / Far too many to recall / Since my search began / Yet my treasure still eludes / Naught I've gleaned but loneliness
dialogue_jp:
我が宝　探し求めて千代八千代
虚しくひとり　漂いし日々

dialogue_en: Is this the captain's...empire?
dialogue_jp: ここが　隊長さんの帝国？

dialogue_en: Preparations complete and standing by. You may proceed when ready, Cloud.
dialogue_jp:
観測準備　完了
こちらはいつでもオーケーです　クラウドさん

dialogue_en: Fine by me. Let's rip 'em a new one.
dialogue_jp: 今度こそ　きっちりケリをつけてやる

dialogue_en: We head back in there, it'll mean going up against the captain one more time.
dialogue_jp:
あの中に入ったら
きっとまた　隊長さんと戦うんだよね

dialogue_en: Send us the coordinates.
dialogue_jp: よし　行こう

dialogue_en: Next time we see 'em, I hope we're fighting on the same side.
dialogue_jp:
次に会うときは
敵かな　味方かな

dialogue_en: Provided they accept the optional update, that is.
dialogue_jp: 彼らにその意思さえあれば……ですが

dialogue_en: I have increased the units' cognitive function and operational freedom.
dialogue_jp:
ユニットたちが自由に行動
思考を広げていけるよう設計しています

dialogue_en: By optimizing the combat simulator's OS for the game's internal processor...
dialogue_jp:
バトルシミュレーターのシステムを応用し
内部の演算機能を利用することで

dialogue_en: allow me to present an upgraded model of Fort Condor.
dialogue_jp: 名付けて『コンドルフォートVer.CH-2』！

dialogue_en: Though I am sure my efforts will pale in comparison to that of their captain's...
dialogue_jp:
彼らにとって
隊長さんの代わりになるかどうかわかりませんが

dialogue_en: Not necessarily. I've devised an alternative.
dialogue_jp:
その件に関しては
ボクなりに手を尽くしてみました

dialogue_en: That the last we'll see of the cavalry?
dialogue_jp: もう　みんなとは会えないのかな

dialogue_en: Great.
dialogue_jp: そうか

dialogue_en: Which, unfortunately, means I cannot ascertain his true identity.
dialogue_jp:
残念ながら　隊長さんの正体は
最後までつかめませんでした

dialogue_en: The Fort Condor anomaly appears to have vanished, along with the captain.
dialogue_jp:
コンドルフォートの世界は
隊長さんのデータとともに消失

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: おう

dialogue_en: Welcome back, and splendid work, everyone.
dialogue_jp: エンシェントマターの回収　お疲れ様でした

dialogue_en: Well... If we can find the time.
dialogue_jp: ああ　覚えておく

dialogue_en: Thanks for playing with us, friends... May we meet again on the field of battle...someday...
dialogue_jp:
遊んでくれて　ありがとう
またいつか　いっしょに――

dialogue_en: We sure did... It was fun while it lasted.
dialogue_jp:
そうだな……
うん　楽しかった

dialogue_en: This isn't working!
dialogue_jp: このままじゃ……

dialogue_en: Ya still ain't learned your lesson, have ya?
dialogue_jp: くそ　しつけえな！

dialogue_en: Gotta get 'em all!
dialogue_jp: もういちど　行くぞ

dialogue_en: What!? Again!? Come on!
dialogue_jp: またふりだし？　今度こそ！

dialogue_en: We gotta be faster than that, y'all!
dialogue_jp: 次こそ仕留めんぞ！

dialogue_en: Goddammit... Can't let 'em grow back!
dialogue_jp: 次のチャンスを狙う

dialogue_en: You're done!
dialogue_jp: あきらめない！

dialogue_en: Let's pour it on!
dialogue_jp: ここからが本番！

dialogue_en: I can do this all day!
dialogue_jp: このまま続けんぞ！

dialogue_en: You wanna go, huh!? Then let's go!
dialogue_jp: 何度だって　撃ち抜いてやらあ！

dialogue_en: You know what to do!
dialogue_jp: この調子でいくぞ

dialogue_en: That's it!
dialogue_jp: 続けていくぞ

dialogue_en: Don't stop, guys! We got it on the ropes!
dialogue_jp: 消耗はしてるはず　もういちど行くよ！

dialogue_en:
This freak ain't nothin' special.
Let's tear it limb from limb!
dialogue_jp: 不死身ってワケじゃねえ　何度でもぶっつぶす！

dialogue_en: It's working. Keep up the pressure!
dialogue_jp: 効いてはいる　このまま続けるぞ！

dialogue_en: Here, man. You hang on to this. Just make sure to keep it safe, alright?
dialogue_jp:
こいつは　おまえがしっかり持っとけ
誰にも盗られんじゃねーぞ

dialogue_en:
This is getting us nowhere...
We gotta get rid of those things!
dialogue_jp: 倒せるやつから　片付けなきゃ！

dialogue_en:
Oh, for the love of... How many times
we gotta do this same song and dance!?
dialogue_jp: キッツイぜ　邪魔モンさえいなけりゃ……

dialogue_en: Deal with the tentacles first!
dialogue_jp: まずは　こいつを黙らせる

dialogue_en:
Yeah, we did. You know Bill?
He helped us cross the swamp and everything.
dialogue_jp:
はい　グリン牧場のお世話になって
なんとか

dialogue_en: Who're you? Wait...you didn't come from the grasslands, didja?
dialogue_jp: 見ない顔だな　沼を越えてきたのか

dialogue_en:
Well, look at that: another chocobo ranch!
I wonder where the owner's hiding.
dialogue_jp:
わあ　チョコボファーム？
牧場主さん　どこかな

dialogue_en: Have a nice day.
dialogue_jp: いってらっしゃいませ

dialogue_en: Welcome. Need some rooms?
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃいませ　ご利用ですか？

dialogue_en: No grown-ups.
dialogue_jp: 大人は入れませ～ん

dialogue_en: Only kids allowed in here.
dialogue_jp: ここは　子供しか入れないよ

dialogue_en: Gimme a shout whenever you wanna hitch a ride.
dialogue_jp: 乗りたくなったら　いつでも声をかけな

dialogue_en: And we're off! Be there before ya know it!
dialogue_jp: よし　面舵いっぱ～い！

dialogue_en: Headed for Costa del Sol? Hop aboard!
dialogue_jp: コスタ・デル・ソルに行くなら　乗ってくか？

dialogue_en: Well? You comin'?
dialogue_jp: どうする　乗ってくか？

dialogue_en: Ya gotta book a ticket on the ferry, but once you're aboard, it's a straight shot to paradise.
dialogue_jp:
あとは連絡船に乗り換えて
気がつけば　コスタ～ってなわけよ

dialogue_en: If you're thinking of heading to Costa del Sol, I'd be happy to take you to the port.
dialogue_jp:
コスタ・デル・ソルへ行きたいんなら
ジュノン港まで運んでやろうか？

dialogue_en: Sorry, the ship won't be leaving port until the festivities are over.
dialogue_jp:
上の式典が終わるまで
船は出せねえんだ　すまんな

dialogue_en: You take care of yourself, okay?
dialogue_jp: そんじゃ　気をつけてな

dialogue_en: Haha! Don't be a stranger!
dialogue_jp: フハハ　いつでも歓迎だ！

dialogue_en: Hahaha! What can I do ya for?
dialogue_jp: フハハ　なんか買ってけよ

dialogue_en: Hello, hello, hello!
dialogue_jp: よお　いらっしゃい！

dialogue_en: and is encouraging everyone to go about their lives as normal.
dialogue_jp:
いつもどおりの生活を心掛けるよう
呼びかけています

dialogue_en: Public Security anticipates a rise in misinformation in the coming days...
dialogue_jp:
また　治安維持部門は
錯綜する情報に惑わされず

dialogue_en: and has promised to make a public statement in the near future to address their concerns.
dialogue_jp:
近日中に　ルーファウス新社長による
声明文を発表するとしています

dialogue_en: The Shinra Electric Power Company regrets the distress inflicted upon the people...
dialogue_jp:
神羅カンパニーは　住民の間で
不安の声が高まっているのを受け

dialogue_en: The illegal broadcast from the Shinra Resistance Committee and the interim Wutaian government has left many fearful of future attacks.
dialogue_jp:
先日発生した　反神羅連絡会
およびウータイ暫定政府による
電波ジャックの続報です

dialogue_en: as well as her potential connections to Avalanche and other insurgent groups.
dialogue_jp:
また　アバランチの関与につきましても
今後明らかにしていくとしています

dialogue_en: Authorities are investigating her involvement...
dialogue_jp: 事件との関連を調査中とのことです

dialogue_en: Public Security has confirmed that multiple eyewitnesses observed a young woman, believed to be of Wutaian origin, behaving erratically shortly before the incident.
dialogue_jp:
治安維持部門の発表によりますと
犯行当時　ウータイ人とみられる
不審な女性が式典会場の近くで
目撃されたという証言があり

dialogue_en: Thankfully, he was uninjured and was able to assume his new position without delay.
dialogue_jp:
幸い　ルーファウス新社長にケガはなく
業務に支障もないとのことです

dialogue_en: was attacked during his inauguration in Junon.
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス新社長が
襲撃される事件がありました

dialogue_en: Rufus Shinra, our newly appointed president...
dialogue_jp:
ジュノンで行われた
神羅カンパニーの式典で

dialogue_en: And now breaking news.
dialogue_jp: 臨時ニュースをお伝えします

dialogue_en: These cabins are reserved for our first-class passengers.
dialogue_jp:
一等のお客様のお部屋ですので
ご遠慮ください

dialogue_en: I'm terribly sorry.
dialogue_jp: 申し訳ございません

dialogue_en: While this remains a difficult period for Shinra, there is hope that the transition will mark a turning point for the company.
dialogue_jp:
現在　様々な問題を抱える
神羅カンパニーに
新しい風を吹かすことができるのか
期待されています

dialogue_en: The president will also give his first public address, in which he is expected to outline his vision for the future.
dialogue_jp:
式典では今後の神羅カンパニーについて
ルーファウス新社長の
就任演説が　行われます

dialogue_en: Many people have flocked to Junon for the chance to see his first official appearance as commander in chief.
dialogue_jp:
開催地となる要塞都市ジュノンには
多くの人々が
新社長の雄姿を見るべく訪れています

dialogue_en: Today, the Shinra Electric Power Company is celebrating the inauguration of Rufus Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
本日　神羅カンパニーの新たなリーダー
ルーファウス新社長の
就任パレードが行われます

dialogue_en: or the identities of their associates.
dialogue_jp: 市民への情報提供を呼びかけています

dialogue_en: Shinra is asking citizens to come forward if they have information concerning Avalanche's current whereabouts...
dialogue_jp:
神羅カンパニーは
カームの協力者も含めて　引き続き
アバランチの捜索を続けていくとの事で

dialogue_en: and those who concealed them in Kalm have yet to be apprehended.
dialogue_jp:
カームに潜伏していた協力者も
逮捕には至っておりません

dialogue_en: According to a recent statement from Public Security, key members remain at large...
dialogue_jp:
治安維持部門からの発表によると
アバランチは　現在も逃亡中であり

dialogue_en: We have received new information regarding Avalanche, the anti-Shinra group responsible for multiple terrorist attacks in Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
続いて　ミッドガルへの破壊活動で
指名手配されている反神羅組織
アバランチ捜索関連の続報です

dialogue_en: Make sure to tune in tomorrow to find out.
dialogue_jp:
全世界の注目が
ジュノンに集まっています

dialogue_en: What exciting festivities does our new company president have in store for the city?
dialogue_jp:
軍事拠点である
要塞都市ジュノンでの式典が
どんな内容や規模になるのか

dialogue_en: Bet you're wondering what's behind this door. Unfortunately, I can't say!
dialogue_jp:
なにがあるか　気になりますよね
教えられません！

dialogue_en: Sorry, sir. Only ship's crew allowed in here.
dialogue_jp: この先は　関係者以外立ち入り禁止です

dialogue_en: My apologies, but these are the first-class cabins. Other passengers are not allowed beyond this point.
dialogue_jp:
こちらは一等客室でございます
入室は　ご遠慮ください
