dialogue_jp: ルーファウス　帰れ！

dialogue_en: Go home, Rufus! Go home!
dialogue_jp: ルーファウス　帰れ！

dialogue_en: Down. With. Shinra!
dialogue_jp: 打倒　神羅！

dialogue_en: Down. With. Shinra!
dialogue_jp: 打倒　神羅！

dialogue_en: and he said those robed guys managed to board the Shinra-8 and cross the dang sea.
dialogue_jp:
このへんに住んでた黒マントたち
連絡船で海を渡ったらしい

dialogue_en: So I was talking with a sailor friend of mine...
dialogue_jp: 船員仲間に聞いたんだけどよ

dialogue_en: Well, Junon is a military base. Makes sense that refugees would seek shelter here.
dialogue_jp:
ジュノンは軍事要塞だからね
戦争の犠牲者をかくまってるんじゃない

dialogue_en: Must be a crowd up there now, what with the others.
dialogue_jp:
上には　けっこうな数の
黒マントがいるんだってな

dialogue_en: Good riddance, I say. They stunk to high heaven.
dialogue_jp:
あいつら　くさいし
いなくなって清々するわ

dialogue_en: All together in a group? Didn't expect that. Maybe they went looking for a doctor?
dialogue_jp:
自分たちで動いたのかよ　珍しいな
薬でももらいに行ったのかな

dialogue_en: If you're looking for them for whatever reason, I saw 'em head up top not too long ago.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　あいつらなら
すこしまえに上に行ったみたいよ

dialogue_en: Where'd those robed fellas run off to? Coulda sworn I saw 'em hangin' around the ruins.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントのヤツら　どこにいったんだ？
このへんの廃墟に住んでたよな

dialogue_en: But somewhere along the line, we forgot how...
dialogue_jp: みんな　すっかり忘れちまったがね

dialogue_en: People never needed Shinra to survive.
dialogue_jp:
神羅の手を借りなくても
生きていけるんだ

dialogue_en: Gotta make that money, right?
dialogue_jp: 自分たちの利益のためさ

dialogue_en: No need for "mako," no sir. Shinra, though─they couldn't live without it, and they made sure we couldn't either.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄なんて使わなくても生活できるんだ
それなのに　神羅は魔晄に依存させる

dialogue_en: Oil, coal, wind... The Republic of Junon had no shortage of ways to generate power.
dialogue_jp:
共和国時代は　石炭や石油
それから風力なんかを使って
エネルギーを得ていたんだよ

dialogue_en: Oh, I'd like to be his friend...
dialogue_jp:
マイフレンドって
呼ばれてみたいかも！

dialogue_en: Shinra only knows how to raise mayhem.
dialogue_jp: 神羅は面倒しか起こさない

dialogue_en: Did you see the guy on the motorcycle? What a hunk!
dialogue_jp:
さっきのバイクの人
かっこいい～！

dialogue_en: I was sure a fight was gonna break out.
dialogue_jp: 戦いになるのかと思ったぜ

dialogue_en: That bike about burst my eardrums.
dialogue_jp: バイク　うるさかったなあ

dialogue_en: Prob'ly came lookin' for Avalanche.
dialogue_jp: アバランチの捜索に来たのか？

dialogue_en: That guy was a SOLDIER, right?
dialogue_jp: あの人　ソルジャーだよな？

dialogue_en: What was that about?
dialogue_jp: なんの騒ぎだったんだよ

dialogue_en: I better hurry up and put in an order.
dialogue_jp:
へへ　さっそく
なんか運んでもらおうぜ

dialogue_en: Just shows he's got faith in the brand.
dialogue_jp: それだけ　やる気あるってことでしょ

dialogue_en: Bumped his rates up a little to boot.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと値上げしたみたいだけどな

dialogue_en: Whaddya know: Gabe and his birds are back in business!
dialogue_jp:
ガボンさんのチョコボ運送
再開したってさ！

dialogue_en: You gotta be kidding me. Seriously? Then how in the hell are we supposed to get all the lumber we need?
dialogue_jp:
マジか　グラスランドから
木材仕入れられないと　困るな

dialogue_en: I heard that Shinra cracked down on him and the birds again. He might have to close down the business for good this time.
dialogue_jp:
なんか　また神羅にやられたって噂よ
もう廃業するんじゃないかな

dialogue_en: You seen Gabe lately? Feels like he hasn't come by in ages.
dialogue_jp:
ガボン牧場のチョコボ運送
最近　見ないよな

dialogue_en: What, they up and decided to take a vacation in Costa del Sol on Shinra's gil?
dialogue_jp:
なに　コスタに遊びにでも行ったの？
神羅の慰安旅行かしら

dialogue_en: I'm a fisherman, not a businessman. Shinra ain't no concern of mine.
dialogue_jp:
漁に行くぞ
神羅がなにしようが関係ねえ

dialogue_en: Rufus is comin' to Junon! Now's our chance to raise some hell and be heard!
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウスが来るらしいな
いまが文句を言うチャンスじゃないか？

dialogue_en: The captain's always planning some kind of special event.
dialogue_jp:
船長は　こういう
サプライズイベントが好きなんだ

dialogue_en: Alright, stud, show us what ya got!
dialogue_jp: さあ　キミの腕前を見せてくれ！

dialogue_en: The key to enjoying your voyage is making the most of your downtime.
dialogue_jp:
快適な船旅のためには
遊び心を忘れちゃいけません

dialogue_en: That match was so hype, I won't be able to sleep tonight!
dialogue_jp:
熱くなりすぎて
今夜は寝つけないかも

dialogue_en: That was riveting! And you didn't even shout "Draw!" like I always do!
dialogue_jp:
バウトって叫びました？
熱い戦いでしたね

dialogue_en: Find a worthy opponent out there yet?
dialogue_jp:
うふふ
いいライバルは見つかったかしら

dialogue_en: Reflect on your matches as soon as they're over─while it's all still fresh. That's how you get good.
dialogue_jp:
勝負が終わったら　すぐ結果の分析
それが強くなるコツ

dialogue_en: It's not about who won or lost. The real victor is the one who had the most fun playing!
dialogue_jp:
勝ち負けより　楽しい時間を
過ごせたかどうかが大切なんですよ

dialogue_en: I was getting a bit woozy, but that last match woke me right up!
dialogue_jp:
決勝戦からの興奮で
酔いも吹っ飛んだよ！

dialogue_en: Dang... I knew I shouldn't have gone all in on that player. What a heartbreaker!
dialogue_jp:
うおお　オレの応援してた子
負けちゃったよ

dialogue_en: You're a winner, baby! A champ-i-on!
dialogue_jp: 祝勝パーティー　フォ～！

dialogue_en: Come on, come on! Let's see some real card action!
dialogue_jp: もっと熱い　灼熱のバウトを見せてよ！

dialogue_en: Wait a minute─does this mean that Avalanche is here?
dialogue_jp:
もしかして
アバランチがこの村にいるの？

dialogue_en: Ugh! What an asshole!
dialogue_jp: もう　いい迷惑！

dialogue_en: Man I wish I'd been there when they tried to kill the son of a bitch.
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウスが襲撃されるなんて
いい気味だよ

dialogue_en: It's nothing serious, right?
dialogue_jp: なにも起きないで　お願い……

dialogue_en: That can't be good...
dialogue_jp: これ　まずいんじゃない？

dialogue_en: What in the world is that?
dialogue_jp: いったい　なんなの？

dialogue_en: Someone...do something.
dialogue_jp: えっ　もしかしてヤバい状況？

dialogue_en: This better not be a joke...!
dialogue_jp: なに　どうなってるの？

dialogue_en: Can't help but be worried.
dialogue_jp: 助けてくれ……

dialogue_en: This is terrible... What do we do?
dialogue_jp: ちくしょう　どうすりゃいいんだ

dialogue_en: My knees are knocking...
dialogue_jp: ここは安全なのか？

dialogue_en: This is all too much!
dialogue_jp: おいおい　どうなってんだよ

dialogue_en: What's going on? Did something happen!?
dialogue_jp: なにか事件でも起きたのか

dialogue_en: Hope the Crow's Nest folks don't try anything stupid.
dialogue_jp:
サイドジュノンの青年団が
騒がなきゃいいけど

dialogue_en: Think the new prez will, iunno, throw us a bone? We're hurtin'.
dialogue_jp:
新社長は　ボーナス大盤振る舞いとか
してくれないかな

dialogue_en: Just 'cause there's a new president doesn't mean Shinra's gonna do a one-eighty.
dialogue_jp:
新社長になるからって
神羅は　変わらないよな

dialogue_en: Can't wait for that damned parade of theirs to be over and done with.
dialogue_jp:
上で式典だってよ
さっさと終わってくれないかな

dialogue_en: Oughta hold a big ol' cookout─let their parade choke on the smoke.
dialogue_jp:
魚焼きまくって　けむたくして
パレードを妨害してやる

dialogue_en: Don't worry, little lady. I'll fix you up good as new.
dialogue_jp: よしよし　いい輝きだな

dialogue_en: Rufus'll come out on top. The rich and powerful always do.
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス様だけは
生き残ってくれないかしら

dialogue_en: Shinra and its war can get bent. It's these friggin' split ends I'm worried about!
dialogue_jp:
暗殺とか戦争よりも
髪のいたみのほうが深刻

dialogue_en: So...the Crow's Nest is working with the SRC, then?
dialogue_jp:
連絡会ってのは
サイドジュノンも関わってんのかね

dialogue_en: No one would dare take on Junon's cannon. We'll be fine.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　ジュノンの大砲がありゃ
安心だよな

dialogue_en: I tell ya, Shinra better pray the SRC don't come around here recruitin'.
dialogue_jp:
反神羅のやつらが手を結べば
神羅もヤバイよな

dialogue_en: We got no beef with the SRC. They wouldn't start trouble here.
dialogue_jp:
戦争が起きたら
ここも巻き込まれるのか

dialogue_en: First an assassin at the parade, and now a war!? Gimme a goddamn break...
dialogue_jp:
上の騒ぎの次は　戦争の噂
どうなっちまうんだ

dialogue_en: Bet you anything the folks over in the Crow's Nest are eating this up.
dialogue_jp:
サイドジュノンの青年団
盛りあがってるんでしょうね

dialogue_en: The last thing we need is for a war to break out. Got enough problems already.
dialogue_jp:
相手がアバランチでもウータイでも
戦争はイヤかな～

dialogue_en: Shinra's gonna be out for blood, you'll see.
dialogue_jp: 神羅カンパニーの今後が心配だわ

dialogue_en: You don't think Rufus was hurt, do you?
dialogue_jp: ルーファウスさん　無事なのかしら

dialogue_en: Everybody knows that Wutai was behind the attack.
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウスを狙ったのは
ウータイなんだよな？

dialogue_en: Was the assassin with Avalanche, or...?
dialogue_jp: 新社長を襲ったのはアバランチなのか？

dialogue_en: Security's been real tight ever since the parade.
dialogue_jp: ジュノンの警備が強化されちまったよ

dialogue_en: Elevator's been shut down since shit hit the fan upstairs.
dialogue_jp:
上へのエレベーターは
封鎖されたままなんだ

dialogue_en: I look forward to seeing who among them will savor the sweet taste of victory.
dialogue_jp:
勝利の美酒に酔うのは誰か
見届けさせてもらうわ

dialogue_en: That's the key to becoming a champion!
dialogue_jp: それがクイーンズ・ブラッドの極意よ！

dialogue_en: Even the strongest cards only shine when you play them at the right moment!
dialogue_jp:
強いカードをどのタイミングで出すかを
よーく考えて

dialogue_en: Nothin' compares to the thrill of a good game!
dialogue_jp:
カードバウトの駆け引きは
楽しめていますか？

dialogue_en: Phew! Competition's so hot, I'm starting to feel a little feverish!
dialogue_jp:
くう～　熱い対戦の雰囲気
たまらんぜ！

dialogue_en: Hm... It's a close match. Either one of 'em could take it!
dialogue_jp:
アイツが勝つか
それとも　コイツかな？

dialogue_en: Card battles, baby! All night long!
dialogue_jp:
カードバウトで
パーティー　フォ～！

dialogue_en: Now I'm really gettin' fired up!
dialogue_jp: よっしゃ　燃えてきた～！

dialogue_en: I'm not the greatest player, but my plan is to hang around others and improve through osmosis!
dialogue_jp:
ここにいるだけで　カードバウトが
強くなったような気になります

dialogue_en: I'm sure they'd welcome you with open arms, even if you don't end up buying anything from 'em.
dialogue_jp:
ひやかしだけでも良いんじゃ
客が来るだけでも嬉しいからのう

dialogue_en: My own store's long gone, but those ones there are still holdin' on.
dialogue_jp:
わしの店はもう潰れて無いが
まだ　あの店はやっとる

dialogue_en: Don't suppose ya might consider stockin' up on provisions while in town?
dialogue_jp:
よければ　道具屋や武器屋で
買い物をしていってくれんか？

dialogue_en: Been an age since we've seen travelers like yourselves. No one save Shinra folk ever bother with us.
dialogue_jp:
おんや　珍しいねえ
旅人がこの村にやってくるなんてねえ

dialogue_en: Wish he'd give me the same TLC.
dialogue_jp: 僕のことも磨いてほしい……

dialogue_en: We'll get you lookin' shiny and new in no time.
dialogue_jp: きゅっきゅっきゅーっと

dialogue_en: Then one day we can take to the seas again and do what we do best.
dialogue_jp:
いつか漁に出られる日のために
しっかり磨くぞ

dialogue_en: The last time you had fish so fresh you could eat it raw?
dialogue_jp:
プリップリで
脂がのった　新鮮なお刺身！

dialogue_en: When was the last time you all felt safe eating your own catch?
dialogue_jp:
あたし　おいしいお魚を
お刺身で食べたいんです

dialogue_en: It has tarnished our beaches─destroyed our livelihoods!
dialogue_jp:
いつもくさいし
変な形のお魚しかとれなくなりました

dialogue_en: Shinra's mako has ruined our ocean.
dialogue_jp:
神羅はきれいな海を
魔晄で汚しました

dialogue_en: Do you believe the company has gone too far? That they must be stopped?
dialogue_jp:
みんなで力を合わせて
神羅から海を取り戻しましょう！

dialogue_en: My friends! I represent the anti-Shinra forces of the Crow's Nest.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　みなさん！
あたし　サイドジュノンの
反神羅青年団から来ました

dialogue_en: Okay, where was I?
dialogue_jp: え～と　なんだっけ……

dialogue_en: Granted, swabbin' the deck and untanglin' nets ain't glamorous work, but better to be out there than stuck on shore.
dialogue_jp:
甲板の掃除やら網の片付けやら
雑用だけど
海に出る仕事につけただけマシだぜ

dialogue_en: Which means no more seasickness.
dialogue_jp: おう　船酔いもナシだ

dialogue_en: The world turns and turns, but somehow they keep comin' out on top. Is there nothin' we can do to put an end to it?
dialogue_jp:
同じことの繰り返し　いったい
いつまで続くんじゃろうな

dialogue_en: You mark my words, they'll start muckin' up the sky next.
dialogue_jp:
海の次は
空まで汚されるかのう……

dialogue_en: So─we're in for another war, are we? Great. Now Shinra'll have even more excuses to go forth and do as they please.
dialogue_jp:
また　戦争になるんか？
戦争にかこつけて神羅はやりたい放題だ

dialogue_en: These waters have been so polluted with filth that I haven't seen a single fish! What's a man of the sea like me s'posed to do?
dialogue_jp:
魚も　さっぱりとれんわ
海が汚れてしもうてな

dialogue_en: I swear, ever since Shinra came and built that blasted hunk of junk above us...
dialogue_jp:
戦争の後に
神羅が上の街を作ってから……

dialogue_en: Ah, such a wonderful and elegant affair!
dialogue_jp: いいわね　優雅な大会だわ

dialogue_en: I may not be that good, but I'm great at yelling "Draw!"
dialogue_jp:
バウトって叫ぶと
強くなった気になりません？

dialogue_en: They got any new books here?
dialogue_jp: なんか古い本ばっかだな

dialogue_en: Hmm. Didn't think it'd be this tough to decide.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　どれにしようかな

dialogue_en: They must've cracked down on the supply route.
dialogue_jp: 上からの仕入れが大変みたいね

dialogue_en: Are you gonna join today's tournament? I'll be rooting for you if you do.
dialogue_jp:
大会に参加するなら
健闘を　お祈りするわ

dialogue_en: If you need any Queen's Blood tips, feel free to ask.
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドのアドバイスなら
まかせて

dialogue_en: Can't wait to kick back, relax, and enjoy some cards!
dialogue_jp:
さあさあ　お気楽に
楽しんでいきましょう！

dialogue_en: Wow, I've never been to a party on a cruise before!
dialogue_jp: 船上のお祭って感じがするね

dialogue_en: Let's see... Which competitor am I gonna root for today?
dialogue_jp:
さてと
どのバウターを応援するかな

dialogue_en: Party, party, party, yeah!
dialogue_jp: パーティーナイト　フォ～！

dialogue_en: My head is pounding... Maybe I'm putting too much thought into this game.
dialogue_jp: 頭ガンガンする……知恵熱かな？

dialogue_en: That was the hottest tournament I've ever seen!
dialogue_jp: クイーンズ・ブラッド　堪能しちゃった

dialogue_en: Oof... Think I might've had one too many drinks.
dialogue_jp:
うへえ　もうベロベロだ
フラつく……

dialogue_en: Think I'm losing my voice from all this cheering!
dialogue_jp:
ゴホッゴホッ
応援しすぎて喉が痛いぜ

dialogue_en: Hey, you did amazing out there!
dialogue_jp: おお　いい勝負だったぞ！

dialogue_en: Talk about a lame selection...
dialogue_jp:
流行りもの
置いてないんだよな～

dialogue_en: Sometimes window-shopping ain't enough.
dialogue_jp: たまには買い物してやらないと

dialogue_en: Thank you again for choosing to cruise with the Shinra-8. We hope you enjoy your voyage.
dialogue_jp:
第八神羅丸の快適なクルージングを
心ゆくまでお楽しみください

dialogue_en: I won't be playing today. I'm just gonna watch from the sidelines and analyze the competition.
dialogue_jp:
今日の私は　応援専門
戦況を分析するのよ

dialogue_en: If I'm gonna watch, I wanna make sure I pick a good match.
dialogue_jp:
どっかで　面白そうなバウトは
やってない？

dialogue_en: Just watching stresses me out... I need another drink!
dialogue_jp:
熱いバウトを見てると
酒が進むぜ！

dialogue_en: You holding your own against the others?
dialogue_jp: カードバウトの調子はどうだ？

dialogue_en: Hey, good luck out there. I'll be rooting for you!
dialogue_jp:
おお　あんたのこと
応援するぜ！

dialogue_en: You'd be surprised how easy Queen's Blood is to pick up and play.
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドのルールは
意外とシンプルなの

dialogue_en: Today's tournament is gonna be intense─I can feel it!
dialogue_jp:
どんなバウトが見れるのかな
ワクワクする！

dialogue_en: Can't wait to grab a pint and check out the tourney from the sidelines!
dialogue_jp:
カードバウトをツマミに
お酒飲もうっと

dialogue_en: If you play, I'll be sure to cheer you on!
dialogue_jp: 大会に参加するなら応援するぜ

dialogue_en: This Queen's Blood tournament is gonna be a blast!
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッド大会
盛りあがりそうだ

dialogue_en: Had this thing where we'd toss a bunch of shakers in a barrel─let the waves mix the drinks for us.
dialogue_jp:
海に　酒樽つるしてよ
波の揺れでカクテルかきまわしてたな

dialogue_en: This tavern used to be on a ship in the harbor, you know. Got so low in the water when it was hoppin', you'd think she might sink.
dialogue_jp:
もともと俺の店は　船の上にあったんだ
客が多いと船が沈みかけたほどさ

dialogue_en: You're lookin' parched! Let's get you a drink!
dialogue_jp: よく来た　飲んでけ飲んでけ！

dialogue_en: Hey, good to have ya! Take a load off!
dialogue_jp:
いらっしゃい！
くつろいでけよ

dialogue_en: I just love that old-book smell.
dialogue_jp: 古本のニオイっていいわ

dialogue_en: Would be nice if Avalanche could stir things up around here too.
dialogue_jp:
ジュノンでも
アバランチが暴れたりしないかな

dialogue_en: Gotta keep this spot for the main event.
dialogue_jp: 中継の時も　この場所確保な

dialogue_en: They think they know how to party? They ain't seen nothin' yet!
dialogue_jp:
上には負けねえ
オレたちも盛りあがるぞ！

dialogue_en: Parade for the new president's inauguration, huh? Could be interesting.
dialogue_jp:
新社長就任パレードか
ドキドキするぜ

dialogue_en: How have they still not caught Avalanche?
dialogue_jp:
アバランチって
まだ捕まってないの？

dialogue_en: If only I could move up top─maybe there I'd meet the man of my dreams.
dialogue_jp:
上に行けたら　式典に来る男
捕まえられるのに

dialogue_en: Who cares what the occasion is─I'll drink to it!
dialogue_jp:
式典だかなんだか知らねえが
酒盛りだ！

dialogue_en: We know how to live it up too! Let's go till dawn, baby!
dialogue_jp:
上が盛りあがるなら
オレたちも負けちゃいられねえ

dialogue_en: Ceremony-shmeremony. It's an excuse for them to show off.
dialogue_jp:
なにが式典だよ
勝手ばっかしやがって

dialogue_en: Sounds like the perfect fit for a seasoned traveler like you.
dialogue_jp: さすがお客様　旅慣れてらっしゃる

dialogue_en: I'm so pleased to hear that you found it to your liking, sir.
dialogue_jp:
お気に召していただき
光栄でございます

dialogue_en: You spend all your time with "director this" and "manager that." What about spending time with us, Dad!?
dialogue_jp:
いまは部長さんや課長さんより
私たちへの気配りが大事だよ　お父さん

dialogue_en: Wait─you're going home already? But our vacation hasn't even started!
dialogue_jp:
ええ　家に帰るの？
コスタで遊んでからにしようよ～

dialogue_en: As much as I'd love to stay with you, I think they're gonna need me back at the office.
dialogue_jp:
バカンスはまた今度にして　会社に
顔を出したほうがいいかもしれない

dialogue_en: Cleaning up that mess in Junon is gonna take more work than they thought.
dialogue_jp:
ジュノンの騒動の後始末で
大変な状況らしい

dialogue_en: Just got a call from HQ.
dialogue_jp: 本社から連絡があった

dialogue_en: I can't wait to order room service!
dialogue_jp: ディナーはルームサービスで済ますわ

dialogue_en: I can't wait till we arrive in Costa del Sol!
dialogue_jp:
コスタ・デル・ソルへの到着が
待ちきれないよ！

dialogue_en: Those sailors are working so hard, someone really oughta tip them.
dialogue_jp:
水兵のみんなに
チップでも振るまってみようかな

dialogue_en: I was so excited for this trip I barely slept a wink last night!
dialogue_jp:
船に乗るのが楽しみで
昨日は眠れなかったんだ

dialogue_en: Once we dock, I'm making a beeline for my villa.
dialogue_jp:
コスタでは
別荘でのんびりするつもりさ

dialogue_en: Sure is. After the war, Shinra took everything─including his vessel. Gave it a real makeover.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　ジュノン戦争のあと
神羅に持っていかれた挙句に
改造されてこのザマだ

dialogue_en: I heard this ship used to belong to Captain Titov's grandfather. That true?
dialogue_jp:
この船はもともと　チトフ船長の
おじいさんの船だったって本当ですか？

dialogue_en: I'm used to eating food with a little more color...
dialogue_jp:
もうちょっと
カラフルだといいと思うんだけど

dialogue_en: Shellfish is good for the body and soul!
dialogue_jp: ヘルシーな貝料理がオススメよ

dialogue_en: Why is there still sand in my shoe!?
dialogue_jp: うわ　海の砂入ってる～

dialogue_en: Been a regular here since the place was still on a ship!
dialogue_jp: 俺は船上酒場時代からの常連だよ

dialogue_en: The chef here really knows how to cook a fish!
dialogue_jp: ここの魚料理はうまいんだよ

dialogue_en: Hoo boy... Now that's what I call salty.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　塩味きいてるね

dialogue_en: The more you drink, the more you give back to the community!
dialogue_jp:
あんたたちの酒代が
あたしの稼ぎになるんだよ

dialogue_en: Don't be shy! Keep knockin' 'em back!
dialogue_jp:
はいはい
みんなたくさん飲んでね！

dialogue_en: Who cares who the new president is? Won't change anything for us.
dialogue_jp:
新社長になっても
あたしたちには関係ないよね

dialogue_en: Alright! Let's see what's biting today!
dialogue_jp: さ～て　今日はなにが釣れるかな

dialogue_en: Bet the seagulls are hungry. I should feed 'em.
dialogue_jp:
たまには　カモメに
エサやりでもするかなあ

dialogue_en: "The brighter the ocean mako, the brighter your day!"
dialogue_jp:
海の魔晄色で
今日の運勢占ってるんだ

dialogue_en: It's still nice to walk the beach, even with the sea a mess.
dialogue_jp:
こんな海でも
散歩するのは気持ちいいぜ

dialogue_en: Hey─don't go shootin' the seagulls.
dialogue_jp: 銃でカモメを撃っちゃダメよ

dialogue_en: So they got fishing gear too, huh.
dialogue_jp: 魚釣りの道具も売っているな

dialogue_en: I'm lookin' for a quality harpoon.
dialogue_jp: 漁に使う銛を探してんだ

dialogue_en: Let's take back the sea for Junon!
dialogue_jp: ジュノンの海を取り戻しましょう！

dialogue_en: Let's stand up to our corporate oppressors!
dialogue_jp: みなさん　神羅と戦いましょう！

dialogue_en: We're recruiting for Crows Against Shinra!
dialogue_jp: サイドジュノン反神羅青年団です

dialogue_en: Let's take back the sea for Junon!
dialogue_jp: ジュノンの海を取り戻しましょう！

dialogue_en: Let's stand up to our corporate oppressors!
dialogue_jp: みなさん　神羅と戦いましょう！

dialogue_en: We're recruiting for Crows Against Shinra!
dialogue_jp: サイドジュノン反神羅青年団です

dialogue_en: I bet the breeze on the deck feels exquisite.
dialogue_jp: 甲板で風でも浴びてこようかしら

dialogue_en: It's not about when you get there, but how─and what's more grand than arriving by ship.
dialogue_jp:
船旅を選ぶのは
贅沢な海のひとときを楽しむためよ

dialogue_en: Perhaps I'll pop over to the lounge for a quick tipple.
dialogue_jp:
ラウンジのバーに
１杯　飲みにいこうかな

dialogue_en: It's showtime, people!
dialogue_jp: ショータイム　はじめるぞ！

dialogue_en: Back in the day, it was lousy with fishing boats...
dialogue_jp:
昔は釣り舟が
たくさん出ていたのよ

dialogue_en: That's it. Eat up now. I know ya must be starving.
dialogue_jp:
ほ～ら　食え食え
いっぱい食えよ

dialogue_en: Alright, everyone, come and get it! Don't wanna miss feedin' time, do ya?
dialogue_jp:
お～い　エサだぞ～
集まれ集まれ！

dialogue_en: Gotta stay vigilant. Never know when fiends'll strike.
dialogue_jp:
釣り人も来るから
万がいちに備えてるの

dialogue_en: Clear right, clear left...and we're good!
dialogue_jp:
右よし　左よし
異状な～し！

dialogue_en: Thanks to our tireless efforts, the ocean remains safe.
dialogue_jp:
子供たちが安心して遊べるように
海を監視してるんだ

dialogue_en: Nothing here, nothing there...all clear!
dialogue_jp:
右よし　左よし
異状な～し！

dialogue_en: Oh, listen to me, goin' on about the old days.
dialogue_jp: な～に昔の話じゃ　ホッホ

dialogue_en: You didn't wanna mess with the gals workin' the port, neither. Hoo.
dialogue_jp:
ぷりぷり……
港のおなごもたくましくてのう

dialogue_en: Hookin' some nice fish, bringing 'em back to gut and fillet, then eatin' 'em on the spot.
dialogue_jp:
漁のあと　とれたての魚をさばいて
その場で食ったもんじゃ

dialogue_en: Boy, oh boy. Now this takes me way back.
dialogue_jp: ぷりぷり……思い出すのう

dialogue_en: Ocean may look like it's in dire straits but...life finds a way.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄色の海でも
深いところは　まだ青いの

dialogue_en: That dolphin's so adorable.
dialogue_jp: イルカちゃん　かわいいな

dialogue_en: Lately I've been bringin' in nothing but sea devils...
dialogue_jp:
最近じゃ　網にかかるのは
モンスターばかりよ

dialogue_en: Nothing makes you forget a bad day like staring at the ocean.
dialogue_jp:
海を見てボーッとするのが
日課なんだよ

dialogue_en: Oh! I've got a bespoke Leviathan ring too!
dialogue_jp:
あっ　特注の
リヴァイアサンもありますよ！

dialogue_en: Don't wanna think about what else is lurking in these waters...
dialogue_jp:
あんな危ないのが
海にひそんでるんだね

dialogue_en: We really need to shut that reactor down.
dialogue_jp: やっぱり魔晄の海は危険だよ

dialogue_en: That girl's certainly something, isn't she?
dialogue_jp: あの子　たくましいわね

dialogue_en: Wow, that didn't faze her at all.
dialogue_jp: おぼれかけたのに　元気だなあ

dialogue_en: I'm so glad she wasn't hurt.
dialogue_jp: なんとか無事だったな

dialogue_en: What a relief this didn't turn out worse.
dialogue_jp: 事故がなくて　本当に良かったよ

dialogue_en: Somebody do something!
dialogue_jp: 誰か　助けてあげて！

dialogue_en: We gotta save her...
dialogue_jp: なんとかしなきゃ

dialogue_en: Hey! Look out!
dialogue_jp: きゃあああ　危ない！

dialogue_en: Get out of the water! Now!
dialogue_jp: はやく浜にあがるんだ！

dialogue_en: Shouldn't someone be on patrol!?
dialogue_jp: 自警団はどこいったんだ

dialogue_en: She gonna be okay!?
dialogue_jp: あの子　大丈夫か？

dialogue_en: You did great.
dialogue_jp: えらかったね

dialogue_en: Good job out there.
dialogue_jp: よ～しよ～し

dialogue_en: The show's about to start!
dialogue_jp: ショータイム　やるよ～！

dialogue_en: In the old days, you could make ends meet just fishin' off the shore.
dialogue_jp:
昔は岸から離れなくても
魚がとれたんだがな

dialogue_en: You bet your ass I am! Now stick that tongue out, boy, and taste the motor oil in the air. Taste it!
dialogue_jp:
あたぼうよ　ベロベロ～ってな
舌つきだして油を感じろ　油だ！

dialogue_en: What about taste, sir? You aren't gonna make us lick the ship, are you?
dialogue_jp:
五感ってことは　先輩は
船を舐めたりとかもするんスか？

dialogue_en: Your sense of sight, your sense of touch...
dialogue_jp: 機械にばかり頼ってちゃあいけねえ

dialogue_en: Listen up: servicing this ship requires more than just a good set of tools. You've gotta have good instincts too!
dialogue_jp:
いいか　船の点検ってのはな
五感をフルに使ってやるもんなんだよ

dialogue_en: It's past time you got some R & R!
dialogue_jp:
コスタで　のんびり
リフレッシュしようね

dialogue_en: I couldn't agree more! You've been working too hard for too long.
dialogue_jp:
うんうん
キミはいつも働きすぎなんだから

dialogue_en: But then I got this vacation, so I guess it turned out pretty good in the end!
dialogue_jp:
勘弁してくれって感じだったけど
おかげで休みが取れてよかったよ

dialogue_en: When the plate fell and I got hurt, I was pretty depressed.
dialogue_jp:
七番プレート崩落でケガしたときは
お先まっくら

dialogue_en: Didn't think so.
dialogue_jp: それと同じさ

dialogue_en: Well, what about the engine, or the gears? You gonna thank them for their contributions too?
dialogue_jp:
兄ちゃんも船のエンジンの歯車に
ありがとうなんて言った事はねえだろ？

dialogue_en: You shouldn't downplay your contributions.
dialogue_jp: そんな　ご謙遜を

dialogue_en: 'Preciate the sentiment, but there's no need to thank me. I'm just doin' my job.
dialogue_jp:
コツコツ働いてきただけだよ
ねぎらいの言葉なんざ　いらねえ

dialogue_en: Thank you, on behalf of us all.
dialogue_jp: 我々もみんな感謝していますよ

dialogue_en: Shinra is indebted to you for supporting our maritime endeavors for so many years.
dialogue_jp:
あなたのようなベテランが
長年　神羅の海運を支えてきたのですね

dialogue_en: I've been sailing with this old girl for decades... Honestly can't remember how long it's been.
dialogue_jp:
この船に乗り始めて
もう何年かな　覚えてねえや

dialogue_en: Welcome to the Crow's Nest. Pretty sweet, right?
dialogue_jp:
サイドジュノンにようこそ
いいとこだろう？

dialogue_en: Lemme guess─lookin' to join up?
dialogue_jp:
アハハハ
君も青年団に入るのか？

dialogue_en: I've got this malboro-shaped gem that I am totally dying to show off!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　モルボル浮き輪
見せびらかした～い！

dialogue_en: Me? Swim rings, baby. There's so many kinds, and I love to collect rare ones!
dialogue_jp:
浮き輪ですね
私　珍種の浮き輪コレクターなんです

dialogue_en: And you?
dialogue_jp: あなたは？

dialogue_en: I'm all about rare fish, and they've got loads of 'em out there.
dialogue_jp:
コスタでは　珍しい魚と
たくさん触れあえるんですよ

dialogue_en: I'm gonna go diving.
dialogue_jp: ボクはダイビングです

dialogue_en: Surfing for me. The waves in Costa del Sol are second to none.
dialogue_jp:
私はサーフィンですね
波がイイんですよ　あそこは

dialogue_en: So, what's on the agenda?
dialogue_jp: コスタでは　どんな遊びを？

dialogue_en: I'd go hungry if it meant I could make the two of you happy!
dialogue_jp:
ふたりのためなら
パパはごはん抜きでも問題ナシ！

dialogue_en: Whatever you want, it's yours! Daddy's gonna make all your dreams come true!
dialogue_jp:
よ～し　奮発しちゃうぞ！
太陽の楽園へのドリームツアーなんだ

dialogue_en: I respect the sea, and it'll be a cold day in hell before I work a Shinra ship.
dialogue_jp:
神羅の船に乗ってたとしても
ジュノンの漁師魂は忘れたくねえよな

dialogue_en: But if ya ask me, it's like bitin' the hand that feeds.
dialogue_jp:
効率がいいだけで
魚の気持ちがわからねえよ

dialogue_en: Ain't any easier or more efficient way to fish, true.
dialogue_jp:
けど　俺みたいな
昔かたぎの漁師に言わせりゃ

dialogue_en: 'Course, if you trawl the waters with a company ship, you're bound to rake it in.
dialogue_jp:
でっかい船で魚を乱獲すりゃあ
そりゃ　もうかるさ

dialogue_en: Now you gotta go out into the bay to get yourself a nibble.
dialogue_jp:
いまじゃ　沖合まで行かなきゃ
漁ができないんだ

dialogue_en: Only senior members get to do the cool stuff, like the rallies.
dialogue_jp:
街頭演説とかデモ行進は
先輩が仕切るってよ

dialogue_en: I wanna buy some new clothes for the beach!
dialogue_jp: コスタで新しい服を買ってもいい？

dialogue_en: You know why Daddy's so happy, sweetheart? Because he's on vacation with his two favorite ladies!
dialogue_jp:
パパはいま　猛烈に感動している
こうして家族旅行に行けるなんて！

dialogue_en: Woohoohoohoo!
Aaaaaah!
Oh wow!
dialogue_jp: はわ～！

dialogue_en: I wonder if we could sneak into the engine room without getting busted...
dialogue_jp:
機関室のエンジンも覗きたいんだけど
いけるかな？

dialogue_en: And can we talk about that frame? I like my ships well built, and this baby is thicc!
dialogue_jp:
ひょえ～　マッチョな鉄骨
抱かれたい船　ナンバーワン！

dialogue_en: Oh baby, what I wouldn't give to hear the purr of that engine up close!
dialogue_jp:
エンジンの重低音を聴いてると
耳元で囁いてほしくなる

dialogue_en: And while I'm at it, I can pick up some Da-chao beans as tasty souvenirs.
dialogue_jp: おみやげに　ダチャオ豆も手に入るしね

dialogue_en: Oh no─the pen is mightier than the ninja, and I'm gonna prove it!
dialogue_jp:
ペンはシノビよりも強し
突撃あるのみ！

dialogue_en: Whoa, easy! Let's slow down there a little bit!
dialogue_jp: ええっ　無茶言わないでくださいよ

dialogue_en: Maybe I ought to go undercover in Wutai to root out the truth! It'd be the ultimate exposé!
dialogue_jp:
ふふ　事件の真相を確かめるために
なんとかウータイに潜り込めないかしら

dialogue_en: Well, better get used to it.
dialogue_jp: 何年所属しても同じらしい

dialogue_en: Help us take back our seas!
dialogue_jp: 豊かな海を取り戻そう！

dialogue_en: We're building a new republic! Dunno what that means, but...it's happening!
dialogue_jp:
新しいジュノンを作るんだ
具体的なことは　まだ考えてないけど

dialogue_en: Wow... Was the sky always this big?
dialogue_jp: はあ～　すいこまれそう～

dialogue_en: Hahaha, you're hilarious.
dialogue_jp: きゃははは　笑える～

dialogue_en: I've never been so sleepy...
dialogue_jp: ふわ～あ　ねむ～い……

dialogue_en: Wish there was something better to do than count birds.
dialogue_jp:
ふわ～あ……
鳥の数　かぞえるの飽きたな

dialogue_en: The sky stretches on forever...
dialogue_jp: 空　大きいな～

dialogue_en: Mm, that's the stuff.
dialogue_jp: はあ～　うめえ

dialogue_en: Hey...I got it! We ask Shinra to...
dialogue_jp: あっ！　神羅に頼むか

dialogue_en: So you're an engineer now?
dialogue_jp: オレたちにできるかな

dialogue_en: Convert it to a..."hydropower" plant?
dialogue_jp: 水力か風力に変えればいいんじゃね？

dialogue_en: Then what? Keep using it? Mako's ruining our lives.
dialogue_jp:
だが　魔晄炉を使い続けたら
魔晄汚染は減らないぞ

dialogue_en: First we occupy the offshore reactor─bring it under our control.
dialogue_jp:
海底魔晄炉を占拠して
オレたちの管理にするんだろ

dialogue_en: So...what's the plan once we take back our waters?
dialogue_jp:
海を神羅から取り戻したあとは
どうするんだ？

dialogue_en: It's a boring job, but someone's gotta do it.
dialogue_jp: 後方支援も立派な戦いだって

dialogue_en: Easy. Our place is on the streets, rallying people to the cause─not the front lines.
dialogue_jp:
うちは街頭演説とかやって
最前線はアバランチとウータイの連中に
まかせるんだってさ

dialogue_en: We're gonna reclaim these waters and make 'em beautiful again!
dialogue_jp:
ジュノンの美しく豊かな海を
取り戻しましょう

dialogue_en: Then ya joined the wrong people. Maybe consider Avalanche?
dialogue_jp:
そういう危ないのは
アバランチに入れってさ

dialogue_en: And if not this one, the next! I've already got ideas for articles!
dialogue_jp:
うんうん　これからもがんばって
かわら版作ろう！

dialogue_en: Latest condor newsletter's up! Still can't believe we had such a good sighting. That was a real stroke of luck for our guests!
dialogue_jp:
『安全第一　コンドル予報』最新号！
今回はゲストを迎えての観察会だね

dialogue_en: Clear Skies: A Condor-watcher's Guide... Hope people read it.
dialogue_jp:
『安全第一　コンドル予報』
みんな　読んでくれるかな

dialogue_en: Our latest newsletter's looking pretty good!
dialogue_jp: あたしたちコンドル観測隊のかわら版

dialogue_en: Huh?
dialogue_jp: えっ……

dialogue_en: Then would you consider dating...me?
dialogue_jp: わたしは　あなたのことが好き

dialogue_en: Maybe I'm just over men in general.
dialogue_jp: 軽い男なんて最悪

dialogue_en: No way. That guy's too big a flirt for my taste.
dialogue_jp:
っていうか
あいつは誰でも手当たり次第か

dialogue_en: The same Toby who was making moves on you?
dialogue_jp:
でも　トビーは
あなたにアタックしてたよね

dialogue_en: Maybe Toby could be your Dillan.
dialogue_jp:
トビーは
あなたのことがイイらしいわ

dialogue_en: She met Dillan here, didn't she?
dialogue_jp: ディランとはここで出会ったのよね

dialogue_en: Claire's really lucky. Talk about a love story for the ages.
dialogue_jp:
あたし　クレア先輩みたいな
大恋愛にあこがれるわ

dialogue_en: It's a big world out there.
dialogue_jp: 世界は広いよ

dialogue_en: Screw it. I should just go to Cosmo Canyon and study planetology.
dialogue_jp:
よっし　星命学の聖地
コスモキャニオンでも目指すか

dialogue_en: Small world, I suppose.
dialogue_jp: 世間はせまいよ

dialogue_en: Wanted to get away from Under Junon, but all I see are the same faces.
dialogue_jp:
アンダージュノンが嫌で出てきたのに
顔見知りばっかりだよな

dialogue_en: Nobody's getting my caramel!
dialogue_jp: キャラメルは　だれにも渡さない

dialogue_en: except when those new places happen to be filled with fiends─could do without that.
dialogue_jp:
モンスターがたくさんいる地域ですと
ちょびっと怖いんですよ

dialogue_en: Yeah, visiting new places is nice...
dialogue_jp:
知らない街へ行くときは
ワクワクしますが

dialogue_en: Still sounds like fun to me.
dialogue_jp: それは楽しそうだ

dialogue_en: Well, not all over─just wherever the job takes us.
dialogue_jp:
仕事であれば　どこへでも
という感じです

dialogue_en: You sailors must be living the life, traveling all over the world.
dialogue_jp:
水兵さんたちは
世界中を旅してまわってるの？

dialogue_en: Sweet, juicy fruit, right here! Get a taste of the tropical sun!
dialogue_jp:
コスタの太陽をたっぷり浴びてますから
甘くて　みずみずしいですよ！

dialogue_en: Ripe and tasty fruit for sale!
dialogue_jp: 美味しいフルーツは　いかがっすか？

dialogue_en: Get your fresh fruit here! Oranges, bananas, apples, mangoes, and more!
dialogue_jp:
フルーツ　いかがっすか～？
バナナ　オレンジ　リンゴにマンゴー

dialogue_en: How are you enjoying the voyage so far?
dialogue_jp: クルージングの旅はいかがでしょうか

dialogue_en: Apparently, it protects the island─not sure from whom, though, seeing as there's no way for us to get over there.
dialogue_jp:
コンドルは閉ざされた島の
守り神らしいんだが
その島には　近寄る方法がない

dialogue_en: I'm trying to spot the eponymous bird of Condor Hill.
dialogue_jp:
コンドルの丘には
でっかいコンドルが飛んでくるんだ

dialogue_en: Um, when have you ever been in shape?
dialogue_jp: おまえ　昔からなんもしてないだろ

dialogue_en: I'm just so outta shape since moving to the Nest...
dialogue_jp:
ここに来てから
なまっちまったしな

dialogue_en: There isn't a single job here we can handle.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちにできそうな仕事はねえなあ

dialogue_en: I heard the best way to get work was through the noticeboard, but...
dialogue_jp:
仕事に困ったら
掲示板で探すって聞いたけど

dialogue_en: Okay!
Okay!
Okay!
Okay!
dialogue_jp: はーい！

dialogue_en: The mako hurts creatures on land too. And if we don't act fast, it'll even start hurting us.
dialogue_jp:
みんなのお母さん　お父さんは
みんなが大きくなるまえに
神羅と戦わなければならないの

dialogue_en: Farewell, fellow freedom fighter─and stay safe!
dialogue_jp: 青年団の同志よ　無事を祈る

dialogue_en: Keep a sharp eye out for monsters.
dialogue_jp:
モンスターが荒れてる
気をつけろよ

dialogue_en: Welcome to the Crow's Nest! Feel free to rest up here if you need to.
dialogue_jp:
ここはサイドジュノンだ
疲れてるなら休んでいくといい

dialogue_en: Hey there, fellow freedom fighter. How goes it?
dialogue_jp: 青年団の同志よ　調子はどうだい？

dialogue_en: Seems like a dumb place to do that.
dialogue_jp:
あんなところに
お店開いたんですか？

dialogue_en: Well, I hope they don't trash the place.
dialogue_jp: 盗賊に荒らされたりしなきゃいいですね

dialogue_en: Speaking of, didn't we send people out there to watch for bandits or something?
dialogue_jp:
はい　あそこなら
モンスター監視任務で行きました

dialogue_en: Only thing we can do is try to catch a glimpse from a distance.
dialogue_jp:
観測隊の連中も
ここから見守るしかないんだ

dialogue_en: That rumor about Wutai's ninjas being involved... You think it holds any water?
dialogue_jp:
襲撃したのは
ウータイのシノビらしいって噂は
本当ですかね？

dialogue_en: We got the scoop on the new president skirting death at his own inauguration! This is gonna make our careers!
dialogue_jp:
神羅の新社長が
就任式で襲撃されるなんて！
大スクープ　とくダネよ

dialogue_en: Alright─Queen's Blood! Winner takes 'em all!
dialogue_jp:
よ～し
クイーンズ・ブラッドで勝負な！

dialogue_en: It took a while, but our time's finally come! Let's do this, people!
dialogue_jp:
いよいよ俺たちの時代が来るな
気合い入るぜ

dialogue_en: Heard Wutai's makin' moves against Shinra!
dialogue_jp:
ウータイの連中が
なんかやったんだって？

dialogue_en: Okay!
Okay!
Okay!
Okay!
Okay!
There're people going around connecting anti-Shinra forces? Since when!?
dialogue_jp:
反神羅グループを結ぶ連絡会
マジであったのか！

dialogue_en: Costa del Sol is Shinra's premier resort─a paradise where summer never ends!
dialogue_jp:
目的地のコスタ・デル・ソルは
神羅が作った常夏のリゾートです

dialogue_en: Have you been to the lounge on the upper deck yet? It's open to all of our guests.
dialogue_jp:
上の階にはラウンジがございます
ぜひ　足を運んでみてください

dialogue_en: On behalf of the entire crew, I wish you a pleasant voyage. If there is anything we can do for you, let us know.
dialogue_jp:
第八神羅丸では船員一同
みなさまの船旅が素敵なものと
なりますよう　努めております

dialogue_en: The Shinra-8 is one hell of a ship! I'm over the moon that I finally landed an assignment on it!
dialogue_jp:
第八神羅丸　いい船でしょう
やっと配属してもらえたんです！

dialogue_en: We have to do inspections to make sure everything's in order.
dialogue_jp:
航行中も異常がないか
点検をしているんだ

dialogue_en: The crew doesn't just keep the ship moving─we keep it safe too.
dialogue_jp: 船内の警備も　水兵の仕事の１つです

dialogue_en: I didn't think the competition was gonna be so intense!
dialogue_jp:
思ってたよりハイレベルな大会で
びっくり！

dialogue_en: That Captain Titov's low-key kinda hot─especially for a guy his age.
dialogue_jp:
チトフ船長って　渋くて
とってもすてきなオジサマね

dialogue_en: That "mysterious challenger" certainly made the finals interesting, don't you think?
dialogue_jp:
謎の挑戦者って
おもしろい人……だったね

dialogue_en: Queen's Blood's just as much fun to watch as it is to play!
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドって
見てるだけでも面白いな

dialogue_en: Wow, that match had me on the edge of my seat!
dialogue_jp: いや～　楽しかった楽しかった！

dialogue_en: I heard Regina was something else, but damn!
dialogue_jp:
レジーのカードさばき
ありゃすげえ！

dialogue_en: Who the heck was that mystery player who showed up all dramatic at the end there!?
dialogue_jp:
最後に乱入してきた
謎の挑戦者は誰なんだ？

dialogue_en: Man, that final match was electrifying!
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドの大会
盛りあがったな！

dialogue_en: This Queen's Blood thing sounds kind of fun. Maybe I'll give it a go!
dialogue_jp:
私もクイーンズ・ブラッドの大会に
出てみようかな

dialogue_en: Tell 'em!
dialogue_jp: なんだ！

dialogue_en: Did you hear about the parade in Junon? Someone tried to assassinate the new president!
dialogue_jp:
神羅の新社長が　就任式典中に
襲撃されたってホント？

dialogue_en: The president's speech was so inspiring─I started tearing up!
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス新社長の演説
感動しちゃった

dialogue_en: I saw one of the crew usher those men in black robes away... Wonder where they went.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントの人たち
船員さんに連れてかれちゃったよ？

dialogue_en: Rufus can't catch a break. First he loses his father, and then he nearly loses his own life.
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウスも社長に就任して早々
襲撃されるとは　災難だねえ

dialogue_en: Maybe I'll go check out the Queen's Blood tournament.
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッド大会を
見に行ってみるか

dialogue_en: I'm glad I caught the parade in Junon, but I'm really lookin' forward to Costa del Sol.
dialogue_jp:
ジュノンのパレードを見て
コスタ・デル・ソルでバカンス
っていうツアーなんだよ

dialogue_en: What was with those guys in black robes? They doing a flash mob?
dialogue_jp:
さっき黒いマントを着た
妙な連中を見かけたよ

dialogue_en: I'm gonna find me a rich idiot and make him buy me a first-class ticket for my trip home─alone, of course.
dialogue_jp:
コスタでお金持ちをつかまえて
帰りは絶対　一等客室に乗るんだから！

dialogue_en: Ugh. I should've gone with something more elegant.
dialogue_jp:
うーん
もっとオシャレしてくればよかった

dialogue_en: Once I hit the beach, it's party time!
dialogue_jp: コスタのビーチで遊びまくるつもり！

dialogue_en: I bet a sunset at sea's amazing.
dialogue_jp: 海に沈む夕日でも見に行こうかな

dialogue_en: I'm fasting for now so I can eat my way through Costa del Sol!
dialogue_jp:
コスタで食べ歩きするから
船旅中はガマン！

dialogue_en: I can't wait to dive into a big, fluffy hotel bed.
dialogue_jp:
はやくコスタの
ふかふかのベッドで寝たいなあ

dialogue_en: Whoa! I liked it better when it wasn't...swaying...
dialogue_jp: うわ～　ゆれ～るゆれ～る

dialogue_en: I'm so outta here. War is not what I signed up for.
dialogue_jp:
暴力反対！
荷物をまとめて逃げ出さなきゃ

dialogue_en: Yeah!
Yeah!
Yeah!
Yeah!
Yeah!
dialogue_jp: うおおお！

dialogue_en: You know it!
dialogue_jp: 異議なし！

dialogue_en: You said it!
dialogue_jp: そのとおり！

dialogue_en: Alright!
dialogue_jp: よし！

dialogue_en: You know it!
dialogue_jp: 異議なし！

dialogue_en: Exactly!
dialogue_jp: そのとおり！

dialogue_en: Yeah!
dialogue_jp: ああ！

dialogue_en: We're listening!
dialogue_jp: なんだ～！

dialogue_en: Hell yeah!
dialogue_jp: なにさ！

dialogue_en: Woo!
dialogue_jp: おう！

dialogue_en: We hear ya!
dialogue_jp: 聞くぜ！

dialogue_en: What's up!?
dialogue_jp: なんだ～！

dialogue_en: 'Course he has. He's just biding his time until the right moment comes along to reclaim what's his.
dialogue_jp:
取り返したいから　船長は出世も望まず
この船に乗り続けているんだ

dialogue_en: I'm backpacking across the world on a budget. For the life experience.
dialogue_jp:
貧乏旅行の最中なんです
人生経験になるかなって

dialogue_en: Has he ever thought about trying to get it back?
dialogue_jp:
神羅から返してもらったりは
できないんですか？

dialogue_en: Costa del Sol, where summer never ends...
dialogue_jp:
コスタ・デル・ソルは
常夏の楽園なんだよ

dialogue_en: This whole traveling by ship thing's kinda cool!
dialogue_jp:
クルージングって初めてだから
ワクワクする

dialogue_en: I'm gonna head out west and strike it rich!
dialogue_jp: ボクは西の大陸へ　出稼ぎに行くんだ

dialogue_en: Hehe... I wonder if I'll find love in paradise.
dialogue_jp:
ふふ　旅先の出会いとか
期待しちゃうよなあ

dialogue_en: It's kinda neat, sleeping in a hammock.
dialogue_jp: ハンモックで寝るのは初めてなんだ

dialogue_en: Yo yo! Wanna grab a drink?
dialogue_jp: おう　いっしょに飲まないか？

dialogue_en: I'm so excited I can barely control my feet!
dialogue_jp:
コスタが楽しみすぎて
踊りたくなっちゃうよ～

dialogue_en: Yeah!
Yeah!
Yeah!
Play Stage 4 of Fort Condor on <color=yellow>Hard mode</color>?
dialogue_jp:
【コンドルフォート　ステージ４　ミッションモード】
挑戦しますか？

dialogue_en: Play Stage 3 of Fort Condor on <color=yellow>Hard mode</color>?
dialogue_jp:
【コンドルフォート　ステージ３　ミッションモード】
挑戦しますか？

dialogue_en: Play Stage 2 of Fort Condor on <color=yellow>Hard mode</color>?
dialogue_jp:
【コンドルフォート　ステージ２　ミッションモード】
挑戦しますか？

dialogue_en: Play Stage 1 of Fort Condor on <color=yellow>Hard mode</color>?
dialogue_jp:
